25a4: can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi ched du bskyed pa ma yin no/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi sems ni sems can dpag du med pa'i ched du bskyed pa yin gyi/ nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ni ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i
25a5: bu rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang rang gi rgyud dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams zlog par zad kyi/ byang chub kyi sems ni sems can dpag tu med pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams zlog pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu yang byang chub
25a6: kyi sems ni bstan cing bsnyen te/ bskams la mang du byas na/ pha rol du phyin pa drug po rnams kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob bo// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob na/ des nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas
25a7: rnams rab tu phye'o/ / gang dag 'di la dge ba'i rtsa bskyed de/ 'di lta ste/ rang byang chub la sems shing sgom na/ de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das khyed ni rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/ bskal pa 'di skad cig na lha
25a8: rnams dang / me rnams kyi nang du mtshams sbyar te 'khod nas/ rang sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro zhes lung ston gyi/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' la/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyod de bzhin
25b1: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung mi ston to/ / nyan thos rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' la lung mi ston to// gal te nyan thos lung ston na yang / de bzhin
25b2: gshegs pa las thos nas lung ston to/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gis sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod kyang / des ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung ba ma yin gyi/ shA ra dwa ti'i bre byang chub sems dpa'
25b3: la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams kyis 'doms shing rjes su ston na/ 'di ltar des ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos las ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
25b4: kyi byang chub byung ba ma yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' las de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub byung ba'i phyir ro/ / / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa las 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /
25b5: sangs rgyas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pago// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rig par bgyi/ bcom
25b6: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang pha rol du phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo// gsol pa/ bcom
25b7: ldan 'das zag pa ma mchis pa'i sems las byang chub kyi sems khyad par du 'phags par bshad pa 'di'i don ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar lung bstan pa bzhin du yang dag par gzung bar
25b8: 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas pa yin nam gsol ba bcom
26a1: ldan 'das 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ dgra bcom pa'i sems 'dod chags dang
26a2: bral ba/ zhe sdang dang bral ba/ gti mug dang bral ba yin nam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/ dgra bcom pa'i sems 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes dang bral ba dang gti mug dang bral ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das
26a3: kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gal te dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pas sems can dpag tu med pa rnams la byams pa dang snying rjes khyab par byas kyang / de'i tshe sems can de dag bde bas tshim par
26a4: 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar dgra bcom pa ni thabs mkhas pa ma mchis na/ sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams la byams pas ji ltar khyab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das pade ltar ji srid du mnyam
26a5: par bzhag pa de srid kyi bar der byams pa des kha cig ni bde bar 'gyur/ kha cig ni sdug bsngal bar 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob pa de'i tshe sems
26a6: kyi skad cig la/ byams pa la gnas shing byams pa mngon par sgrub pa ma lags mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das ma mchis pa nan gyi dper bgyis te bshad par bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dzam bu gling 'di bdag
26a7: dang 'dra ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa sha stag gis gang bar gyur la/ de dag kyang byams pa la snyoms par zhugs sam/ gal te snyoms par 'jug par 'tshal na yang snyom par 'jug pa'i 'os
26a8: ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang zag pa med pa'i sems las byang chub sems dpa' sems mchog ces bya ba nas/ gong na med pa'i zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//
26b1: shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa sha stag tu gyur la/ dgra bcom pa re res kyang bdud kyi sde 'khrugs med 'khrugs med snyed mngon par
26b2: sprul na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'khrug med de dag mang ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
26b3: pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ dgra bcom pa de dag dang / dpung de dag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems de bzlog par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
26b4: lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems de gnyis kyi nang na gang mthu che/ sems can thams cad zag pa zad par gyur pa rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i sems
26b5: gang yin pa mthu che'am/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems mthu che/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sems ches mthu che lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyir mi
26b6: ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems ches mthu che ba yin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu zag pa med pa'i sems kyis bdud kyi sde 'khrugs med pa dpag tu med pa rdzu 'phrul gyis mngon par sprul
26b7: na yang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems kyis 'dod chags dang bcas pa/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa/ gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems yongs su gtugs par ma 'gyur mi nus so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/
26b8: sems 'di dag gi nad na sems mchog ces bya ba nas/ gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du gang yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems mchog ces bgyi ba nas/ gong na ma mchis
27a1: ba zhes bgyi ba'i bar du lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar zag pa ma mchis pa'i sems kyis gdugs par bgyid rngo mi thog pa'i slad du'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan khyod nyid la yongs su dri bar byas// khyod
27a2: kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gal te mching bu'i nor bu dag gi nang du/ nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya bzhag na/ ci mchid bu'i nor bu de dag gis nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya
27a3: la gsal ba dang / rin thang gis thub bam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// mching bu'i nor bu dag gi phung po chen pos nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya gcig kyang zil gyis gnon par rngo mo ga lags so//
27a4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ci'i phyir/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mching bu'i nor bu de dag ni yongs su dag pa yang ma lags/ kha dog bzang ba yang ma lags/ rin thang yang chung la/ rjod par yang nus
27a5: pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mching bu'i nor bu ni gnas rgya chen po nas byung bayang sa lags so// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya ni rigs kyis 'phags pa lags te/ sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin
27a6: pas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas byung ba lags te/ de ni mching bu'i nor bu mang pos zil gyis gnon par rngo mi thog go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
27a7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems ni nyan thos thams cad kyi sems zil gyis non par 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang 'di yang dag par gzigs nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
27a8: sems dpa' chen po'i sems mchog nyid du bzhag pa nas/ gong na med pa nyid kyi bar du bzhag pa yin no// nyan thos dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems gang byams pa dang ldan pa dang / snying
27b1: rje dang ldan pa yang zad par byed mi nus so/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa de dag gis kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'bang
27b2: par nus mod kyis/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni zad par byed mi nus so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa de dag gis kyang / rgya mtsho chen po kha'i
27b3: dbugs kyis bskam par nus mod kyi/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems ni zil gyis gnon pa 'am/ zad par byed mi nus so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa
27b4: mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa de dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed sreg pa'i me'i phung po chen po de yang kha'i dbugs kyis gsang bar nus mod kyi/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
27b5: dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems ni zil gyis gnan pa'am zad par byed mi nus so/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs 'dis na/ byir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mchog ces bya/
27b6: gtso bo dang / phul dang / rab dang / rab mchog dang / bla na med pa nas gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
27b7: gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rgya che zhing zad par bgyid pa 'am/ bzlog par mi nus pa ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das
27b8: kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyis su mi gsung te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gnyis su med par gsung zhing /
28a1: de bzhin kho na ste gzhan du ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gal te 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas su med pa'i gang gA'i klung gi bye mji snyed pa de skad kyi sems can gzhan dag byung bar gyur la/ sal
28a2: khams ji snyed pa dang / chu'i khams ji snyed pa dang / me'i khams ji snyed pa dang / rlung gi khams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can gzhan dag zung bar gyur na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can
28a3: de dag mang ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can de dag kyang mngon par
28a4: shes pa drug dang ldan par gyur te/ re re zhing 'di ltar maud gal gyi bu chen po lta bur rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par gyur la/ rdzu 'phrul can de dag gis 'di ltar sems can de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bdud sdig
28a5: can mngon par sprul te/ sdig can re re la yang sems can de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi glang po che'i tshogs yod pa 'am/ rta'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs yod par gyur te/
28a6: bgrang ba 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis/ dgra bcom pa rdzu 'phrul can de dag re re sprul pa byed pa'i sprul pa de dag re res kyang de bzhin du sprul pa mngon par sprul na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de dag bgrang
28a7: bal 'jug par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can de dag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de gang
28a8: na gnas pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsreg par mngon par sprul pa byed na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci sems can de dag rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par ston pa yin nam/
28b1: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni rdzu 'phrul che ba lags so// rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan zhing / 'jigs pa chen po'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa taH/
28b2: bu gal te de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par gnas la/ de ltar 'jigs pa drag po kun nas ston kyang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
28b3: chen po de dag gi sems zad par bya ba'am/ zil gyis gnon pa 'am/ bzlog nus pa'i skal pa med do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ sems can dpag tu med pa de dag dang / bdud sdig can de dag gi rdzu 'phrul
28b4: gang yin pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gang yin pa 'di gnyis la/ gang ches mthu dang ldan pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa 'di dag gi nang na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang
28b5: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzu 'phrul dang / sems 'di ni ches mthu dang ldan pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang / stobs
28b6: dang ldan pa gang yin pa de mchog byed pa 'am/ mchog tu 'byung bar 'os pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ rnam grangs 'dis na thams cad mkhyen pa
28b7: nyid kyi sems ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa'i sems mchog ces bgyi ba nas gong na ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni zad par
28b8: bgyir rngo mi thog pa'i slad du lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems
29a1: dpa'i sems ni zad par byar mi nus so/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
29a2: la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs gang gis na/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zad par byar mi nus/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang
29a3: gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin pa na de thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs nas sbyin par byed de/ de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
29a4: po'i sems zad par bya ba 'am/ zil gyis gnan par mi nus so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ skyes bu tshong ba zhi gzong 'bum phrag mang po spyod cing / de tshad byed la/ tshong ba des tshong dpon nas/ ded dpon
29a5: gang yang rung ba las lo 'bum phrag mang po zhig nas sbyin po blangs pa las/ de'i tshong ma rungs par gyur nas/ des rgyal po la bskor te rgyal po'i gan du song ngo // de rgyal po'i dpung des na rgyal pos yongs su
29a6: bzung ba'i mi de la/ / tshong dpon de de dang / ded dpon des tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar de dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs 'di lta ste/ rgyal po'i phyogs dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs de la
29a7: rten pa'i phyir ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du/ dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni dpung dang ldan
29a8: pa'i phyogs la rten to/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyogs dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs de la rten pas na/ de nyan thos thams cad kyis zil gyis gnan par mi nus so//
29b1: tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ skyes bu rgyal po la rten pa ni longs spyod zad par gyur kyang / 'on kyang tshugs par mi nus pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen/
29b2: panyid kyi phyogs la rten pa yang / 'di ltar nyan thos thams cad dang / bdud thams cad kyis mi tshugs so// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i nyan thos thams cad
29b3: kyis tshugs par 'gyur/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gal te nyan thos kyis 'am// rang sangs rgyas kyis sgrogs shing 'chang ba na/ de'i sems stod cing bdag kyang de ltar gyur cig ces sems
29b4: bskyed na/ nyan thos rnams kyis tshugs pa yinan// gang de'i gtam gyi myang bar byed pa dang / de la yang dag par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa bskyed pa des
29b5: na tshugs par 'gyur ro/ / spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/ de dag la tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
29b6: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gegs byed pa yin te/ 'di dag skyeng bar byed pa ma yin la/ 'di dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring bar byed pa yin te/ de bas na 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul
29b7: bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bya bar 'dod cing / yang dag pa la nges par 'jug par 'dod
29b8: pa'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug kun du 'byung ba ni dgra bcom pa nyid ring bar byed pa yin te/ de dag de'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po nga bzhin du
30a1: byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
30a2: dang ldan pa'i yid labyed pa rnams gags byed pa yin ta la sa byed pa dag bskyed na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos rnams kyis zil gyis non pa yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
30a3: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos rnams kyis zil gyis non pa yin te/ gang nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa skyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o//
30a4: ci'i phyir zhan/ yid la byed pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i grangs su mi chud pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/ rgyun du zhugs pa nyon mongs pa kun du spyod na sbyin gnas su
30a5: mi 'gyur te/ gal te gang gis de'i nyon mongs pa rnams spong ba'i shes pa thob na/ des de rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya bar rab tu bye ba yin gyi/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin te/ de ltar na shes pa
30a6: yongs su shes pa dang / spong ba la 'dres pas de rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang ldan pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems
30a7: kun du spyod cing skye bas/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes rab tu phye ba ma yin gyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las brtsams pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag skye bas/ 'di lta ste/
30a8: de byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar rab tu phye ba yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas na tshugs par mi nus so// tshe dang ldan pa dper na/ 'phong gi slob dpon ni gnas na 'dug
30b1: kyang rung / 'gro yang rung / dgra rnams kyis tshugs par dka' ba yin te/ gzhan gyi mnga' yang gcad cing bdag kyang spang ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bud bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
30b2: kyi sems la gnas pa'i yang chags par dka'o/ / nyan thos kyi spyod pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa thos na yang / 'di ltar bdag kyang myur ba nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
30b3: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa da ltar nyan thos rnams las chos ston pa de bzhin
30b4: du/ bdag kyang nyan thos rnams la chos ston par gyur cig ces yongs su sngo bar byed do// tshe dang ldan pa de ltar na/ thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa la
30b5: chags par mi nus te/ nyan thos kyi gtam 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam thos na yang / chos kyi gtam 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa las byung ngo zhes de bzhin gshegs pa dran par byed do// na pas rnams
30b6: pa chags pa mi bskyed do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa ni thub par dka' ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa dper na/ rnal 'byor pa nal
30b7: 'byor spyod pa dmigs pa thob cing / ting nge 'dzin lags par bsgoms pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis mi tshugs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dmigs pa de la rab tu goms pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du byang chub
30b8: sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa yang thub par dka'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba'i phyir ro// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gal te byang chub sems dpa'
31a1: thub par dka' bar rig par byan/ / theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa gang dag yin pa rnams dang / phyir mi ldog pa gang dag yin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa gang dag yin pa thams cad
31a2: dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang thub par dka' ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dam bcas pa las bskyod mi nus te/ de ltar na byang chub
31a3: sems dpa' dam bcas pa la gnas pa dang / byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa de dag ni thams cad kyang thub par dka' ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ltar mngon par rdzogs
31a4: par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa lo bye ba brgya phrag mang po nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ bzhugs shing gzhes pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// tshe dang
31a5: ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub
31a6: sems dpa' tha ma'i sems thob pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod la byed pa rnams kyis mnyam mo// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di dag ji ltar khyad par med/
31a7: smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi sems la ni khyad par med de/ 'on kyang mgyogs bral gyis ni khyad par yod do// sems de gnyis ga ni mnyam ste/ gang zhe na/ byang chub tu mngon par bsgrub pa gang
31a8: dag yin pa rnams so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems la gnas pa ni mi ldog go/ dgra bcom pa gang dgra bcom pa nyid las ldog la/ zag pa med pa'i sems las kyang ldog na/ de dgra
31b1: bcom pa nyid du rig par bya 'am/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ni ma yin no// de ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin par rig par bya'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems
31b2: dpa' byang chub sems dpa' sems las phyir ldog pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub tu khas 'che bar zad de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin gyi/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sun 'byin pa yin te/ de ni byang chub sems
31b3: dpa' zhes bya bar rig par bya ba ma yin no/ / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bud de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ mi zhig po mtshan dang ldan par gyur te/ dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa
31b4: las/ phyis de'i pho mtshan med par gyur la/ pho mtshan gyi bya ba byed mi nus na/ de ni ma ning zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems rmugs pa ni byang chub sems
31b5: dpa' zhes bya ba'i grangs su mi 'gro'o/ / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa las byang chub sems dpa' yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa shA
31b6: ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa yid la byed pa ji lta bu bskyed
31b7: par bya/ smras pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa bskyed par bya'o// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la gnas pa yin no// de ltar gnas pa'i byang chub sems
31b8: dpa' ni sbyin pa de thams cad/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed do// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to// gal te de ltar yongs su sngo bar
32a1: mi byed na/ de ni sbyin pa yin gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang sbyin pa sbyin pa na rnam par rtog pa ste/ bdag gis chung zad ni
32a2: yongs su btang la/ chung zad ni yongs su ma btang ngo zhes rnam par rtog par byed cing 'di ni bdag gis sbyin par bya/ 'di ni sbyin par mi bya'o// 'di la ni sbyin/ 'di la ni mi sbyin no zhes rnam par rtog par byed de/ ngan pa ni sbyin
32a3: par bya/ bzang po ni sbyin par mi bya/ tshul khrims can la ni sbyin par bya/ tshul khrims 'chal pa la ni sbyin par mi bya'o// zhes rnam par rtog par byed na/ rnam par rtog pa 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad
32a4: mkhyen pa nyid la bar chad byed pa yin no/ / de ltar rnam par rtog pa ni yun ring mo zhig gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// bdag yun ring mo zhig gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur/
32a5: grang zhes rnam par rtog par mi bya'o// thams cad la mnyam par gtong zhing sems mnyam pa ni myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang
32a6: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ / sbyin pa zil gyis mnan te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
32a7: pa ni/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la zan byin la/ zan zos pa'i 'og tu sems can de dag la gser gyi dong tse dang / ras bcos bu zung dang / gser thags
32a8: can gyi ras byin la/ de bzhin du nyi ma gung ba dang / phye ma red dang / de bzhin du mtshan mo nam gyi cha stod dang / de bzhin du nam gyi gung dang / de bzhin du nam gyi cha smad gyi thun la/ sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la
32b1: zan gyin / de bzhin du ston pa yang sbyin te/ bskal pa gang shA'i kA gi bya ma skang du gnas gang / dbazhan du yangs su gting yang skar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sangs su bsdu bar byab ma shes na/ dan/
32b2: sbyin pa yin gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma yin no// ji ste yongs su bsngo ba shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no// de ni byang chub sems dpa'i thang na ma
32b3: du yongs su gtod pa ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de chos tshad med pa'i chos thob par 'dod cing / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyang thob par 'dod na/ tshad dang ldan pa'i yongs su gtong bas thams
32b4: cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/ / gal te sbyin pa de tshad nges par gyur na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi/ gang gi phyir sbyin pa de tshad nges pa ma yin pa de'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par
32b5: 'gyur ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshad nges pa ma yin pa'i sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// de nas phyis kyang yongs su gtang bar bya'o// zhes de ltar yongs su gtang bar bya
32b6: ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni thabs des na/ ser sna tshar gcod cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to// de yang 'di ltar bdag gis sbyin pa dpag tu med pa sbyin par bya ste/ gang gi tshe bla na med pa
32b7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du sbyin par bya'o/ / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang zang zing
32b8: med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas/ sems can rnams la phan gdags par bya'o// da ltar ni ji srid du byang chub tu spyod pa'i bar du zang zing gis phan gdags par bya'o// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
33a1: chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na ni/ zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas/ sems can rnams la phan gdags par bya'o// snyam du sems skyed do// tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/
33a2: mi zhig rgyal po la rten te/ de rgyal po la rten cing 'khor la bsnyen bkur byas pas/ rgyal po des de la zan sbyin zhing / des zang zing gi sbyin pas phan 'dogs te/ des bstan cing bskor te/ bsnyen bkur
33a3: byas pas rgyal po mnyes shing dgyes par gyur nas/ rin po che brgya stong du ma bskon pa de bzhin du/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
33a4: rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas kyang / byang chub tu ni spyod pa na/ sems can dpag tu med pa la zad zing gi sbyin pas phan 'dogs shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
33a5: par sangs rgyas nas kyang / zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas/ sems can rnams la 'doms shing / rjes su ston te sems can dpag tu med pa dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams las grol bar byed do// tshe dang
33a6: ldan pa gang po dper na/ rgyal po'i bu zhig yod la/ mi mang po gang dag gis rgyal po'i bu de la bsten cing bskor te/ bsnyen bkur byed na/ rgyal po'i bu de sbyin pa'i mide dag thams cad la kha zas g.yos
33a7: pas phan 'dogs par byed de/ ji tsam na rgyal po'i bu de rgyal srid la gnas pa'i dus la bab ste/ rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur zhing / rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa'i tshe/ de'i mi zham ring snyed du gyur pa gang
33a8: yin pa de dag la/ 'di dag ni bdag gzhon nu'i sa la gnas pa na/ bdag gis sbyangs shing bdag gir byas pa yin/ bdag kyang 'di dag gis sbyangs shing bdag gir byas pa yin gyis/ bdag gis mi
33b1: 'di dag longs spyod la ci rigs par dgod do snyam ste/ des bdag gi 'khor rnams kha cig ni/ grong khyer dag tu snga bor bcug/ kha cig ni las kyi sna dag tu/ kha cig ni tshod dus dag tu/ kha cig ni 'or gyi
33b2: grong dag tu bskos/ kha cig la ni grong dam pa longs spyod du byin no// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
33b3: rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas kyang / byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na sems can dpag tu med pa dag la phan 'dogs te/ zang zing gi sbyin pa gos dang zas dang / mal cha dang stan dang / nad gsos dang / sman zod
33b4: dag gis phan 'dogs te/ ji ltar rgyal po gzhon nu nges/ 'khor de dag kha zas g.yos pa dang / bza' ba dang / bca' ba ci 'byor pa dag gis phan 'dogs pa de bzhin du/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems
33b5: dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pas kyang / sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pas phan 'dogs shing / gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
33b6: par gyur te/ bdud rtsi'i dbang bskur ba thob pa na/ blo ji lta ba dang / shes rab ji lta ba bzhin du zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas 'doms shing rjes su ston to// zang zing med pa'i chos kyis 'doms shing rjes
33b7: su ston pa na/ kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid la 'gong / kha cig ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la/ kha cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la/ kha cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la/ kha cig ni bzod pa'i
33b8: sa la 'god/ kha cig ni mthong ba'i sa la 'god/ kha cig ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji ltar rgyal po'i bu de gang gi tshe/ rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob par gyur pa
34a1: de'i tshe/ rten pa'i mi de dag ci rigs par longs spyod la 'god pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
34a2: sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams ji ltar mos pa bzhin du 'god par byed de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/ sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin zhing / blan
34a3: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god par byed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems
34a4: dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur la/ yongs
34a5: su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ mi zhig rgyal po la sten te/ bsnyen bkur byed na/ de'i tshe rgyal po des zas dang gos kyi bgo skal byin nas
34a6: gang gi tshe mi des rgyal po de la shas cher bsten pa de'i tshe/ rgyal po de mnyes shing dgyes par gyur te/ de thugs rangs par gyur nas/ gos dang rgyan brgya stong du ma bskon te/ longs spyod kyis rgyas par byed do// tshe dang
34a7: ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas kyang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/ sems can
34a8: dpag tu med pa rnams la sbyin pas phan 'dogs par byed cing / de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas/ sems can
34b1: rnams la 'dogs shing rjes su ston te/ 'khor ba las grol bar byed do// de skad ces smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
34b2: ti'i bus ji ltar bshad pa de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa dper na/ mi gang dag gser gyi 'byung 'ad de'i nye na kor na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni/ gser gyi 'byung khung des rnams kyang nye bar mi 'tsho bar ma
34b3: 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe gsar du bsgos shing byung nas ring por ma lon pa de'i tshe yang / sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe shin du dri ma med par byas shing shin du sbyangs nas snying por byas
34b4: te phyung ba de'i tshe yang / sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin no// gang gi tshe 'brur khung de nas bzhus te/ de nas sum cha'am/ bzhi cha gser du gyur pa de'i tshe yang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin no//
34b5: dang ldan pa shA ra dwa tI'i bu de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang / rnams kyang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'thob ma yin par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na yang nye bar 'a
34b6: ba yin/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par 'dod pa na yang / sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa' blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
34b7: rgyas pa na yang / sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tshe ba yin/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na yang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/ rgyu 'di dag ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la
34b8: med do/ / rgyu des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mchog ces bya/ gtso bo dang / phul dang / rab dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na phod pa zhes bya'o//
35a1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa dang / theg pa chen po
35a2: la zhugs pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa rdzogs pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa 'di/ gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bus ji skad bshad pa bzhin du zung shig/
35a3: chongs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
35a4: bo dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / sbyin pa'i pha rol/
35a5: tu phyin pa'i le'u dgu pa ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs s+ho// // bam po gsum pa// // 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed
35a6: kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan
35a7: par gyur pa/ sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin du rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par
35a8: kun du sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad la dbang dam pa'i pha rol du son pa sha stag dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas
35b1: 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ gzhan yang gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
35b2: nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing / mdun gyis bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di dag
35b3: nyid las brtsams nas 'khor bzhi po dag la chos ston to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med
35b4: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa las brtsams te/ khyod spobs par gyis shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
35b5: ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das las skabs phye ba thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston to//
35b6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan par rig par bya//
35b7: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims 'chal par rig par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul ni gang yin/ spyod yul ma yin pa ni gang yin de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA
35b8: ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di la gal te byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa rnams
36a1: kyis gnas na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'o// de ltar byud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul khrims 'chal ba yin par rig par bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems
36a2: dpa'i spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod pa'o/ / 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin na/ byang chub sems
36a3: dpa'i dam bcas pa spong ngo / / byang chub sems dpa'i dam bcas pa spong na/ tshul khrims 'chal pa yin par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyinapa
36a4: na nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo na/ spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod do// spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod na/ de tsam gyis na/ tshul khrims 'chal bar rig par bya'o// gal te byang chub
36a5: sems dpa' khyim na gnas shing / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod pa tsam gyis ni/ de tshul khrims 'chal bar rig par bya ba ma yin gyi/ gang sbyin pa sbyin zhing nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar//
36a6: yongs su bsngo na/ de tsam gyis na tshul khrims 'chal pa yin par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na rgyal pos gdams pa'i tshig bzhin du byed pa zhig yod la/ rgyal rigs rnams kyi rgyal po'i bus
36a7: bslab par byas bzo' gnas/ 'di ltar glang po che'i gnya' bar bzhon pa 'am/ rta bzhon pa 'am/ shing rta bzhon pa 'am/ ral gri'i thabs sam/ 'phod dam/ mnga' bo che 'phang ba'i thabs sam/ brgyug pa 'am/
36a8: bgom pa 'am/ mchod pa 'am/ stobs 'gyed pa'am/ dgra thabs sam/ de la sogs pa'i bzo de dag la slob na/ rgyal po la dben pa yin te/ rgyal po yang smra dbab par mi sems so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po
36b1: de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rtse zhing dga' la/ dga' dgur spyod du zin kyang / byang chub sems dpa' de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
36b2: la phan 'dogs pa nyid du gyur pa yin no/ / gal te yang sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo na/ de tsam gyis na spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod pa yin te/ bdag nyid thams cad
36b3: mkhyen pa'ang ba zhing du mi rung bar byed de/ ji lta ji ltar bdag nyid zhing du mi rung bar byed pa de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to// ji lta ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs
36b4: su mi 'dzin pa de lta de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod pa yin no// de'i spyod yul ma yin pa gang yin pa de nyid ni/ de'i tshul khrims 'chal pa
36b5: yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gal te khyim gyi gnas nas byung bar gyur te/ de yang tshul khrims gang dang gang yang dag par gzung nas gnas pa de yang thams cad mkhyen pa
36b6: nyid du yongs su mi bsngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa ma yin no// gang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o//
36b7: gal te byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas shing / gsum la skyabs su song bar gyur la/ de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/ de 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan rnams la longs spyod du zin kyang /
36b8: de tsam gyis na de byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims la gnas pa/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims la gnas pa de ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
37a1: tu byin pa dang ma bral ba yin no/ / gang tshul thams kyi ba rab tu phyin pa dang sa bral ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral zhes bya'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'dod pa dang ldan pang
37a2: tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa rnams 'byung du zin kyang / de dag thams cad de'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byed pa'i sems cig gis zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan
37a3: yang nor bu rin po che be dUr+ya ni/ 'ching bu'i nor bu 'bum dag dang lhan cig tu bsres te bzhag na/ nor bu rin po che be dUr+ya'i rin thang med pa dang / kha dog bzang po dang 'od kyis mching bu'i nor bu de dag
37a4: thams cad zil gyis gnon to/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa de dag thams cad kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang
37a5: ldan pa'i sems gcig bskyed pas zil gyis non par rig par bya ste/ ji ltar mching bu'i nor bu de dag nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya gcig gis zil gyis non cing lam mer ma gyur pa bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa gang
37a6: bo gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' mtshan ma rnams 'dod cing sbyin pa sbyin na/ spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod pa'o// gang de'i spyod yul ma yin pa thams cad ni 'chal ba'i tshul khrims yin par rig
37a7: par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpas mtshan sa rnams 'dod pas sbyin pa sbyin par mi bya'i/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dod pas sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la thams cad
37a8: mkhyen pa nyid yod pa de la ni mtshan rnams yod do/ / de la ni mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// de la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad rnams yod pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du yod de
37b1: de ltar na de'i sbyin pa ni mchog tu bzung ba ma yin no/ / gang gi tshe mchog tu ma bzung ba de'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
37b2: gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dod pas sbyin pa sbyin par byed na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mchog tu 'dzin pa ma yin na/ gang dag gang la mchog tu 'dzin pa de nyid/ de'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs
37b3: mchog tu 'dzin pa yin no/ / sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni yul na gnas pa 'am/ phyogs na gnas pa ma yin no// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni gzugs sam/ tshor ba 'am/ 'du
37b4: shes sam/ 'du byed rnams sam/ rnam par shes pa yang ma yin no// 'dus byas kyang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas kyang ma yin/ tshad yod pa yang ma yin te/ de ni mchog tu bzung bar mi nus so// chos gang yang
37b5: dmigs su med de/ gang dmigs su med pa de ni yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin te/ gang yod pa'ang ma yin/ med pa'ang ma yin pa ni mchog tu gzung bar mi nus so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de lta bas
37b6: na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin nam/ tshul khrims bsrung shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/ tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ma yin no//
37b7: gal te yang tshul khrims de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo na/ tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims las nyams
37b8: pa yin no/ / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar nyams pa phyir bslang bar nus sam/ smras pa/ gal te yang dag pa'i bza don sum du ma byas la gal te bden pa rnams ma mthong
38a1: na phyir yang bslang bar nus so/ / yang smras pa/ 'di la tshe dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ yang
38a2: dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi bya'o/ / smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ smras pa/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa ni
38a3: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i bskal pa med pa'i phyir ro/ / gal te de chos nub par gyur pa'i tshe byung na ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// tshe dang
38a4: ldan pa gang po chu 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par mgyur gyi bar du yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byar ma gnang ngo / / tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems
38a5: dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ tshul khrims de sems can thams cad la phan bdags pa'i phyir mngon par mi sgrub na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin
38a6: pa ma yin no/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems can tshad yod pa rnams kyi ched du sbyin pa sbyin nam/ tshul khrims srung na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
38a7: 'dzin pa ma yin no/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims gang yin/ smras pa/ sbyin pa
38a8: gang dang gang dang sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims srung ba de thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims so// gal te yang byang chub
38b1: sems dpa' bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ tshul khrims bsgom pa'i phyir spyod la/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su mi bsngon/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin no// gal
38b2: te nyan thos nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid du yang yongs su mi bsngon/ de ltar na yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin te/ des tshul khrims 'chal bar yang mi brtsi'o// gal te nyan thos kyi
38b3: sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngon/ de tsam gyis ni/ de tshul khrims 'chal ba zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ tshedad
38b4: ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gang yin/ smras pa/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa rnams te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
38b5: sems dpa' chen po'i spyod yul lo/ / gal te byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du khyim na gnas te/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la ston cing longs spyod la/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
38b6: sangs rgyas kyi sar yang sems mi skyed na/ de tsam gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims 'chal ba zhes mi brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar 'dis 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam
38b7: pa ma dkrugs pa'i phyir ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ mi la la zhig nyes pa med par btson rar bcug ste/ de btson ra der lo mang po lo brgya phrag mang po/ lo 'bum phrag mang por brtson rar bcug la/ de'i
38b8: lhag pa'i bsam pa yang 'khrugs par ma gyur/ des rkun po'i sems kyi des bskyed du zin kyang / de brtson rar bcug na/ de tsam gyis ni de rkun po zhes brjod pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa de bzhin du byang chub sems
39a1: dpa' de yang khyib na gnas shing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la yongs su 'angs spyod pa des/ tshul khrims 'chal ba zhes bya bar mi brjod do// gal te bskal pa gang gA'i klung ge bye ma rnyed du tshang
39a2: par spyad pa spyod la/ de yang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa yang / 'khrugs na de tsam gyis na de tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes mi bya'o//
39a3: gang gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan thos kyi tshul khrims la gnas na/ de byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'gal ba'i phyir ro//
39a4: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las le'u dang po'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar bskal pa mtha' yas par mtshams sbyar cing 'khor bar byas la/ thams cad
39a5: mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos/ tshe dang ldan shwa ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe
39a6: dang ldan pa shA ra ti'i bus gal te 'di ltar bskal pa 'di snyed kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o/ / zhes tshad nges par byed par gyur na/ 'di la nyes pa ci yod/ spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di la byang
39a7: chub sems dpa' gang 'khor bas skrag cing rings te/ de rings pas dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa yang tshad yod pa nyid du gyur te/ de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gnyis su 'gyur
39a8: par shes par bya ste/ tshad yod pas ni sems can tshad med pa rnams kyi don bya bar mi nus so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad med grangs med pas na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams
39b1: cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa ma gtogs par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba med do/ / gal te bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang da rung sbyin pa'i pha rol/
39b2: byiphyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur te/ mtha' yas pa'i phyir na/ de'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
39b3: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas ji lta ji ltar shin du yun ring por mtshams sbyor zhing / 'khor ba de lta de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa legs par yongs su sgom par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan
39b4: pa gang po dper na/ snod sar ba sman gyi khu ba'i chus bkang ste bzhag na/ ji lta ji ltar bzhag pa de lta de ltar shin du bgos pa dang / shin du sra bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
39b5: sems dpa' chen po yang ji lta ji ltar shin du yun ring por mtshams sbyor zhing / 'khor ba de lta de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa legs par bsgoms shing ches brtan par 'gyur ba dang / ljing bzod par 'gyur
39b6: ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ bum pa sar ba'i nang du mar ram til mar bzhag na/ ji lta ji ltar shin du yun ring du bzhag pa de lta de ltar bum pa de snga ma dang ldan par 'gyur te/ bum pa de sngam gyis khyab par
39b7: ma gyur pa chung zad kyang med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ji lta ji ltar shin du yun ring por mtshams sbyor zhing / 'khor ba de lta de ltar sangs rgyas
39b8: rnams dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang / phrad pa thob par 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang / phrad pa thob pa de de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa thos so// ji lta ji ltar
40a1: pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa sgom mo/ / jig ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de lta de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang po jis ji ltar byang chub
40a2: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems gang dang gang bskyed pa de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa bskyed de/ sems gzhan dag skye ba'i go skabs mi 'byed do// gang gi tshe sems gzhan skye ba'i go skabs
40a3: mi rnyed pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po rnams kyis sems kyi rgyud yongs su bsgoms pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na mar gyi bum pa ni gang
40a4: dang gang na bzung yang / de dang dmar gyi dri dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems gang dang gang skye ba de dag thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa nyid
40a5: skye bar 'gyur ro/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la ni bdud sdig can gyis glags btsal kyang glags mi rnyedade/ de ni dmigs pa gang las glags tshol ba'i dmigs pa de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
40a6: sgom par byed pa'i phyir te/ de bzhin du bdud kyi ris rnams kyis kyang glags mi rnyed do// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar shin du yun ring por mtshams sbyor
40a7: ba de lta de ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang phrad ba 'thob par 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang / 'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang phrad pa 'thob pa de lta de ltar pha rol du byin
40a8: pa rnams thos par 'gyur ro/ / ji lta ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa rnams bos pa de lta de ltar/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing sgom mo// ji lta ji ltar nan tan byed cing sgom pa de lta de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar
40b1: 'gyur ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni pha rol tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa na// thog ma kho nar sems dang sems las thung ba'i chos rnams 'byung ba/ tshul khrims dang
40b2: ldan par 'gyur la/ de nas de'i 'og tu pha rol tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go// de ltar yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngon/ rigs kyi bu dang
40b3: rigs kyi bu mo tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa gang yin pa de/ byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// gal te nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag
40b4: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'doms la/ gtams pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngon/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gang de la 'doms pa de/ byang chub sems dpas
40b5: zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ mi la la gser gyi mi khyer te 'gro na/ khyer ba gang yin pa de nyid gser gyi mis kha
40b6: dog dang / dbyibs dang / 'od kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du gal te nyan thos gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 'doms na
40b7: nyan thos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/
40b8: mi zhig gis shel gyi mi pang bar thogs te 'gron// khyer ba gang yin pa/ de nyid shel gyi mis/ kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / 'od kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du stong gsum
41a1: gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi gang dag yin pa de dag gi bye ma snyed kyi nyan thos ni yod par gyur la/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
41a2: 'doms shing rjes su ston na/ de dag thams cad des tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bsngo bas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar de dag 'doms pa de lta de ltar nyan
41a3: thos rnams zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ / gal te bskal pa gang 'ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug ste/ nyan thos de dag byang chub sems dpa' la 'doms shing rjes su ston na/ de tsam du byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul
41a4: khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'bogs la/ 'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas/ nyan thos rnams ni zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ gser ni ji lta ji ltar bzhu
41a5: zhing bskol ba de lnga de ltar ches 'od gsal zhing / ches kha dog bzang por 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du ji lta ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
41a6: byin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ / ji lta ji ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'as
41a7: 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya
41a8: ni ji lta ji ltar nor bu'i byi dor mkhan 'chang ba de lta de ltar ches 'od gsal ba dang / shin du yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gis/ ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul
41b1: khrims kyi pha rol tu byin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin du yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ / ji lta ji ltar shin du yongs su dag par gyur ba de sngar
41b2: ltar byang chub sems dpas 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir nyan thos rnams zil gyis non par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper ning mo khananas
41b3: ri moms gyi slob ma shin du lobs pas kha dog sna lnga'i tshon gyis ji lta ji ltar kha dog dang / dbyibs su gzugs 'dri zhing tshon bkye ste/ rdzogs par byed cing tshan byed pa de lta de ltar yid du 'ong zhing chags
41b4: par byed par 'gyur te/ gang gis gzugs rnams bris pa de nyid kha dog dang / dbyibs kyis zil gyis non par 'gyuraro// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du gal te nyan thos dpag tu med pas/ byang chub sems
41b5: dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar yongs su dag par 'gyur/ de lta de ltar byang chub sems
41b6: dpas ni nyan thos rnams zil gyis gnon cing snang bar byed de/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas/ de dag thams cad zil gyis gnon to// byang chub
41b7: sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni nyin gcig bzhin du rnam par 'phel lo/ / de dag ni tshul khrims de tsam nyi tshe dang ldan pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ mi zhig gis shing bskur
41b8: la/ shing bskyed nas dus dus su byi dor byed cing chus bran na ji lta ji ltar byi dor byed cing chus zan pa de lta de ltar chu zhing dang 'bar du skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang po/ de bzhin du gal te nyan ces
42a1: dpag tu med pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 'dems shing rjes su ston na/ ji lta ji ltar nyan thos dpag tu med pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' la 'doms
42a2: shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'phel lo// ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'phel bde
42a3: lta de ltar byang chub sems dpas 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas nyan thos thams cad zil gyis gnon cing snang bar byas nas/ tshul khrims
42a4: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas gang dag de la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon
42a5: to/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ mi la la me chung ngu'i nang du rtswa dang / shing dang / lci ba rnams 'jug na/ de ji lta ji ltar 'jug pa de lta de ltar de'i rgyu las me de mched par 'gyur ro// ji lta ji ltar me de mched pa
42a6: de lta de ltar me'i phung po de shin du che bar 'gyur te/ des dpag tshad mang po/ dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po dang / dpag tshad stong phrag mang po rnams bsreg cing sdang bar byed do// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin
42a7: du gal te nyan thos dpag tu med pas/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston na/ ji lta ji ltar nyan thos dpag tu med pas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims
42a8: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba dpag tu med
42b1: par 'gyur ro/ / ji lta ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la snang ba dpag tu med pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'doms pa'i nyan thos gzhan gang yin pa dag gis
42b2: zil gyis non par mi 'gyur te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ mi zhig gis gser gyi 'byung khung nas gser blangs te/ des gser de blangs nas bdag nyid kyang
42b3: btsongs la/ gser de yang btsongs na/ des gser de btsongs pa'i rin ni ches phye ba yin gyi/ gang gis gser blangs pa'i mi de'i ni ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du ji/ ji ltar nyan thos dpag tu med
42b4: bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dpag tu med cing tshes rin thang med par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de la nyan thos de dag gis tshul khrims kyis kyang zil gyis non par mi 'gyur la/
42b5: byang chub sems dpas ni nyan thos de dag tshul khrims kyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur te/ 'di ltar thams
42b6: cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro/ / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag 'doms shing rjes su ston pa gang yin pa de nyid
42b7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos zil gyis gnon pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa
42b8: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pos bshad pa la mngon par rjes su yi rang nas tshe dang ldan pa de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
43a1: dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa yin no zhes smras so/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las le'u gnyis pa'o// / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus gzhan yang tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu
43a2: gang po la sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ gal te byed pa po'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par rjes su mthong na/ de byang chub sems
43a3: dpa'i chos la gnas par rig par bya ba ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos spong zhing tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas spyod do// de'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ de'i 'tshal ba'i tshul
43a4: khrims shes bya'o/ / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i gang byed pa po'i chos 'ga' yang / yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par blangs nas 'dug
43a5: na/ chos gang la tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa phan 'dogs pa 'am/ gnod par 'gyur/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos gang la yang phan 'dogs pa 'am/ gnod par byed pas
43a6: yin no/ / gal te chos 'ga' zhig la phan 'dogs pa 'am/ gnod pa byed par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa yin par rig par bya'o// gal te byang chub sems
43a7: dpas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos 'ga' la phan pa 'am/ gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par rjes su mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa
43a8: pa yin to/ / byed pa po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes bya ste/ tshul khrims de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyis
43b1: rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa gang dang gang yongs su btang nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang
43b2: ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims gang dang gang srung ba de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang
43b3: ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' pha rol gyis spyos sam/ brgyad bkag kyang rung ste/ bzod pa byed cing / bzod pa de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs
43b4: su bsngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi ched du rtsol
43b5: bar byed la/ brtson 'grus de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bsam
43b6: gtan gang dang gang skyed pa de bzhin du/ bsam gtan 'di dag bskyed nas/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// rdzu 'phrul des kyang sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug cing shes par bya'o// de
43b7: nas snod du gyur par bya'o snyam ste/ sems kyi khyad par de dag thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang
43b8: po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab gang dang gang la spyod cing / phung po la mkhas pa 'am/ khams la mkhas pa 'am/ skye mched la mkhas pa 'am/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa 'am// gnas
44a1: dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pa 'am/ mnyam pa nyid du'ang shes nas 'du shes thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o snyam ste/ sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
44a2: yongs su bsngo na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o// bla na med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan par rig par bya'o// gal te byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug thams cad
44a3: mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni nyan thos gang gis kyang tshul khrims kyis zil gyis gnon nus pa gang yang med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams
44a4: cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar
44a5: mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni//
44a6: theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po skyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang
44a7: gal te sems can thams cad byams pa la gnas par gyur/ snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la gnas par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de yang theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byeng
44a8: chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad stong pa nyid
44b1: kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang por zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul thams kyi brgya char yang nyes mang thob sa/
44b2: chu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang ldan par gyur na de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa
44b3: la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams
44b4: cad smon pa med pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang ldan par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang
44b5: nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad brgyad par gyur na/ de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub
44b6: sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces
44b7: smras so/ / gal te tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bdag gi dri ba dris pa lan gdab pa'i skabs phye na/ tshe dang ldan pa la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig 'dri'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po dris shig dang thos pa'i don brda
44b8: sprad par bya'o/ / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji gzugs brgyad pa yin par 'dod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
45a1: brgyad pa yin par 'dod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ni ma yin no// smras pa de las gzhan pa'i chos rnams la brgyad par 'dod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ni ma yin no// smras pa/ tshed
45a2: ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'on brgyad pa de gang yin par 'dong / bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bshad pa'i don de ji lta bur shes par bya/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po chos 'di rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid
45a3: sems can thams cad kyis mi shes pa de la shes pa gang gis mnyam pa nyid de mngon sum du byed pa'i shes pa de ni bya ba byas pa'i phyir thob pa yin te/ de la brgyad pa ni yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // gal te
45a4: gnas 'di rnyed na ni mnyam pa nyid shes pa 'di la brtag cing brgal ba med do/ / smras pa/ 'di skad du brgyad pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba
45a5: nas chu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o zhes kyang zer na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la snga ma dang byim dang byim dang / snga ma ji ltar 'thun par 'gyur/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po brgyad pa'i tshul khrims gang yin
45a6: pa de byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o zhes bya ba de ni ji ltar las dang po pa la bshad pa de ltar stan to/ / ci nas sems can rnams 'jug par 'gyur
45a7: ba de ltar bstan to/ / ci nas skye bo mang pos go bar 'gyur ba de ltar bstan to// ci nas theg pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'bar bar 'gyur ba de ltar bstan to// brgyad pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg
45a8: pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang rgyun du zhugs pa
45b1: thams cad dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba thams cad dang / phyir mi 'ong ba thams cad dang / dgra bcom pa thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
45b2: dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang nyan thos gang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims zil gyis
45b3: gnan par sems pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims zil gyis gnan par 'dod par zad de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang rtsod par sems su zad do// tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na gang rgyal po'i bu dang
45b4: cod par sems pa de ni/ rgyal po dang rtsod par sems par zad do// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims zil gyis gnan par sems pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul
45b5: khrims zil gyis gnan par sems par zad do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thub par dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na mi la la zhig
45b6: rkang lag med par gyur la 'di skad du/ bdag 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol gyi 'gram du mchod par bya'o// zhes zer na de skad zer ba de la mi de ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis nga rgyal byed de bla bar rig par bya'o// tshe dang
45b7: ldan pa gang po de bzhin du nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas gang 'di skad du/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims zil gyis gnan par bya'o// zhes zer na tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di ltar de ni bla mar rig par
45b8: bya'o/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni rgya mtsho dug can pa dang 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir ro// ji ltar mi de rkar lag rnams med bzhin du rgya mtsho la mchod par 'dod pa de bzhin
46a1: ru/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams med bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims zil gyis non par 'gyur ba de ni gnas
46a2: med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na byang chub sems
46a3: dpa' rnams tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa dpag tu med pa dag 'chal ba'i tshul khrims las yongs su dgrol bar 'dod pa dang /
46a4: tshul khrims la dgod par 'dod pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ 'chal ba'i tshul khrims shes bya ba de gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ smras pa/ 'di lta ste/ 'chal ba'i tshul
46a5: khrims shes bya ba ni ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yid 'dzin pa dang / dmigs pa'i 'du shes dang / sems can du 'du shes pa dang / srog du 'du shes pa dang / gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang / yod par 'du shes pa dang /
46a6: med par 'du shes pa'i tshig bla dgas te/ nyon mongs pa de dag dang gzhan rnams yod na 'chal ba'i tshul khrims shes bya ba rab tu phye'o// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
46a7: can dpag tu med pa rnams tshul khrims la dgod par 'dod cing theg pa 'di la zhugs te/ tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa de ni nyan thos rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas rnams zil gyis gnon
46a8: par sla ba ma yin no/ / byang chub sems dpas ni 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ming tsam gyis kyang nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs
46b1: rgyas rnams zil gyis gnon to/ / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu zag pa dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims kyis zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ji ltar zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/ smras pa/ tshe dang
46b2: ldan pa gang po 'di la zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ni bdag nyid la phan pa'i phyir bskyed pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims ni sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi ched du yongs su
46b3: bsngos pa yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyis zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims zil gyis gnon to// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims
46b4: tshad des pa zhig sgrub tu zin na ni/ zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyang zil gyis non par mi 'gyur la/ de'i tshul khrims kyang pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ gang gi phyir sems can dpag
46b5: tu med pa rnams kyi ched du yongs su bsngo ba de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims des zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na nyi ma'i
46b6: dkyil 'khor 'char ba na srog chags kyi rigs srin bu me khyer thams cad kyi 'od zil gyis gnond do/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
46b7: yongs su bsngos pas kyang gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang / kun du rgu dang / gcer bu pa la sogs pa nas 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bar rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi 'od kyang
46b8: zil gyis gnon to/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba na skar ma'i gzugs thams cad kyi 'od zil gyis gnon to// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
47a1: tshul khrims thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pas kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims zil gyis gnon to// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi tshe byang chub sems
47a2: dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi khyad par yang skyed na/ rang gi spyod yul la spyod pas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi
47a3: rol tu phyin pa thob pa yin par rig par bya'o/ / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi skyed pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la ji skad ces bya/ smras pa/
47a4: tshe dang ldan pa gang po de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems kyi rgyud lung du ma bstan pa la gnas pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o// gal te nyan thos nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid du
47a5: yongs su bsngo na ni de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rang gi spyod yul spong ba yin no/ / gal te lhag pa'i bsam pa nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngos pa zhig yin na ni de tsam gyis na byang chub
47a6: sems dpa' ro dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/ sgyum mkhan nam/ sgra ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pas byis pa zhig bzung la sdong po la bskyon te bskyon nas dum bur rlags te sa la
47a7: gtor na byis pa de'i mdza' dang / nye du dang / sdug gi gnyen mtshams gang dag yin pa de dag byis pa 'di ni shi ste/ byin cad mi mthong ngo snyam nas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur te/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po dang ldan
47a8: par 'gyur ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar byis pa ma shi ba de la shi ba'i 'du shes bskyed pa de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che las nyams te/ nyan thos
47b1: kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa yang shi ba ji lta ba bzhin du rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang pos tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// ci byang chub sems dpa'i tshul
47b2: khrims gang yin pa dang / nyan thos kyi tshul khrims gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims gang yin pa'i tshul khrims 'di dag la tha dad du dbye bar 'dod dam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po chos
47b3: nyid dang / de bzhin nyid ji lta ba bzhin du na ni tha dad du dbye bar chung zad kyang mi 'dod do// smras pa/ 'o na ji ltar tha dad du dbye bar 'dod/ smras pa/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
47b4: pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims tha dad du dbye bar 'dod do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyis byis pa so so'i skye bo thams/
47b5: cad dang / nyan thos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims zil gyis gnon te/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po
47b6: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams zil gyis mnan cing spa bkod nas gnas pa'i phyir ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des 'dir sems can
47b7: rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims ni mchog ces bya/ gtso bo dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa zhes bya'o//
47b8: tshe dang ldan pa gang po de per na/ ri'i rgyal po gangs ri la ri'i rgyal po'i yon tan gang dag yod pa de dag ni ri gzhan dag la med de/ des na ri rnams kyi nang na ri'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ming thob ste/ ri'i rgyal po gangs
48a1: ris ni/ ri'i rgyal po gangs ri zhes bya ba'i ming thob bo// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du nyan thos kyi tshul khrims dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngod
