115b1: ces bka sas te/ / rin can byen lnga pa 'di dag na byang chub sems dpa' yan yangs su srung bas/ lnga gang nan/ 'das ste/ lus mi dmigs pa dang / sems tha migs pa dang / mun pam mang pang nan pa med padang /
115b2: rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa dang / len pa po rnams la rnam par smin pa med pa'o// rin chen byin zin po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas rtag tu mngon par bya ba ste/ bzhig zha na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi te
115b3: 'dzin dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / bdag gi las kyi rnam par smin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal khye'u den
115b4: chen byin 'di bskal pa sum bcun bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs
115b5: su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stobs dang grags pa don yod pa zhes bya bar 'jig rten du
115b6: 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de'i khor du 'dus pa yang mtha' yas par 'gyur te/ thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go/ de dag kyang 'od mtha' yas pa dang / tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom
115b7: ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar bzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpyi
115b8: spyod pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ chos nyid kyi skye bo zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bsod snyoms bzhes nas gshegs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de
116a1: dam pa/ byas nas/ byang chub mas da dzi na ldan dang / thams ca dang na pa yo dadang / dang / medang / snyam yi dang ma ba sa ga nas dngas te/ bcomasan sa
116a2: gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen pa'i med/ rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po do na mdza dang / pradz+was rba dang / chu chen gyi lo rnas
116a3: ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bskur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ / / rgya gar skad du/ Ad+ya thA ga ta gur+Na dz+nyA na a tsin t+ya ga ya a ba tA ra nir deg nA ma ma hA yAn su ra/ bdog da du/ 'phags pa de bzhin/
116a4: gshegs pa'i yon tan dang ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
116a5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na chos kyi dbye dgon pa byang chub kyi snying po kun du 'od kyi khang bzangs bsod nams kyi rgyan gyi tshogs chen po bsags pa/ dga' ba chen po skyed pa/ kun nas ma/
116a6: smad pa/ yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa na bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ legs par thugs su chud pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ kun du spyod pa
116a7: gnyis mi mnga' ba/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la mchog tu gzhol bar mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pas gnas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i rtogs pa brnyes pa/ phyir mi zlogs pa'i
116a8: chos dang ldan pa/ spyod yul gyis mi 'grogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' yas pa rgyun mi gcod pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'jog pa/ mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi dam pa'i pha rol du phyin pa/ dus gsum la mnyam
116b1: panyid tshar phyin pa/ 'jug rten gyi khams thams cad du zhugs pa'i sku dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la the tsom med pa'i mkhyen pa mnga' ba/ spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i blo mnga' pa/ chos mkhyen pa la ne ma nur mi mda'
116b2: ba rnam par ma brtags pa'i sku mnga' ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ye shes yang dag par blangs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa gnyis su med pa dam pa'i pha rol du phyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma 'dres pa
116b3: rnam par thar par mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin pa/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa/ chos kyi dbyings dam pa can/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur
116b4: zag par bskal pa bgrangs pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor brgyun mi gcod pa'i sku mnga' ba pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i dril bzhugs te/ dge slong 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa gnyis dang thabs gcig pa la 'di
116b5: sa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu chen po dang / 'od srung chen po dang / ma 'gags pa dang / rab 'byor dang / kat+ya'i bu dang / ka bin chen po dang / nag po dang / dga' bo dang / chu klung 'od srung dang / g.ya bod srung dang / ster
116b6: rgyas song srung dang / bams ma'i bu gang po dang / ba lang bdag dang / lam phran bstan dang / gyad bu nor dang / ser ldeng nags pa dang / srus byed dang / gsum po che chen pa dang / sgra gcan zin dang / kun dga' bo dang / da dag la sogs pa
116b7: dge slong 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa gnyis po de dag thams cad kyang chos gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba/ 'phags pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa sha b+hag go// thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi tshul la zhugs pa sha
116b8: stag go/ thams cad kyang gzhi med pa nam mkha'i spyod yul ba sha stag go/ thams cad kyang mi nyed par gnas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba sha stag ga
117a1: thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang / spyod yul la zhugs pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba la zhugs pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang de bzhin
117a2: gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i tshul la zhugs pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang chos kyi tshul gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba sha stag go/ thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon du phyogs pa
117a3: sha stag go/ thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam rgyun ma bcad pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yid phyir ma log pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang shes rab dang ye shes mngon par
117a4: grub pa'i yid dang ldan pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang lhag mthong dam pa'i pha rol du phyin pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang thabs kyi yul dang / spyod yul las nges par byung ba sha stag go//
117a5: dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo dang / dge slong ma grags 'dzin la sogs pa dge slong ma 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa gnyis dang yang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang dkar po'i chos shin tu yongs su bsdus pa sha stag go//
117a6: thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang ba'i tshul la zhugs pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang chos thams cad dngos po med par rab tu rtogs pa
117a7: sha stag go/ / chos thams cad la mtshan nyid med par zhugs pa/ chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mthar rig pa/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / gnyen po med par mos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa
117a8: dang / ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang 'dul ba'i sems can ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub par gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam shin tu ston pa sha stag go// byang chub sems
117b1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
117b2: sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / kun nas 'dren pa dang / kun tu sprul pa dang / kun tu shes rab dang / kun tu mig dang / kun tu 'od dang / kun tu snang ba dang / kun tu 'od zer dang / kun tu rtog dang / byang chub sems dpa'
117b3: sems dpa' chen po kun tu blo dang / shugs chen dang / shugs chen 'dzin dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyal po dang / brtson 'grus chen pos rnam par gnon dang / rtsal chen dpa' ba dang
117b4: cher bsgyings pa dang / bsgyings pa chen po'i stobs dang / tshegs kyi dbang po chen po dang / spos kyi bal glang glang po che chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba chen po dang / zla ba bzang dang / yon tan zla ba
117b5: dang / rin chen zla ba dang / kun tu snang ba'i zla ba dang / chos dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang / rnam par snang byed zla ba dang / rnam par bsgrags pa'i zla ba dang / 'od zer rab tu gtong ba'i zla ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
117b6: zla ba dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / tshangs pa'i dbang pos bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang / sa'i sgra dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra dbyangs dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i dbyangs dang / chos
117b7: kyi rnga chen sgra dbyangs dang / kun tu go bar byed pa'i dbyangs dang / mi rtog rnam par mi rtog dbyangs dang / sa stengs sgra dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad zil gyis gnon gyi
117b8: dbyangs dang / kun nas snying po dang / kun tu dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / yon tan snying po dang / rnam par snang mdzad snying po dang / rin chen snying po dang / zla ba'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / snang byed snying po dang / pad ma'i dpal gyi snying
118a1: bo dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / blo gros bzang po dang / blo gros chen po dang / khyad par blo gros dang / rnam grags blo gros dang / rgyal chen blo gros dang / bla ma'i blo gros dang / 'phel ba'i blo gros dang / mtha' yas blo gros dang /
118a2: yangs pa'i blo gros dang / sangs rgyas blo gros dang / blo gros mi zad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang / brtan pa'i blo gros dang / rdo rje blo gros dang / sangs rgyas mngon sum blo gros dang /
118a3: rab mar me dang / mar me chen po dang / chos kyi sgron ma'i mar me dang / phyogs thams cad du khyab pa'i mar me dang / kun du mar me dang / mun pa thams cad sel ba'i mar me dang / 'gro ba thams cad la snang ba'i mar ma dang / gcig
118a4: tra sdang ba'i mar me dang / zla ba'i mar me dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i mar me dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lag na rin chen gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lag na phyag rgya rin chen gzhon nur
118a5: gyur pa dang / rin chen 'od zer gzhon nur gyur pa dang / nam mkha' mdzod gzhon nur gyur pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gzhon nur gyur pa dang / dra ba can gyi 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rnam par sel ba
118a6: gzhon nur gyur pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba gzhon nur gyur pa dang / dpal gyi snying po gzhon nur gyur pa dang / seng ge gzhon nur gyur pa dang / zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang / zla ba'i 'od zer gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
118a7: mchog gi blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang / rgyan bkod pa gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lag na pad ma dang / lag na rdo rje dang / nyi 'od dang / nor bu dang / glog dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon
118a8: pa'i 'od dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul thams cad las nges par 'byung ba'i blo gros dang / rdul med rnam par
118b1: gnon dang / nam dag rnam par gnon dang / phung po rnam par gnon dang / skye mched rnam par gnon dang / khams rnam par gnod dang / stong pa nyid rnam par gnon dang / mtshan ma med pa rnam par gdon dang / smon pa
118b2: med pa rnam par gnon dang / skye ba med pa rnam par gdon dang / 'gag pa med pa rnam par gnon dang / 'gro ba med pa rnam par gnon dang / 'ong ba med pa rnam par gnon dang / 'chi 'pho med pa rnam par gdon dang / mi skyeb
118b3: rnam par gnon dang / rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam par gnon dang / 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon dang / mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par gnon dang / chos thams cad rnam par
118b4: gnon dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad rnam par gnon dang / mngon par shes pa dang / rig pa rnam par gnon dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnam par gnon
118b5: dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par gnon dang / de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnon dang / mnyam pa nyid rnam par gnon dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dbyings rnam par gnon dang / bdud yul mi
118b6: gos dang / bdud las rgyal dang / bdud las rgyal chen po dang / gtsug na rin po che dang / 'od zer stong gi 'od 'phro dang / mngon par 'thung dka' dang / rab tu thub dka' dang / rtogs dka' dang / bsnyen par dka' ba'i blo dang / ngan 'gro skems
118b7: dang / bzang skyong dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / ded dpon bzang po dang / mis byin dang / chu lha'i lha dang / zla ba'i lha dang / dri ma med kyis byin dang / dri ma med par grags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa
118b8: dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug bcu rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams
119a1: gzhan dang gzhan dag nas 'dus pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la spyod pa dang / thabs dang / tshul dang / 'dul ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos
119a2: la 'god pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'bam thams cad la dpyod pa'i tshul shes pa rab 'byam la zhugs pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa'i spyod
119a3: yul shes pa la dpyod cing so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang spros pa thams cad shin du chad cing spyod pa len pa rnam par chad de sems can gyi khams thams cad sdud pa la mkhas pa sha stag go//
119a4: thams cad kyang mtha' dbus med pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa la shin du gnas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa chud mi za ba mi dmigs par dpyod cing so sor rtog pa la
119a5: mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / dbang po dang / rtsom pa dang / sbyor ba la shin du dpyod cing so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang
119a6: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i don dang / tshig dang / yi ge gzung ba dang blang ba shes pa yang dag par 'dzin cing rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams
119a7: cad kyang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug par zhugs pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / dus dang rim pa'i tshul laso
119a8: sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor skad cig gcig gis de ma thag tu thob par gnas pa sha
119b1: lhag go/ thams cad kyang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / mngon
119b2: par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi phyir sems bskyed cing byang
119b3: chub rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang ma bral ba sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang sems can gcig gi sems kyi dmigs pa la 'jug pas sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems kyi dmigs pa la mkhas pa dang ldan pa
119b4: sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang rang byung gi ye shes kyi sa las mi bskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ldan pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis thob par spyod pa las phyir mi ldog pa sha
119b5: stag go/ / thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i stobs rgyun mi gcod cing mngon par 'di mi byed pa shes pa'i tshul la zhugs pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang sems can gcig gi bya ba la bskal pa
119b6: mtha' yas par spyod pa kun du 'dzin par byin gyis rlob pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang khyad par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byin gyis rlob cing gdul bya'i khams 'gro ba thams cad 'dzud pa la mkhas pa
119b7: sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gnas la 'jug pa dang / spyod pa'i stobs kyi khyad par dang smon lam phun sum tshogs pa
119b8: sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyi bsam pa phun sumatshogs pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi thang du 'gro zhing skul ba la mkhas pa sha sug go/
120a1: thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul kun du 'dzin pa la mkhas pasha stag go// thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod par byed pa sha stag go// thams
120a2: cad kyang sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas 'byung ba kun du ston par byed pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su spyod par byed pa sha stag go/ thams
120a3: cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod par byed pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa med pa la zhugs pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khams ltar tshad med pa'i
120a4: chos dang ldan pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang las
120a5: kyis kun nas bslad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par smin pa la mos pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang rgyus kun nas bslad pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu la mos pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang rgya'i 'bur kun du 'byung ba lta bur
120a6: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan ltar ston pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs
120a7: kyi rnam par rig pa brag cha dang mtshungs pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
120a8: rnam par rtsen pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa'i mdog yongs su 'grub pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs la gnas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang sgra tsam gyi khyon cig la 'jig rten gyi khams
120b1: thams cad kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang phyogs bcu dag tu sgra tsam gyi khyon gcig la 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba dang / skye ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod par sbyor ba dang / byang chub
120b2: kyi snying por 'gro ba dang / bdud 'dul ba dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang skyil mo dkrung
120b3: gcig gis phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs par shes pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang zhing thams cad kyi rgyan zhing gcig tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag
120b4: go/ / thams cad kyang zhing gcig gi rgyan bkod bzhi thams cad du kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
120b5: k yi 'khor gang dag yin pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor du ston pa la mkham pa de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor gang yin pa de phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin
120b6: gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang chos thams cad mtha' dang dbus med par ston pa la mkhas pa la sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus rang gi
120b7: lus su kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku sangs rgyas gcig gi skur zhugs par kun du ston pa la mkhas pa ga stag go// thams cad kyang sangs rgyas gcig gi su sangs
120b8: rgyas thams cad kyi skur zhugs par kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rang gi lus su chud par kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kang
121a1: sems can gcig gi lus la dus gsum gyi sems can rnams kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang 'das pa'i dus la ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la'adas
121a2: padang / da ltar byung ba'i dus dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang lus gcig gis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa la lus dpag
121a3: tu me dgrangs med pa las ldang ba la mkhas pa/ lus dpag tu med cing grangs med pa dag gis ting ngange 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la/ lus gcig las ldang bar kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang
121a4: sems can thams cad kyi lus snyed kyi mngon par byang chub pa kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus la sems can gcig gis lus kun du ston pa la mkhas pa/ sems
121a5: can gcig gi lus la sems can thams cad kyi lus kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus las sangs rgyas kyi sku kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad
121a6: kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku las sems can gyi lus kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang sems can gyi lus chos kyi skur kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang zhing thams cad kyi rgyan
121a7: bkod pa deng gzhing gcig tu kun du ston pa la mkhas pa zhing gcig gi rgyan bkod pa de dag zhing thams cad du kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang chos kyi sku sems can gyi lus su kun du ston pa la
121a8: mkhas pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang sbru'i khung bu gcig tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jug par byed pa kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go// thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon
121b1: par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i smon lam gyi stobs kyi gnas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na
121b2: gdul bya'i sems can yongs su smin pa ji lta ba de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang bskal pa bgrangs pa thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams
121b3: gcig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rgyun me gcod pa'i lus kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang sems bskyed pa gcig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi
121b4: 'jig rten gyi khams re re na sgo nga las skyes pa dang / mngal las skyes pa dang / drod gsher las skyes pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs can dang / gzugs can ma yin pa dang / 'du shes can dang / 'du shes can ma yin/
121b5: pa dang / rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / rkang mangs dang / lha dang / kA dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / me 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
121b6: dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa sems can gdul bya yongs su smin pa thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang bya ba la 'jug pa'i gnas kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha
121b7: stag go/ / thams cad kyang rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi byab mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag 'jug par byed
121b8: kyang sems can la gnod pa med pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ thams cad kyang bskal pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis me khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjed du med pa dag yud tsam
122a1: cig tu byin gyis rlob pa kun du ston pa la mkhas pa/ yud tsam cig bskal pa dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag
122a2: du byin gyi rlob pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/ / thams cad kyang spyod lam ji lta bus sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de ga de ltar lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par gzugs kyi lus kyi kha dog dang spyod lam
122a3: kun du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / gzhan dag thams cad kyang yon tan bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag dang ldan pa sha stag go/
122a4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nas 'dus pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dpag tu
122a5: med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ chang med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go// 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ras
122a6: kyi lha bya ba phrag brgya re re yang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags
122a7: so/ / brgya byin bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i dbang po rab 'thab bral bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul byed phrag brgya dang / lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bye
122a8: pa phrag brgya la lha'i rgyal po re re yang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom
122b1: ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ / ded dpon la sogs pa bdud kyi ris kyi lha bye ba phrag mang po dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang chos/
122b2: mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// srin po'i rgyal po 'bum phrag bcwa brgyad dang / 'byung po'i rgyal po 'bum phrag sum bcu rtsa brgyad dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyal po 'bum phrag brgyad bcu dang rig
122b3: sngags 'chang gi rgyal po 'bum phrag drug bcu rtsa lnga dang / drang srong 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa sha stag dang / rlung gi rgyal po chen po rnam par 'thor rlung dang / rnam par 'thor
122b4: rlung chen po g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag dang / tshas pabye badrag rgya dang / tshangs pa chen bye ba brag brgya dang/ 'ong du sa phrag da/ med 'od bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'od gsal bye ba phrag brgya dang / dge chung bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshad med dge
122b5: bye ba phrag brgya dang / dge rgyas bye ba phrag brgya dang / sprin med bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'bras bu che ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / bsod nams skyes bye ba phrag brgya dang / gya no mo snang bye ba phrag brgya dang / shin du mthong bye ba phrag brgya dang / mi
122b6: babye ba phrag brgya dang / mi gdung ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / 'og min gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dag la tshangs pa chen po re re yang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i
122b7: phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gal ba der lhags so// lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la ba
122b8: ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// klu'i dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bye ba phrag brgya
123a1: dang / dri za'i dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang / nam mkha' lding gi dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang / mi 'am ci'i dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang / lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po bye ba
123a2: phrag brgya re yang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das galab
123a3: der lhags so/ / mi dang me ma yin pa dpag tu me dgrangs med pa dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir ba
123a4: ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i
123a5: phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la bder lhags so// rtsa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang nags tshal gyi lha gang dag yin pa dag dang / lhun po dang / lhun po chen po dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung
123a6: chen po dag gangs ri dang / khor yug dang / khor yug chen po la sogs par rnams kyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad gnas dang bcas de/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod par
123a7: byer dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gal ba der lhags so// rgya mtsho dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / chu klung dang / chu bran dang / mtsho phran dang / mtshe'u dang / chu mig dang / 'bab chu rnams
123a8: kye lha gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnas dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan
123b1: 'das gal ba der lhags so/ / grong dang / grong khyer dang / krong brdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / 'od rnams kyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rang gi gnas dang lhan cig tu bcom
123b2: ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so// klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
123b3: nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas rnams kyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rang rang gi gnas su zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang /
123b4: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus sems can 'ga' la yang gnod pa med cing sgrib pa med do// zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag
123b5: brgya dang / rgya mtsho bye ba phrag brgya re re yang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom
123b6: ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ / klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa yang 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos mnyan pa'i phyir
123b7: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir dang / mchod pa'i phyir dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang / chos
123b8: mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/ / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mos pa theg pa chen po la gzhol ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes 'dod
124a1: pa sha stag go/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis kha dog dang / gzugs dang gzi brjid dang / 'od kyis 'khor thams cad kyang zil gyis mnan te/ lha ma me/ wAn ne/ lhang de'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi mas 'od/
124a2: zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa phyung ste/ srin bu me khyer thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/ lha ma me/ lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams
124a3: cad zil gyis mnan te/ lha ma me/ lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bcwa lnga la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sprin gyi dra ba las grol ba ni skar ma'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/ lham me/ lhan ne/
124a4: lga 'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad su bkod te zil gyis mnan nas/ lhams me/ wAn na/ ltung de ste/ ri'i rgyal po rab ltar dpal gyis rab tu 'bar te sa ma
124a5: g.yo/ mi 'gyur/ mi 'gul bar lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras
124a6: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni sku mi g.yo/ mi 'gyur mi 'gul bar bzhugs so// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'jam dpal gzhon
124a7: nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni rab tu 'byung bar mngon du phyogs shing khyim nas mngon par 'byung bar shes so// kha cig gis ni rab tu byung zhing
124a8: dka' ba spyod pa la gnas par shes so/ / 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi snying por gshegs par shes so// kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi snying por bzhugs par shes so// 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni
124b1: bdud 'khor grangs med dpag tu med pas bskor ba bcom par shes so/ / kha cig gis ni lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang tshangs
124b2: pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag gis ded dpon chen po rgyal lo rgyal lo zhes spro bar byed par shes so/ / kha cig gis ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas brgya byin rnams gsol ba 'debs
124b3: par shes so/ / kha cig gis ni tshangs pa rnams gsol ba 'debs par shes so// 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs par shes so// kha cig gis ni
124b4: bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sbyin pa'i gtam ston par shes so/ / 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la tshul khrims kyi gtam ston par shes so// kha cig gis ni bzod pa'i gtam/
124b5: kha cig gis ni brtson 'grus kyi gtam/ kha cig gis ni bsam gtan gyi gtam/ kha cig gis ni shes rab kyi gtam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so// kha cig gis ni thabs la mkhas pa'i gtam/ kha cig gis
124b6: ni rdzu 'phrul gyi gtam/ kha cig gis ni smon lam gyi gtam/ kha cig gis ni ye shes kyi gtam bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so// kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam/ kha cig gis ni rang sangs
124b7: rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam/ kha cig gis ni theg pa chen po'i gtam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so// kha cig gis ni sems can dmyal bar skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so//
124b8: kha cig gis ni dud 'gror skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so// kha cig gis ni yi dgas su skye ba'i chos rnams/ kha cig gis ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das
125a1: bdag cag la ston par shes so/ / bcig gis ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston pa shes so// kha cig gis ni sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi gnas
125a2: su skye ba dang / kha cig gis ni 'thab bral gyi gnas su skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so// kha cig gis ni dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba dang / kha cig gis ni 'phrul dga'i gnas su
125a3: skye ba dang / kha cig gis na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas su ste ba dang / kha cig gis ni bdud kyi gnas su skye ba dang / kha cig gis ni tshangs pa'i gnas su skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so//
125a4: de bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang / tshangs la bor dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bsod nams skyes dang / 'bras bu che dang / mi che ba
125a5: dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang dang / shin du mthong dang / 'og min dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
125a6: mched du skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ / 'jam dpal 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni mir skye ba'i chos rnams/ kha cig gis ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por skye ba'i
125a7: chos rnams/ kha cig gis ni gling gnyis dang / gsum dang / bzhi pa'i 'khor los sbyang ba dang / stong gnyis dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi
125a8: 'khor los snang ba'i rgyal po 'gyur ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/ / 'jam dpal 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dom da tsam du 'phags par shes so//
125b1: kha cig gis ni rgyang grags tsam du 'phags/ kha cig gis ni rgyang grags gnyis tsam du 'phags/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad tsam du 'phags par shes so// kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs
125b2: pa'i sku dpag tshad gnyis tsam du 'phags par shes so/ / kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad bcu tsam du shes so// 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad
125b3: stong du shes so/ / kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu par shes so// kha cig gis ni dpag tshad 'bum dang / kha cig gis ni de bzhin
125b4: gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu par shes so// kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong par shes so// 'khor
125b5: 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag bgrang ba las 'das par shes so/ / 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang du kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo // kha cig gis
125b6: ni nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che chen po an+da rnyil gyi kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che skar 'od kyi kha dog tu/ kha
125b7: cig gis ni nor bu rin po che pad ma rA ka'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che lha thams cad snang ba'i
125b8: kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che nyi zla snang ba'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che shel gyi kha dog tu shes so// kha cig gis ni
126a1: nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu/ kha cig gis
126a2: ni nor bu rin ma tshe seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu/ kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu shes so// 'jam dpal 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang
126a3: nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i kha dog tu shes so/ / 'jam dpal kha dog dang / spyod lam dang / dbyibs gang dang gang kho nas sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba/ 'jam dpal
126a4: de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog dang / spyod lam dang / dbyibs de dang de kho nar sems can rnams kyis mthong ngo // 'jam dpal chos bstan pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i chos de dang
126a5: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa ston par sems can rnams kyis shes so/ / 'jam dpal spyod pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 'dzud cing 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i spyod pa de dang de la de
126a6: bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par sems can rnams kyis shes so/ / 'jam dpal gal te shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pasam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/
126a7: brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang /
126a8: me ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs su gdabang byung la/ shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang / de bzhin du nub dang / de bzhin du byang dang / de bzhin du shar lto dang/ de bzhin du ljon pa dang / de bzhin du nub byang dang / de bzhin du byang
126b1: shar dang / de bzhin du stang dang / de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med
126b2: bdag lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / me dang mi ma yin pa dag gis dper na 'das
126b3: bu'i tshal lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag 'jam dpal gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas 'dul ba yin na sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs
126b4: pa'i spyan sngan 'dom gang tsam na 'khod par shes so/ / 'jam dpal kha dog dang / spyod lam dang gnas gang dang gang gis sems can de dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par sems
126b5: can de dag gis mthong ngo / / 'jam dpal chos bstan pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de dang de nyid kyi chos ston par thos so// 'jam dpal spyod pa gang gis sems can de dag de bzhin
126b6: gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i spyod pa de dang de la de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thams cad lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal 'di lta
126b7: s te dper na zla ba yang gyi ro'i dkyil 'khor nam phyed kyi dus na 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyis so so'i mdun na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dug par shes kyang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni sems can de dag gis bdag ci'i
126b8: phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du shes pa'i 'gyur bar bdag sems can de dag gi mdun na 'dug par bya'o/ / snyam du mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pas
127a1: lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de lta bu'i bya ba 'di 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'khor dpag tu med/ grangs med/
127a2: bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ tshad med/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i dbus na bzhugs na/ de dag thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par mthong mod
127a3: kyi/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par shes par 'gyur bar nga sems can de dag gi 'dun du 'dug par bya'o snyam du mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/
127a4: 'on kyang sems can rnams ji lta bus 'dul ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal dper na sems can rnams
127a5: las za ma dang / 'bring dang / rab kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis sems can rnams kyi 'du byed tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab rnams 'thung yang 'du byed rnams ni me tog rnam par mi tog ste/ 'on kyang 'du byed de dag ldan
127a6: gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab rnams kyi bya ba dag la 'dug pa'i 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam
127a7: par smin pa tham dang / bring dang / rab kyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab tu sems can rnams kyis mthong yang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi tog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ bon kyang de bzhin
127a8: gshegs pa de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de lhun gyis grub par 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal dbar na nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya'i rigs ma ni ras tha dad pa nyid kyi dbang gis la dog tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gapa te kor bu rin po
127b1: che bai dUr+ya ras ser po'i steng du bzhag na ni nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya kha dog ser por 'gyur/ gal te ras dmar po'i steng du bzhag na ni nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya kha dog dmar por 'gyur/ gal te ras sngon po'i steng du bzhag na ni
127b2: nor bu rin po che bai dUrar+ya kha dog sngon por 'gyur te/ de ltar ras kha dog ci dang ci 'dra ba'i steng du bzhag pa de dang de nyid kyi kha dog kho nar 'gyur yang 'jam dpal nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste 'on kyang
127b3: lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can tha dad pa nyid kyi dbang gis kha dog tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gal te sems
127b4: can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog tu mthong bas gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo / / gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che bai dU ra'i kha
127b5: dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / / gal te sems can rnams mu tig gi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis
127b6: kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mu tig gi kha dog tu mthong ngo / / gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che in da rnyil gyi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu
127b7: rin po che en dra rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo / / 'jam dpal gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che mthon
127b8: ka chen po'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / / gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad
128a1: bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / / gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che dbang gi
128a2: rgyal po'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / / gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin ni ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs
128a3: pa'i sku nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / / gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog lta bus gdul
128a4: par bya ba yin na ni/ de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo // gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i
128a5: kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / / 'jam dpal gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che glog gi
128a6: sgron ma'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog tu mthong ngo / / gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi kha dog lta bus
128a7: gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de bzhin du de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi kha dog tu mthong ngo / / de bzhin du sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten
128a8: skyong ba'i kha dog tu mthong bas gdul bar bya ba yang yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i kha dog tu mthong ngo do// de bzhin du sbyar te sems can rnams sems can
128b1: dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i bar gyi kha dog gis gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang / yi dgas
128b2: dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i bar gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo // gzugs med par skyes pa'i bar gyi gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang lus
128b3: dang kha dog dang / spyod lam de dang de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo // de bzhin du sgod las skyes pa dang / mdal las skyes pa dang / drod gsher bas smras pa dang / rdzus te skyes pa dang / gzugs can dang gzugs can ma yin pa dang /
128b4: 'du shes can dang / 'du shes can ma yin pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi sems can rnams kyi gzugs dang / lus dang / kha dog dang / spyod lam gang dang gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang / lus dang kha dog dang /
128b5: spyod lam de dang der de bzhin gshegs pa mthong yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 'di dag gis gser gyi kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya'i kha dog du mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis
128b6: nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che in+d+ra rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che in dra rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la nor bu rin po che
128b7: mthong ka chen po'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/
128b8: sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i
129a1: kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che rgya
129a2: mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral ba can gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni
129a3: nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal
129a4: mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni mgyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu
129a5: rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che lha thams cad snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/
129a6: sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che lha thams cad snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che nyi zla snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che nyi zla snang ba'i kha/
129a7: dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni mgyur cig/ sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron mi'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin
129a8: gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig ces mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go// de bzhin du sbyar te/ 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams la yang brjod par bya ste/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi
129b1: 'on na gyis kya rnam par mjug par da mdza pades bad / / / ya ba gnas pa// rnam pa la per na ban pa dang gi rgyal po gang 'byung ba
129b2: lcags dang / lcags las byas pa'i yo byad rnams mi 'byung mod kyi/ 'jam dpal 'on kyang nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po ni mi tog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'di snyam du bdag gang du 'byung ba dar lpags dang lcags las
129b3: byas pa'i mo byad rnams 'thung bar mthur cig snyam du mi sems med kyi/ 'on kyang lhun gyis zab cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya bad lta bu 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du de bzhin gshegs
129b4: bzung ba der mu sngags can spyod pa dang / kun du rngu dang / gcer bu la sogs pa mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad me 'byung / der lta bar gyur pa thams cad mi 'byung / der 'khrug pa thams cad mi 'byung / der mtshams med
129b5: palnga po dag mi 'byung / der mo dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams mi 'byung / der rgyal po'i bka' lung dang / chos gces pa 'dor ba mi 'byung / der nyi khri'i 'od dag mi 'byung / der ba rgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong
129b6: dag dang / lha thams cad kyi 'od dag mi 'brung der nor bu rin po che'i 'od rnams dang / me'i 'od rnams dang / glog gi 'od rnams mi 'jung / der yud tsam dang / yud tsam phyed dang / zla ba dang zla ba byed dang / sor bgrang ba rnams mi
129b7: thung ste/ 'jam dpa la gzhan du na sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi drangs ni ma gtogs so// 'jam dpa la de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma chog rnam par mi chog sa/ 'on kyang sems ca/
129b8: kyigyidabang gis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu 'byung ngo // jam dpa la dper na nor bu rin po che mthon ga chen po'i 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad nor bu rin po cha mthon ka chen po'i 'dog tu 'brur yang
130a1: nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po ni me rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la
130a2: dmigs pa'i yid la byed pa'i 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog tu 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog
130a3: par de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal dper na nor bu rin po che chen po bai dUr+ya byi dor legs par byas pa mgo'i rgyan nam/ mgul ba'i rgyan nam/ lag pa'i rgyan nam/ rkang pa'i rgyan yang rung
130a4: ste/ gang dang gang gi logs rgyan du 'dug pa de dang der rgyan shin du lham me/ lhan ne lhang de'o// nor bu rin po che chen po bai dUr+ya de nyid kyi mthus rgyan de dag kyang shin du lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang der 'dug kyang nor bu rin po che chen po
130a5: bai dUr+ya ni mi tog rnam par me rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang skyon lam
130a6: kyi gnas gang dang gang gis nyan thos kyi spyod pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa 'am/ spyod pa pa 'am/ kun du rgyu dang / gcer bu pa'i spyod pa 'am dud
130a7: 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / srin po'i spyod pa'am/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i spyod pa'am/ spyod pa gang dang gang la gnas pa'i spyod pa de dang de nyid shin du l+h+wam mo/
130a8: lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi mthus spyod pa de shin du lham me lhan ne lhang nger rnam par mdzes kyang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang ldan gyis grub cing rnam
130b1: par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal dper na sa la gnas sa la brten nas mngon thams cad dang / rtswa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang nags tshal rnams skye zhing 'phel la shin du rgyas pa nyid du 'gyur yang
130b2: 'jam dpalas ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la brten nas sems can
130b3: thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skye zhing 'phel te/ shin du rgyas pa nyid du 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam
130b4: dpal dper na sprin chen pos 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad khebs par byas nas/ rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal rnam pa tha dad pa rnams su char pa chen po rab tu phab ste/ ro gcig pa'i chu rgun des rtswa dang / shing gel
130b5: pa dang sman dang / nags tshal rnam pa tha dad pa rnams skye bar byed cing gnas rnam pa tha dad pa rnams su chu de ro tha dad pa dang / kha dog tha dad par yang gnas la/ 'jam dpal sprin ni me tog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub
130b6: cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba tha dad pa rnams 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad sangs rgyas
130b7: kyi sku'i sprin gyis khyab par mdzad de/ sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bsags pa/ smon lam dang lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa tha dad cing mos pa tha dad pa la gnas pa thams cad la chos kyi char chen po mngon par phab ste/
130b8: 'jam dpal chos kyi char de yang ro gcig pa yin mod kyi/ 'jam dpal sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bsags pa/ smon lam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa tha dad cing mos pa tha dad pa la gnas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
131a1: dang / smon lam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa thad dpal zhugs pa rnams la rnam pa thadad pa nyid kyi chos thadad pa kho ni'i char pas nus pa ji lta ba dang / mthu ji wa ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsab bskyed kyang 'jam
131a2: dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'di lta ste/ sems can 'di dag la ni nyan thos kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o// sems can 'di dag la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su
131a3: 'thur ba'i dag pa'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o/ / sems can 'di dag la ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o// sems can 'di dag la ni rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha'i gnas su skye ba'i
131a4: dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o/ / sems can 'di dag la ni sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar de/ 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga'
131a5: rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / de bzhin du tshangs pa rnams dang / tshangs chen rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams
131a6: dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dag rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung rnams dang / gya nom snang rnams dang / shin du mthong rnams dang gnas
131a7: gtsang ma'i ris rnams dang / 'og min rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o// bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o snyam du 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par
131a8: mi rtog go/ / sems can 'di dag la ni rgyal por skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o// sems can 'di dag la ni ming skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o// sems can 'di dag
131b1: la ni dbang phyug tu 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dag rnam par bskyer bar bya'o snyam du 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog
131b2: par sems can smon lam dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du mdzad pa de lta bu de byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du btang snyoms su zhugs shing btang
131b3: snyoms la rnam par mi rtog go/ / 'jam dpal dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ma thag tu 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa btang bas 'dzam bu'i gling gi mun pa mun nag thams cad med par gyur yang nyi
131b4: ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba de lta bu de byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ma thag tu ye shes
131b5: kyi 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa btang bas sems can rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa'i mun pa thams cad med par gyur te/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin
131b6: gyis rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams su lta bar gyur pa 'byung ba ni ma gtogs so/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni ngas sems can rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa bsal la snyam 'am/ bsal bar bya'o snyam du mi rtog rnam
131b7: par mi rtog mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de byung ste/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad du rnam par mi rtog cing mnyam
131b8: ste btang snyoms pa'o/ / 'jam dpal dper na sgyu ma sprul pa ni sgyu ma mkhan gyi dbang gis bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / lus tha dad pa sna tshogs ston kyang 'jam dpal sgyu ma sprul pa de ni brjod du med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma
132a1: 'gags pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ yul med pa/ dngos po med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ gnyis su med pa/ kun du spyod pa med pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang / mnyam zhing gnyen po
132a2: med pa yin yang 'jam dpal sgyu ma sprul pa ni sgyu ma mkhan gyi dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba sna tshogs ston to/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
132a3: pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can gyi dbang gis 'khor gyi nang na gzugs kyi sku dang / kha dog dang / spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang / bya ba la 'jug pa'i gnas sna tshogs 'byung mod kyi/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa de ni brjod
132a4: du med pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ yi ge med pa/ sgra med pa/ yul med pa/ dngos po med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ gnyis su med pa/ kun du spyod pa med pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs shing
132a5: gnyen po med pa/ khams las yang dag par 'das pa te 'on kyang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sems can gyi dbang gis mdzad pa sna tshogs dag ston to// 'jam dpal dper na nyis
132a6: ni gcig kho na yin na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi dbang gis gling bzhi rnams su sems can rnams kyis rnam pa mang por mthong ste/ kha cig gis ni de 'char bar mthong / kha cig gis ni shar zin par mthong / kha cig gis ni bag dros
132a7: btsam du mthong / kha cig gis ni dros chen tsam du shes/ kha cig gis ni nam phyed/ kha cig gis ni nyi ma phyed/ kha cig gis ni nyi ma la tse thun cig tsam du shar bar shes/ kha cig gis ni nyi ma byed yol tsam du shes/ kha cig gis/
132a8: ni nyi ma skur tsam du shes/ kha cig gis ni tho rangs tsam du shes te/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang gling bzhi dag du sems can rnams kyi gzhan dang gzhan du mthong yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog rnam par
132b1: mi tog ste/ lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog bzhin du ri rab kyi dbang gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bya ba sna tshogs ston to// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
132b2: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can gyi dbang gis 'khor cig kho na'i nad nas kyang sems can kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shes/ kha cig gis ni yongs su mya ngan las
132b3: 'da' bar shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par shes so// 'khor de nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes/ kha cig gis ni de
132b4: bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan
132b5: 'das kyi bstan pa snying por gyur par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa nub par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi chos bstan nas lo bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon
132b6: par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
132b7: nas lo brgya dang / lo stong lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ lo brgya dang / lo stong lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas
132b8: lo stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/ kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo stong phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga
133a1: bcu lon par shes so/ / kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes/
133a2: kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu dang / nyi shu dang / sum bcu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu lon par shes so// 'jam dpal 'khor 'di
133a3: nyid kyi nang nas lha dang mi kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa lon par shes/ 'jam dpal 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas lha dang
133a4: mikha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bskal brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa lon par shes kyang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang
133a5: lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog bzhin du sems can gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de byung ngo / / 'jam dpal dper na 'dzam bu'i gling du rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po langs pas rtswa dang shing gel ba dang /
133a6: sman dang / nags tshal dang / lo ma thams cad g.yo// rab tu g.yo/ kun du rab tu g.yo// 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun du rab tu 'gul/ khu'ur 'ur/ rab tu'ur 'ur/ kun du rab tu'ur 'ur/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun du rab tu
133a7: 'khrugs shing lo ma kha cig ni shar phyogs su dma' la nub phyogs su mtsho/ / kha cig ni nub phyogs su dma' la gar phyogs su mtho 'os gi ni mtha' dma' la dbus sago/ kha cig ni byang phyogs dma' la lho phyogs su mgro/
133a8: yang rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang nags tshal dang / lo ma rnams mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang gis bya ba sna tshogs ston to// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs
133b1: padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang sems can gyi dbang gis rtag tu skad cig la gzugs kyi sku dang / kha dog dang / spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang / bya ba la 'jug
133b2: pa'i gnas grangs med pa dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal sems can rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa yid la byed pa ji snyed byung ba de snyed kyi
133b3: bskal par sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i rgyun chad cing ldog ste/ 'jam dpal de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
133b4: rgyas ni yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la dmigs pa'i yon tan gyi mtha' yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la
133b5: gnas pa rnams kyis kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa dag gis kyang rtogs par mi nus so/ / 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha rnams dang / mi rnams ni ches nyung
133b6: gi phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa 'dod pa dag la 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis lha'i mig gis shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyis phyogs gcig na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo / / 'jam
133b7: d pal phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa 'dod pa dag la 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches nyung
133b8: gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pas lha'i mig gis shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyis phyogs gcig na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches mang
134a1: do/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pas lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems
134a2: can ji snyed mthong ba de bas ni 'jam dpal rang sangs rgyas kyis lha'i mig gis shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyis phyogs gcig na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo / / 'jam dpal rang sangs rgyas kyis lha'i mig gis
134a3: s tong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed mthong ba de bas ni 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pas lha'i mig gis shing rta
134a4: pad lo'i tshad tsam gyis phyogs gcig na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo / / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pas lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi
134a5: s tong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed mthong ba de bas ni 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i spyan gyis shing rta'i bang lo'i tshad tsam gyis phyogs gcig na sems can dag gzigs pa ni ches
134a6: grangs med do/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na shing rta'i pang lo'i tshad tsam gyis phyogs thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can re re'i sems dang sems las byung
134a7: ba'i chos byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag gzigs pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi
134a8: bye ma snyed du yang bgrang ba 'am/ bsam pa 'am/ grangs su bya bar sla ba ma yin te/ 'jam dpal sems can 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dag gi sems dang sems las byung ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs
134b1: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis lhun gyis grub par skad cig thang cig yud tsam zhig la rab tu mkhyen to/ / 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems
134b2: can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams rgyu gad dang dmigs pa gang dang / rkyen gang gis ji ltar byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / sems can de dag gis spyod pa dang / spyod lam dang / bya ba la
134b3: 'jug pa'i gnas gang dag byung ba dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ba
134b4: mkhyen to/ / 'jam dpal sems can de dag ji ltar blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'dul ba yang lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la rab tu mkhyen to// 'jam
134b5: d pal sems can re re'i ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma bas mang ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam
134b6: cig la rab tu mkhyen to/ / 'jam dpal rgyu gang dang / dmigs pa gang dang / rkyen gang gis nyon mongs pa de dag ji ltar 'byung ba dang / thabs kyi shes pa gang gis sems can de dag gi nyon mongs pa ji ltar zhi bar 'gyur ba
134b7: de dag kyang lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la rab tu mkhyen to/ / 'jam dpal de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
134b8: rnams ni ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/ / 'jam dpal dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / 'od rab 'bring tha mar snang yang zla ba'i
135a1: dkyil 'khor ni 'bri ba dang 'phel ba yang med de/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas nyi ma bgrang ba dang / yud tsam dang / yud tsam byed kyi grangs rtsib bya ba de lta bu de yang 'byung la 'jam
135a2: dpal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
135a3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du bsam pa rab 'bring thams sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / 'dar rab
135a4: 'bring tha mar mthong yang 'jam dpal sems can gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / spyod pa dang / mos pa dang / smon lam gyi stobs dang / byin gyis brlabs ci 'dra ba yin pa de 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/ 'jam dpal
135a5: de bzhin gshegs pa la ni rab 'bring tha ma med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos kyi sku ste/ shin du ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ ma 'gags pa yin
135a6: na/ 'jam dpal 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi bsam pa rab 'bring thams de bzhin gshegs pa rab 'bring tha mar mthong yang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni me tog rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing na/
135a7: par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldid dang / mi'am ci dang / lto phye chen po
135a8: dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams dang / zan dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la bshos gsol ba dang / gang dag bshos mi
135b1: gsol ba dang / gang dag mthong ba dang / gang dag mi mthong ba dang / gang dag stong pa dang / gang dag mi stong pa dang / gang dag gshe ba dang / gang dag mi gshe ba dang / gang dag reg pa dang / gang dag mi reg pa de dag thams cad kyi bya ba de
135b2: lta bu rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal dper na gang dag gis nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / spyod yul du gnas pa de dag thams
135b3: cad ni nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu 'gyur yang nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du sems can gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa tha na ri mor bris pa dang /
135b4: gzugs su byas pa mthong ba dang / reg pa dang / de'i spyod yul yang shes pa de dag thams cad ni gzugs dang / kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'grub pa thob par 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni me tog/ rnam par
135b5: rtog go/ / 'jam dpal dper na rtsi'i rgyal po legs par mthong zhes bya ba sems can gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung gang dag gis mthong ba de dag gi mig rnam par dag par
135b6: 'gyur/ / gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung gang dag gis rna bas de rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra thos pa de dag gi rna ba rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/
135b7: dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung gang dag gis dri tshor ba de dag gi sna rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung / gang dag gis lces de'i ro myong ba de dag gi lce'i
135b8: dbang po rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung gang dag lus kyis reg pa de dag gi lus rnam par dag par 'gyur yang 'jam dpal rtsi'i rgyal po legs par
136a1: mthong ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa
136a2: yang rung / gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa tha na ri mor bris pa dang / gzugs su byas pa mthong ba de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba des mig rnam par dag par 'gyur/ tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba yang rung ste/ gnod
136a3: sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung gang dag gis dpas sangs rgyas shes bya ba'ang/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'jig rten gyi mgon po zhes bya ba 'am/ thams cad mkhyen pa
136a4: zhes bya ba'i sgra thos pa de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des rna ba'i dbang po rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung gang dag gis de'i yon tan gyi dri tsher ba de dag
136a5: dge ba'i rtsa ba des sna rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung gang dag gis de'i chos kyi ro myong ba de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des lce rnam par dag par 'gyur/ gnod
136a6: sems kyi sems dang ldan pa 'am/ dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung gang dag gis lus kyis reg pa de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des lus rnam par dag par 'gyur yang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni me tog rnam par mi
136a7: tog ste/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal dper na ci'i rgyal po 'bral ba zhes bya bas bskus pa'i rnga sgra sems can zug rngus zug pa dang bcas
136a8: pa dug dang bcas pa gang dag gis thos pa de dag gi zug rngu thams cad 'byang zhing dug kyang mi 'dug par 'gyur yang 'jam dpal rtsi'i rgyal po 'bral ba ni mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog ste/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las
136b1: kyirnam par smin pa'i dbang dang rgyu rkyen tshogs pas lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par rtsi'i rgyal po 'bral ba'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo / / 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos sa bka tu
136b2: sems can rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa'i zug rngu dag 'byang zhing 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi drug kyang mi 'dug par 'gyur yang 'ang ba dang me de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi tog/ rnam par mi tog ste/ 'on kyang 'jam
136b3: dpal lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
136b4: kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni ches nyung gi/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams re
136b5: re re yang rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dag ni ches mang ngo / / 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi rdul
136b6: phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni ches rung gi/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rgyun mi gcod par lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu rdul phra rab kyi rdul ro
136b7: rel sems can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par mdzad zan pa dang / yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang yongs su smin par mdzad par 'gyur ba dag ni ches mang ste/ 'jam dpal de ltar
136b8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/ / 'jam dpal dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dbang gis
137a1: khro ba dang / skye ba dang / ma snang bar 'gyur bar yang snang la/ zlabab byel 'khor la ni tha ba dang / mi snang ba dang / sgrub med de/ 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi thun gyi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pas
137a2: ma'i grangs dang / yung tsam dang / srad tsam byed dang / thub rjed dang / thab dang / lo bzang pa'i grangs banag pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis b+ha ba de lta bu dag 'byung yang 'jam dpal zla ba'i dkyil
137a3: lan zhab 'ag/ 'phel ba'ang/ mi stsung bar 'gyur ba med de/ 'onakyang 'jam dpal sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i las phyirnam par smin pa dang / zhi ba'i dbang gis kun gyis bubaci rnam par mertog par rna
137a4: dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba de pa de 'byung ngo / / jam dpas de bzhin du bzhin gshegs pa dazla bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ngas rgyas kyang ston dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs pasags pa'i sems can nams kyi rgya/
