158b2: mi dga' bar ma byed cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ni mang ste/ thabs dang // shes rab dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can bsam pa
158b3: sna tshogs dag la chos ston te/ lha'i bu dag ngas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul ji ltar mthong ba de ltar ngas shes pa las na/ de bzhin gshegs
158b4: pa ni sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i rgyal po 'chad par bzhed pa dang / rgyas par mdzad par bzhed par mi 'gyur ram/ yang lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yongs
158b5: su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang med/ sku tshe zad par 'gyur ba yang med/ bskal pa bye ba dpag tu med pa'i bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par
158b6: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs mod kyi/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang ston/ dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba yang ston to// sems can mya ngan las 'da' bas 'dul
158b7: ba dang / ring bsrel gyis 'dul ba/ snyigs ma'i rang bzhin can de bzhin gshegs pa la ma dad pa/ bla ma la sti stang byed par mi 'gyur ba'i sems can dag ji lta ji ltar mthong ba de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya
158b8: ngan las 'da' ba ston mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni byon pa yang med gshegs pa med do// gang gi tshe sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur cing de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar 'dod pa dang / mchod
159a1: bar 'os pa dang / chos nyan par 'dod pa dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde bar bya ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la gsol bar
159a2: bya ba dang rgyas par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skye ba med de/ rga ba dang 'chi ba yang med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ me long gi dkyil 'khor shin du legs par
159a3: phyis pa la gzugs sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur mi snang bar yang 'gyur mod kyi/ gzugs brnyan ni der 'ong ba dang / 'gro bar snang ba ni med do// lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i skul yang de ltar blta bar bya'o// rigs kyi tha
159a4: 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma byed pa legs par bslabs pa ni grong khyer dang / rta babs dang / bskyed mos tshal sna tshogs dang / shing rta sna tshogs dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs dang / dga' ba dang / rtse ba sna tshogs bstan te mi
159a5: snang bar byed kyang de la 'pho ba yang med/ 'ong ba yang med/ 'gro ba yang med do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la yang blta bar bya'o// yang lha'i bu dag sngon gyi smon lam
159a6: gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas lo stong lon pa'am mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa lon pa 'am/ mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa bye ba lon yang sems can rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / bkur
159a7: stir bya ba dang / ring bsrel gyi mchod rten byed du gzhug pa dang / sku gzugs byed du gzhug pa dang / mtshan nas brjod pa dang / dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / mchod pa byed pa'i sems can 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs na gnas
159a8: ba rnams thar bar mdzadade/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro log par ltung ba thams cad dang / sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs
159b1: su thar bar mdzad nas rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur na/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon sum du me tog dang / spos dang / dri dang / phreng /
159b2: ba dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan rnams kyi mchod pas mchod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ lha'i bu dag gang sems can la las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya stong dam bskal pa
159b3: bye ba lon yang sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes mtshan nas lan bdun brjod nas nam mkha' la me tog gtor na de dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro/ / me tog nam mkha' la gtor ba lta zhog gi
159b4: gang dag dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su slob pa la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims bslab pa gcig tsam 'dzin tam/ nyin gcig gam/ mtshan
159b5: gcig gam/ yud tsam zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yid la byed par brtson na de sdug bsngal mthar byas nas rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab
159b6: 'gyur ro/ / gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir gzhad gdad ma/ ku re'am/ byis pa'i kyal ka 'am/ rtsed mor byed pa'am/ 'jim pa las mchod rten byed na/ de dag thams cad sdug bsngal mthar byas nas
159b7: bra na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur na/ gang gis ring bsrel gyi mchod rten nam/ ring bsrel gyi sku gzugs byas te/ sems can thams cad la snying rje gtso bor shes
159b8: nas sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las yongs su dgrol lo snyam ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas lha'i me tog dang / lha'i spos dang / phreng ba dang / blag pa dang / phye ma dang / sil
160a1: snyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan nams kyis mchad brgyad pa snyams kyang bdags / das bzhan gagags pa thams cadal ma cad pa zlas par gyur ga/ dasgrab dang / rkab dang / da dang 'a /
160a2: mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'jug pa rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur te/ ji srid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
160a3: sangs rgyas par ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / lha'i bu dag de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam la mkhas shing 'thun pa yongs su dag pa yin no// de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam
160a4: dri sems par gyur te/ kye ma'o 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni shes rab chen po dang ldan no// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchog tu thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa ni legs na/ gang 'jam dpal gyis de bzhin
160a5: gshegs pa rnams mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa bye ba du ma lon yang 'jig rten gyi khams dag na bzhugs shing thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs kyi sems can rnams yongs su smin par mdzad do zhes des smras pa de lta bu 'di/ cizhig snyam mo/
160a6: / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyis lha'i bud dag gi sems shes nas 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag legs so legs so// yud tsam zhig sdod cig/ khyed kyi yid la byed pa skyes pa 'di
160a7: dang sngar zhus par gyur par yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yin no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad pas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug pud can
160a8: dang thams cad skyob dang / log par dadasel dang / gser thub dang / 'od bsrung dang / rnam par gzigs dang / mi 'khrugs pa dang / 'od dpag tu med pa de dag 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs shing de bzhin gshegs pa
160b1: seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs nas nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpar bcas pas bskor cing 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu la chos ston par snang ba dang / shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na
160b2: yang de bzhin gshegs pa du ma seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs nas chos 'chad cing bzhugs par mthong ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/ / de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang lha'i
160b3: bu de dag dam par gyur te/ mchog tu dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs bskyed pas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la me tog dang / spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang byug
160b4: pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan rnams kyis mngon par mchod de/ lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// e ma ye shes ye shes ni// ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab sgom// ji ltar 'jig rten sgron ma
160b5: rnams/ / 'das nas bskal pa du ma na// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// dpa' bo chen po 'di na bzhugs// byang chub sems dpa' yongs bskor cing // seng ge'i khril bzhugs pa gda'// sangs rgyas mthong ba legs
160b6: pa ste/ / chos mnyan pa yang legs pa yin// dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba dang // mnyan pa'ang de bzhin legs pa yin// gang dag 'dir ni bslab 'dzin pa'i// lus kyi sdom pa legs pa yin// nan tan gyis ni sgrub pa dag
160b7: kun byang chub thob par 'gyur/ / thabs dang shes rab mkhas pa rnams// 'dir ni sems can thar bar mdzad// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba dang // de bzhin sgyu ma byed pa 'dra// 'ong ba dang ni 'gro ba yang // de bzhin gshegs
160b8: pa ston par mdzad/ / mchod rten dang ni ri mo dang // sku gzugs byed du bzhug pa dang // mchod dang bkur sti bya ba'i phyir// gang dag mtshan ma dran byed pa// byang chub phyir ni gnas pa rnams// thams cad thar pa thob par 'gyur//
161a1: de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal nas// dam pa'i chos ni mnyan pa dang / mtsho cing 'dzin pa'i de bzhin te// sdug 'asngal kun las grol bar 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang rna
161a2: par yul ba'i tshe 'phrul 'di yang dag par bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khri bzhi stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / srog chags nyi khris ches la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go// lha'i bulwa
161a3: stong gis len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/ / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to// dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma bdun brgyas ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs thob par gyur to// 'jam dpal
161a4: gzhon nur gyur pa la rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces smras so/ / rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du dris pa'i lan bshad pa 'di ni khyod kyis legs par bshad de legs mod kyi/ kho bo the tsom cung
161a5: zad cig skyes kyis/ gang thos nas sems can rnams kyis yid la byas te/ de dag thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las grol bar 'gyur ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
161a6: byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur bar kho bos dris pa de bstan cing lung ston cig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis
161a7: spobs pa skyes pa ni legs so/ / khyod gang dang gang 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan thos pa tsam dang / mchod pa dang / bkur sti byas pa nyid kyis
161a8: sdig pa byed pa'i sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten las grol bar 'gyur zhing bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag gang lags// de dag 'jig rten gyi khams ni
161b1: gang na bzhugs/ de dag la mchod pa ni ji ltar bgyi/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir sems can rnams ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / gang ngan song du skyes pa de dag sems can dmyal ba dang /
161b2: dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan rnams dang 'jig rten gyi khams su mchod cing sti stang bya ba bshad kyis
161b3: na cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams bai dUr+ya snang ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai dUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston pa yod do//
161b4: 'jig rten gyi khams gtsug phud can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i gtsug phud can zhes bya ba yod do// 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa na de bzhin gshegs
161b5: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med par 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams zhi ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi ba bkod pa
161b6: zhes bya ba yod do/ / 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams pad mo'i bla ma na de bzhin
161b7: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo 'byung ba zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mkhregs pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med
161b8: pa na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan bral ba zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs pa med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rtogs
162a1: pa blo gros su ldan pa na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su spyong ba zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ngan 'gro dang bral ba na de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad zhi bar mdzad pa zhes bya
162a2: dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dbang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i blo gros zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mtshan bzung ba
162a3: nyid kyis lha'i dbang por 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rgyas pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mtshan bzung zhing mchod pas nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar
162a4: 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten gyi khams khyad par thob pa na de bzhin gshegs pa ngan 'gro thams cad zhi bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mtshan bzung zhing mchod pas ngan 'gro thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten
162a5: gyi khams legs par snang ba na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad sdug par mthong ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i mtshan bzung zhing mchod pas 'jig rten pa thams cad mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi
162a6: bu mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa bdud thams cad kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa dang / de bzhin
162a7: gshegs pa gtsug phud can dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob dang / de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung dang / rgyal po chen po de bzhin
162a8: gshegs pa de dag mya ngan las 'das nas lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong lon pa'am/ mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa brgya lon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan bzung ba dang / ring bsrel gyi mchod rten
162b1: byed du 'jug pa dang / ri mdang su gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang / mar me dang / sras dang / me tog dang / dri dang / thug pa rnams kyis mchod cing bkur ste byas pa dang / bslab pa 'dzin pa dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' nga/
162b2: sdom pa dang / nye bar gnas pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad ngan song dang / ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// bskal par gnas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa yang yongs su
162b3: dag par 'gyur te/ bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur zhing ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba nas/ rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs/
162b4: kyi bu mo dad pa dang byang chub kyi sems dran pa nyams pa zhig gis sdig pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa dag 'ayung pa 'debs pa dang / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / srog gcod pa dang / dkon mchog gsum
162b5: gyi nor nub dang / sems can dmyal ba mnar med par 'gro ba dang / ngan song gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang / grogs po dang gnyen rnams yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de
162b6: dag gi ri mo'i sku gzugs dang / 'jim pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug cing / byed du bcug nas kyang sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i sems gtso bar byas te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan par gyur
162b7: nas zla ba yar gyo chas brgyad nas brtsams te bcwa lnga'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la me tog dang / spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / thug pa dang / mang medang / si la stan dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnams kyis mtshan la nagasu /
162b8: lan gsum du mchod de/ sems can de dag thar bar bya ba'i phyir ci nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis ni mkhyen/ lha'i snyan gyis ni gas na/ lha'i spyan gyis ni gzigs
163a1: shing sems can de dag bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur gyi ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / legs par bya ba byed kyi ngan par bya ba mi byed par yongs su bsngo zhing de ltar sems can ngan song du skyes pa de dag
163a2: thar bar bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la gsol ba gdab bo/ / bshags pa dang / mthol bas sdig pa bshags par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos par gyur cig/ ngan 'gro thams
163a3: cad las yongs su grol bar gyur cig/ ji srid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du bdag gi spyod pa dang 'thun par spyod par gyur cig ces de ltar yongs su
163a4: bsngo bar bya'o/ / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang bris pa dang / 'dri bcug pa dang / bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / mchod pa de'i phyir sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi smon lam gyi mthus sems can mnar med par 'grong
163a5: da / ngan song gsum du skyes pa de dag gi rna bar mtshan rnams thos par 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus kyang sdig pa thams cad bsrabs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gzi brjid kyi mthu
163a6: dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las rjes su dran par gyur nas phyis sdig pa'i las byed par mi 'gyur te/ de nas sdug bsngal de dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur zhing bde 'gror 'gro bar
163a7: 'gyur ro/ / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du spyod pa 'thun par 'gyur ro// de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni yon tan mang po dang ldan zhing nor bu rin
163a8: po che chen po dang 'dra ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bzhin du bsams pa thams cad 'grub ste/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed/ ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad gcod par byed/ bde 'gro'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi
163b1: zhing gi sgo rnams ni 'byed do/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa dang / smon lam dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byin gyi rlabs dang / ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs pas mya ngan las 'das nas bskal
163b2: pabargya lon pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs na gnas bdag mnyan cing mchod pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa nyid kyis ngan song thams cad las yongs su thar te bde 'gror bkod par 'gyur na/ gang 'chang ba dang /
163b3: thog pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir gzhug pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ yon tan de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos yongs su bzung bar 'gyur na/ de'i bsod nams
163b4: mngon par 'du bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba'i yon tan de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par brjod par slab ma yin no// rgyal po chen po de lta bas na yon tan 'di dag la ltos la chos kyi rnam grangs
163b5: ni bcang bar bya'o/ / zag par bya'o// shad par bya'o// mchod par bya'o// dkon mchog gsum la dad pa mi byed par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa la rtag tu mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
163b6: bstan pa yang dag par gzung bar bya'o/ / 'khor ba las yid skyo zhing bag yod pa dang / 'khor ba skad cig mar yid la byed pa dang ldan par bya'o// yang rgyal po chen po 'dod pa la sten pas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
163b7: mar sdug bsngal ba/ skye ba dang 'gag pa'i sdug bsngal dang / mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal dang dbul ba'i sdug bsngal
163b8: dang / bcad pa dang / gzhom pa dang / brdung ba dang / brdeg pa dang / bsreg pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/ 'du byed thams cad yongs su spangs te 'gro dgos pas rgyal po chen po khyod kyis snying brtse ba gtso bor bya ba dang / chos dang
164a1: thar pa 'dod par bya'o/ / de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'jam dpal la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// chos kyi char phab pas bdag cag
164a2: tshim par bgyis/ rangs par bgyis/ byang chub la rab tu bzhag pas bag yod par bgyis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig chos
164a3: kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dri ba po dang / 'chang ba po dang / klog pa po de dag la me tog dang / spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /
164a4: gos dang / rgyan rnams kyis mchod na/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ rgyal po'am/ blon po 'am/ dge slong
164a5: ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas bcangs pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / yang dag par bstan na des yon/
164a6: tan chen po brgyad thob par 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gang dag 'jig rten na nad dang gnod pa de dag de la thams cad kyi thams cad du mi 'byung ba dang / gang 'jig rten na gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / sha za mdangs 'phrog pa de
164a7: dag thams cad byams pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gshed byed dang / byad dang / sngags dang / ro langs gzhan gyi gnod pa de dag de'i lus la gnod par mi 'gyur ba dang / rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dang /
164a8: dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma thams cad de la dga' zhing mgu bar gyur nas de'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / lha thams cad kyis yongs su gang bar 'gyur ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro bar
164b1: 'gyur ba dang / lag na rdo rjes yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas su skye zhing tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba ste/ yon tan chen po de brgyad thob par 'gyur ro// des ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag la
164b2: debazhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mchod pa dang mngon sum du mchod pas lo 'bum gyi bar du mchod par 'gyur ro/ / gang yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun las byas pas
164b3: gar bar byas te/ lha'i phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog dang / mar me dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / sel snyan dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams kyis lo 'bum du bkur sti byas te rjod cing mchod pas gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
164b4: 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu bstan na de bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems
164b5: can de dag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gzhog cing / bzhag nas kyang lha'i lo stong du yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar rjod cing mchod pa byas gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad
164b6: pa tsam yang nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / gzhan la rgyas par byed na de bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher brjod par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshig su
164b7: bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ / zhing stong bye ba gzhan du gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas mkhas pa mtha' yas bye ba dag/ sems can rnams kyi phyir ni dgongs mdzad cing // ngan 'gro las ni sems can thar bar mdzad// stir med
164b8: las la gnas shing sbyin byed dag/ las byas nas ni ngan 'gror song ba rnams// de dag thar bar bya phyir chos 'dod pas// de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag mchod par gyis// ri mor mchod rten rnam pa sna tshogs byos// gser dang
165a1: dngul dang de ltar lugs rnams dang / 'jim pa'i sku gzugs dag ni byed bcug nas// mchod pa sna tshogs kyis ni mchod par gyis// mar me sil snyan dri dang spos kyis mchod// shes rab che bas bsngo ba dag kyang gyis//
165a2: mdo sde bshad cing 'drir yang gzhug par gyis// de bzhin gshegs dang mdo sde'i gzi brjid kyis// sdig pa'i las las sems can de thar gyis// med byang chub rag par gyur par du// dge ba'i gnas su skye ba 'dzin par 'gyur/
165a3: sngon gyi las rnams rjes su dran 'gyur zhing // dran nas mkhas pa sdig pa byed mi 'gyur// mi yi byang chub sems dpas mdo sde 'di// bshad pa des ni bsod nams mang du thob// de ni lha rnams kun gyis bsrungs par 'gyur// de mi
165a4: lus 'di la ni nad mi 'byung / / de'i rgyal srid kun la gnod mi 'byung // khyim dang grong dang grong khyer zhi bar 'gyur// gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni rtag 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzod ni rtag 'dzin 'gyur// gang zhig mchod cing rjed
165a5: dang 'drir 'jug dang / / las gzhan med par nyan du 'jug pa ni// des ni sangs rgyas yang dag mchod par 'gyur// des ni myur du byang chub mchog rtogs 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
165a6: ltad mo can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di la the tsom skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das ci lus 'dis rgyal srid kyi longs spyod bsgrubs nas slar yang sdug bsngal bsgrubs par 'gyur ram/ 'khor bar
165a7: 'khor ba'i tshe skyo bar mi 'gyur ram/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba rnams myong bar 'gyur zhing ji ltar skye ji ltar 'gum// ji ltar 'tsho ji ltar bde bar sgrub
165a8: par 'gyur/ ji ltar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ltad mo can 'di ni las kyi rkyen yin par blta bar bya'o//
165b1: rigs kyi bu yang 'di la gang yang skye ba med/ 'chi ba med 'tsho ba med de/ rigs kyi bu 'di la rga ba dang 'chi ba med kyi/ 'tsho ba'i khams ni rtag tu lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas so// yang las kyi rkyen dang las kyi gzhis skye ba sna tshogs su
165b2: 'ongs shing 'phos nas bde ba dang / sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/ bde ba la bde bar 'du shes/ sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal du 'du shes/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin la bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin
165b3: pa'i 'du shes skyed mod kyi/ lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du gur gyi bar du skyo ba'i sems skyed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig gos
165b4: sar pa gyon te/ des de gyon nas las thams cad byed cing bde ba dang sdug bsngal yang myong bar 'gyur ro// yang dus gzhan zhig na gos de rnyings shing mugs te dri ma can mthar shad par gyur pa dang / des de dor ba'i chos can du shes nas
165b5: bor ro/ / bor nas yang gos sar pa gsar ma gzhan zhig btsal te gyon no// des gyon na yang las byed cing bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur nas don dam pa'i gos sra zhing brtan la mi shigs shing mi chod pa gyon par ma gyur par
165b6: du gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 'di lta bus bskal pa du ma 'das kyang gos de bgos so she'am/ bor ro zhes mi rtog rnam par mi rtog gi de ni lus kyi dbang du 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang gi tshe 'tsho ba'i khams des lus
165b7: 'jig pa dang / 'gyel ba'i mthar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe lus de bor nas yang sar pa gzhon nu gzhan btsal te/ de de'i las byed cing de bgos nas bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar rang gi bsod nams las skyes pa'i
165b8: gos de 'jam pa dang / sra ba dang / rtsub pa'i bgo ba de bzhin du 'tsho ba'i khams kyis bgo ba lta bu'i lus blangs te/ ji ltar rang gi las kyi rkyen gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa bzhin du lha dang / rgyal po dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud
166a1: 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ lus de yang 'tsho ba'i khams kyi dbang gis 'gro zhing 'tsho ba'i khams kyis yongs su btang yang mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go/
166a2: rigs kyi bu de bzhin du lus gos lta bur blta bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na sbrul ni las kyi rkyen gyis dus kyi mthar shun pa de bor nas rang gi lus kyi gzugs kyis 'gro zhing 'od ste/ bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong
166a3: bar gyur kyang shun pa de mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go/ de bzhin du 'tsho ba'i khams ni sbrul lta bur blta'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na shing lo ma dang mdab mar ldan par gyur pa las/ yang dus kyi rkyen gyis 'jig pa dang
166a4: ltung bar mthar 'gyur ba'i chos can du gyur nas phyis yang dus kyi rkyen gyis myu gu dang / yal ga dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams len te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du las kyi rkyen gyis skye ba dang 'gag par blta'o// /
166a5: rigs kyi bu yang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na sems can dag rnyed pa dang / chags pa dang / khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / nga rgyal mang ba dag 'byung ste/ srang dang gzhal pa la g.yo byed par dga' ba 'dod chags kyi rjes su spyod pa dag 'byung
166a6: ste de dag 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i gzhis sdig pa mang du byed par 'gyur te/ sdig pa mang du byas nas sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur zhing / mi rtag pa la rtag pa'i 'du shes can dang / mi gtsang ba la gtsang ba'i 'du shes can gyis
166a7: sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa byed par mi 'gyur te/ byis pa'i blo can de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi tshol gyi/ gang de lta bu'i sems can de dag la chos ston pa de dag dgod cing rkyal ka byed pa mang bar 'gyur
166a8: gyi dad par mi byed/ yid ches par mi byed de/ de lta bu'i sems can de dag ni sdig pa spyod do// de dag gi 'tsho ba'i khams des las kyi rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du myong bar 'gyur ba'i bgo ba'i lus blangs nas sdug bsngal la dga' ba'i
166b1: 'du shes skyed do/ / rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni las kyi rkyen yin par blta ste/ 'di la su yang 'chi ba med/ 'tsho ba med/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur te/ las kyi rgyu las
166b2: kyi rkyen gyis skye ba dang 'gag par 'gyur ro/ / sems can de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dka' ba spyad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mdzad nas bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ba yongs su btang nas bla na
166b3: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'da' ba la bkod do// de nas de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis sa chen g.yos par
166b4: gyur to/ / ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol to// rgyal po gsal rgyal dang / gzhan yang mthu chen po mthu che ba rdzu 'phrul chen po mang pos lha'i na bza' lnga brgyas de bzhin
166b5: gshegs pa la mngon par mchod nas lus 'dar bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar sdig pa thams cad nyes pa la nyes so zhes so sor bshags te bslab pa la yi
166b6: dam bca' bar bya ste/ ji ltar lpags pa'i 'khor de dag gis tshig 'di skad du smras so// de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba thams cad las slar log pa/ sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las sgrol ba/ grol ba thams cad la phyag bgyi'o//
166b7: phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das slan chad bdag cag skye ba'i 'khor bar sdug bsngal myong bar spro bar mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug
166b8: bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams las grol bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag nan tan snying por byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas dkon mchog gsum la lhag pa'i bsam pa dang
167a1: ldan par byos shig/ 'du byed thams cad mi rtog cing sgyu ma lta bur shes par byos shig/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la spro bar byos shig/ mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / bkur sti mang bar byos shig/ sems can thams//
167a2: cad la mchog tu snying rje bar shes par byos shig/ chos smrab la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par byos shig/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bla mar 'du shes bskyed par byos shig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la bya ba dang /
167a3: bsgom pa dang rgyas par byos shig/ rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal thams cad dang / skye ba thams cad dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa chen po las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/
167a4: 'khor ba'i zhags pa las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la bsgrub par byos shig/ bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog par byos shig/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs
167a5: pa'i bslab pa gcig yud tsam bzung bas kyang sems can rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol zhing bde 'gror 'gro ste ngan 'gror mi 'gro bar 'gyur na/ gang dag dgod pa dang / ku re dang / dga' ba dang / rtsed mo rnams
167a6: yid kyi yongs su spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchog tu mos pas rim gro byed cing lhag pa'i bsam pas zhugs te/ 'phags pa'i nye bar gnas nas gso sbyin yang dag par blangs te spyod pa de dag ngan song gsum du mi skye
167a7: zhing bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / lha dang mi'i bde ba myong nas sdug bsngal mthar byas te/ rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba sa ci smos/ bud med kyi lus nyon
167a8: mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pas nyon mongs par gyur pa la la zhig nyin gcig gam/ nyin ma phyed dam/ yud tsam yang rung ste/ gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba yang dag par len cing bslab pa 'dzin par byed na de dag thams cad
167b1: bud med kyi dngos po dang / sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad rnam par bzlog ste/ sdug bsngal mthar byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar
167b2: du bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu de ltar lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi yi dam 'cha' ba dang bslab pa 'dzin pa yang dag par len par byed pa ni yon tan dang dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dang ldan pa yin na/ byis pa dag gis ni
167b3: de mi shes so/ / de nas de'i tshe na bar snang las sgra chen po byung bar gyur pa dang / 'khor de dag thams cad kyis e ma'o e ma'o zhes dam pa'i sgra byung nas me tog dang / dri'i char chen po rab tu phab po// sems can 'bum tshad pa
167b4: rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do// gzhan yang sems can bye ba rnams sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su
167b5: 'gro ba yid la byed cing / sems dang po bskyed par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang mi snang bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba
167b6: dang / rgyal chen po bzhi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag dbugs phyung ste/ bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan rnams thos
167b7: te/ bcom ldan 'das la chos smra ba dang / 'chang ba dang / 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa dang / sgrogs pa de dag gi yul la ma/ grong khyer ram/ gtsug lag khang rnams bdag cag gi lus dang srog dang yang bsngos te bsrung bar bgyi/
167b8: yongs su bskyab par bgyi/ don thams cad grub par bgyi/ nor dang 'bru rnams legs par bsgrub par bgyi/ thams cad du mchod par 'gyur bar bgyi/ nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi/ dran pa dang / stobs dang /
168a1: spro bsul bar bgyi'o// nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ci nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du nub pa
168a2: mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis byos shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams
168a3: cad dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang lha mo yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
168a4: 'bags pa sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bud d+ha d+harmA/ a tsin d+ha ni de sha/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa
168a5: sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa/ bamapo dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mang po 'dus pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas de na byang chub sems dpa' mang po 'dus pa'i nang
168a6: sa byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du gyur te/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam/
168a7: sa zung ba rnam par dag pa bsam gyis ma khyab snyam// cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bas ma gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
168a8: sangs rgyas 'byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbubasam gyis mi khyab snyam// kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin
168b1: gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab snyam// khacig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
168b2: bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par stsal pa bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/ kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mi chags par spyod pa bsam gyis mi ldab snyam// kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
168b3: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis mkhyen pas byang chub sems dpa' uta pa la'i snying po la sangs
168b4: rgyas kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyi brlabs nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi shugs su gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang bas snang bar gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis kun du khyab par gyur sangs rgyas kyi mi 'jigs pa la
168b5: gnas par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings su 'jug cing 'bab pa dang ldan par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi yul la zhugs par gyur/ chags pa med pa'i rnam par spyod pa med pa bcu rdul yab la gnas par
168b6: gyur/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdung gcig nas gcig tu 'ba' zhig shes par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul brjod du med pa la spyod cing bsgrub par gyur to// de nas uta pa la'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
168b7: dbyings su 'jug pa rtogs shing shes nas yid la chags pa med pa'i dbyings su bsgrubs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas chos thams cad kyi sgrib pa spangs pa dang / kun du bzang po'i smon lam dang ldan par zhugs pa dang
168b8: sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su rtogs shing sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / snying rje chen po'i'o go cha chen po bgos nas sems can thams cad la lta zhing yongs su spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i yid mgyi
169a1: dkyil 'khor brtsams pa dang / skad cig ma'i mthar song ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub pa dang / mi zad pa mthong ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa mngon du bya ba dang / gzungs thams cad snang bar gyur pa dang /
169a2: sor yang dag par rig pa rtogs nas/ uta pa la'i snying po byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi mthus pad ma'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyod pa dpag
169a3: tu med do/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rnam par sprul pa chen po la gnas so// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i mtshan thams cad kyi mdzad pa brnyes so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
169a4: rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi bsam pa dang ldan zhing chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams so sor yang dag par rig pa bzhi brjod du med par ston to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan
169a5: 'das thams cad kyi chos bsam du med pa la gnas so/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sgra dbyangs dpag tu med par 'gro'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams brjod du med pa'i chos kyi dbyings rtogs shing chud
169a6: do/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi khyu mchog sangs rgyas so// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' bsgribs pa med pa la 'jug pa mdor bsdus pa'o//
169a7: kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par
169a8: dag cing ma bsnyos pas thams cad du 'gro ba spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i spyan mtha' da dbus med pas sun mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
169b1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chags pa med pa'i snyan mtha' dang dbus med pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgra bsgribs pa med par gsan pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shangs kyi skye mched mtha' dang dbus med pas
169b2: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mda' mchog brnyes pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ljags che zhing srid pa mtha' dang dbus med pas chos thams cad kyi dbyings su sgra dbyangs kyis 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
169b3: rnams kyi sku mtha' dang dbus med pas las kyi lhag ma ma lus shing sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can gyi rgyud du de bzhin gshegs pa ston cing dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yid kyi las
169b4: mtha' dang dbus med pas chos kyi dbyings kyi sku dbyer med cing dus gsum la ma chags pas rjes su 'gro ba rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa la gnas pa mtha' dang dbus
169b5: med pas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa dang cho 'phrul mi zad pa ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag pa mtha' dang dbus med pas brjod du med pa'i rgyan byin gyis brlabs
169b6: shing nyon mongs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa dang / ya
169b7: shes kyis rnam par rol pa dang / chos kyi yongs su rdzogs shing ye shes kyis rnam par rol pa'i chos yongs su rdzogs pas chos thams cad mngon par byang chub pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
169b8: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bcu'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ston pa bcu
170a1: ste/ bcug she na/ skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'pho bar ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' tshe ston pa
170a2: dang skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par byung bar ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs shing mngon par byang chub par ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig
170a3: rten gyi khams thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas kyis sems can rnams ji ltar smin cing 'dul ba'i dus ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen nas mgu bar
170a4: mdzad pa ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can rnams ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i dmigs bston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi
170a5: khams thams cad du brjod du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing / khyu mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du thams cad rnam par dag
170a6: ston pa dang / skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / dbang po dang / brtson 'grus dang / dad pa sna tshogs kyis spyod pa'i rim pa dang / dus gsum gyi sangs
170a7: rgyas kyi rigs mngon par mkhyen pa ston pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid ston pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
170a8: rnams kyi dus las mi 'da' ba bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba las mi 'da' ba dang / dus de rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus
170b1: mkhyen nas yang dag par dge ba'i rnam par smin pa'i rnam par smin pa las mi 'da' ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lung ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
170b2: ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin cho 'phrul ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas/ sems can rnams ji ltar dad ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku'i byin gyi rlabs
170b3: ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas btang snyoms la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal du 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
170b4: rnams dus mkhyen nas ji ltar rab tu dad pa'i sems can rnams rab tu 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas nyon mongs shing gdul dka' ba'i sems can la me brtsam pas 'dul ba dang / sangs
170b5: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dmigs pa ston pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus de nas dus las mi 'da' ba'o//
170b6: kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul mtshungs pa med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ skyil mo dkrung gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par khyab pa dang / sangs
170b7: rgyas thams cad tshigs su bcad pa'i rtsa ba gcig yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / 'od zer gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par snang ba dang / sku gcig gis sku thams cad du ston pa dang / phyogs gcig
170b8: gis gnas dmigs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sku dang / ye shes gcig gis chos thams cad bsgribs pa med par chud pa dang / dus mkhyen nas sems gcig bskyed pas chos thams
171a1: cad kyi dbyings kyis ma lus par khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba tshad med pa'i rjes su song zhing gom pa gcig la de kho na nyid ston pa dang / dus gsum thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pas khyab pa
171a2: dang / sangs rgyas 'gro ba thams cad dang mi 'dre zhing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo nyid gcig ste gnyis su med par spyod pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul mtshungs
171a3: pa med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ chos thams cad la mi gnas par 'jug cing smon lam mngon
171a4: par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / lus med pa'i lus mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad dngos su med pas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / sems can bdag med pa'i mthar gyur pa la sems
171a5: can 'dul ba mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul thams cad ma lus pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
171a6: sdud pa dang 'gyur ba mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / yul thams cad la mngon par 'du mi byed cing las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i dbyings su mngon par sgrub pa
171a7: mkhyen pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa yang ma yin/ rnam par byang ba yang ma yin par mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa la skye zhing 'god pa'i mtshan nyid rkyen dang 'dra ba tshogs te byung ba mngon par
171a8: sgrub pa mkhyen pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa tshad med pa
171b1: bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ dus gsum thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i cho 'phrul gsum sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su
171b2: gtogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / gzungs dang / tshigs su bcad pa'i rtsa ba rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad dang / de bzhin
171b3: gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang /
171b4: dus thams cad du sems can thams cad la rnam par gzigs shing rtag tu mnyam pas phan par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can thams cad 'dul ba sangs rgyas
171b5: bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dbyings la mi chags par gnas pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / skad cig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs
171b6: rgyas 'byung ba thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang / nyi ma gcig la dus gsum gyi bskal pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa ste/ kye
171b7: rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa tshad med pa bcu'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin du bzang bar dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ bdud kyi
171b8: rgol ba bcom zhing gtor ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin du bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang / gzhan mur 'dug dang pha rol rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa shin du bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re
172a1: chen po dang / sems can thams cad 'dul zhing tshim par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi shin du bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi blar chen po dang / sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams
172a2: thams cad du gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin du bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang / chos kyi dbyings rab tu phigs shing mkhyen pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin du
172a3: bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sku gnyis su med pas sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam par phye ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
172a4: shin du bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad kyis so sor yang dag par rig pa bzhi la 'jug pa'i gnas dang / so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa/
172a5: dang sems can gti mug med cing dang ba'i sems can thos pas 'dul ba shin du bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla ra chen po dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pa spu'i bu ga gcig bzhin du ba spu'i khams thams
172a6: cad nas rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa de snyed gshegs pa gnas pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu gnas 'di bzhin du rim pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul
172a7: dang mnyam pa'i sems can 'byin pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin du bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
172a8: gyis gnas gcig gi rab tu phra ba'i rdul la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rgyan rang bzhin gyis 'tshe rabs chos kyi 'khor lo skor zhing
172b1: sems can 'dul ba rgyun mi gcod la gtong ba med kyang gnod pa med cing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'ang gnod pa med de/ rab tu phra ba'i dul de rgyas par byas pa'ang med/ 'jig rten gyi khams chung ngur byas pa'ang med pa
172b2: chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtags shing mkhyen nas gnas pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin du bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla ra chen po'o// mun pa med pa'i dbyings su de bzhin gshegs pas mngon pa rdzogs par
172b3: sangs rgyas te mun pa dang bcas pa snang bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rab rib med pa/ rnam par rab rib med pa'i gnas la sems can pha rol 'dzud pa dang / de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rjes su
172b4: song ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin du bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zil gyis gnon pa'i chos kyi bla re chen po bcu'o//
172b5: kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na mtho ba med cing shin du rnam par dag pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba shin du bsgrubs te/ thams cad du kha na ma
172b6: thob med ci shin du rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs sngon nas mtho bas 'das pa dang / ma 'das pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rigs thams cad du kha na ma thob med cing
172b7: shin du rnam par dag cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa la mi gnas shing phyi ma'i mam 'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na mtsho
172b8: ba med cing rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos thams cad la gnas pa bcom zhing dus gsum la ma gnas par spyod pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med/
173a1: cing shin du rnam par dag pa'o// sna tshogs kyi blang ba med pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyan gcig pa'i ngo boste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin du rnam par/
173a2: dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams zad mi shes pas sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' mnyam pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
173a3: rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin du rnam par dag pa'o/ / sems can 'dul ba'i dus kyi dbang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzugs dang kha dog mtha' med par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na chags pa
173a4: med par bzhugs te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin du rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jigs pa med pa bzhi brnyes te/ bag tsha ba med par gnas nas khyu
173a5: mchogasang ge'i sgra sgrog ste/ stag chen po ltar rgol ba rnam par gnon cing / me mar lta bu'i kun du rtog pas chos ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi tsha ba thams cad du kha na ma thob mod cing shin du rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas
173a6: bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa'i yang / brjod du med pa'i bskal pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das mod kyi/ 'on kyang ming mang po rnam par rig pas sems can rnams kyi sbyin gnas spyod ste/ ji ltar zhugs pa bzhin no// de srid
173a7: duyun ring po nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyang rung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sbyin gnas bskrun pa ni yongs su zad par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kham mtho ba med/
173a8: ci shin du rnam par dag pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad las ring ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni gnas pa'i sems
173b1: can gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes su dran na sku ston par mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin du rnam par dag pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
173b2: ldan 'das kyi che ba ste/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin du rnam par dag pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin du rnam par dag pa bcu ste/ bcug zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon gyi
173b3: smon lam shin du rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshangs par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi mchags pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag cing shin du rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can
173b4: thams cad phung po las byung bar mdzad pa shin du rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin du rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yog 'khor shin du rnam par dag pa dang / sangs
173b5: rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi sku shin du rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag cing shin du rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku
173b6: shin du rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sgribs pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po shin du rnam par dag pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa dang / rnam
173b7: par gnon par mdzad pa dam pa'i mchog brnyes pa shin du rnam par dag pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin du rnam par dag pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras dus thams cad du 'jig rten gyi yul
173b8: khams thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzad pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab tu rnyed pa'i sems can rnams la dus thams cad du sangs rgyas ston pa dang / dus thams cad du sems can shes kyi sems
174a1: can la tshas ston pa dang / dus thams cad du sangs rgyas la sems rab tu da pa'i sems can la tshad med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / dus thams cad du chos mi 'gyur ba'i lam du 'das pa'i sems can la ye shes rtogs
174a2: par mdzad pa dang / dus thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa dang / dus thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mi chags par bzhud pa dang / dus thams cad du sems
174a3: can thams cad la thugs rje chen po rgyun mi gcod pa dang / dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rnam par sprul pa la bzhugs pa dang / dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas sna tshogs su
174a4: sprul par bzhugs pa dang / dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni dus thams cad du 'jig rten gyi yul khams thams cad na/ sangs rgyas
174a5: bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i tshul mi zad pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom
174a6: ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho ma zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa tshad med pa brnyes pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi spyan
174a7: gyi yul gyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsha mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos thams cad kyi char 'bebs pa'i ye shes
174a8: kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang / kha dog gi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pas sngon gyi mtha' nas smon lam spyod pa'i ye shes kyi
174b1: rgya mtsho mazed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyi ma'i mang mas nasas mad pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can ma lus pa'i ris thams cad kyi sems kyi snod
174b2: pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams zil gyis mi gnon pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
174b3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsha mi zad pa bcu'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan bcu ste bcug zha na/ gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
174b4: thams cad kyi pha rol du phyin cing mngon par byung ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad/ mi mkhyen pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams/
174b5: thams cad la thugs rje che ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshang med pa'i stobs bcu thams cad dang ldan pa'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor
174b6: ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can thams cad 'dul bar zhugs pa'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'go ba thams cad mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mdzad pa'i
174b7: spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pas 'dul ba'i sems can la 'dul ba'i spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gnyis su med par spyod pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid la dbang ba'i
174b8: spyan dang / gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar sems can btul te smin par mdzad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mtha'i phyir sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ston pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs
175a1: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan bcu'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas par ston pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom
175a2: ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi las
175a3: rnam par smin pa mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la gdams pa rjes su bstan pa mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi
175a4: khams rnam par spyod pa'i nan tan mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gdams pa mtha' yas pa bstan la 'god pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang
175a5: chub sems dpa'i rim pa'i khyad par bzhin smon lam gyis 'byung ba mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la sdud pa dang 'gyur ba mtha' yas par ston
175a6: pa'i sgo dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa dang dad pa bzhin ston pa'i sgo dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad ni 'das pa dang /
175a7: 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad gcig nas gcig tu bskal bar bzung ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthus bsdus nas yongs su snang zhing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ya shes rnam
175a8: par rig pa mtha' yas pa'i sgo ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos mtha' yas par ston pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu ste/
175b1: bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gargya// kye skus bstan pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung gis kyang sems can
175b2: nams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzung bas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mi 'dzin pas kyang
175b3: sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa dang chu dang me dang / rlung gis kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
175b4: nibyin gyis rlabs kyi yul gyi dbang gis rtsom pa'i yul thams cad kyis kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan gyis kyang sems can rnams la sangs
175b5: rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhing rtsom pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdza nga mdzad dgasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas kyang sems can rnams
175b6: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad padang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa ste kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can
175b7: rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa bcu'i kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bcu ste/ / bcu ga zhe na/ smon lam rgyun mi gcod cing smon lam brtan pa dang / gnyis su med
175b8: par bshad pa ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po dang po'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu brtson zhing ma zhum par phyi ma'i mtha' bskal par 'gro zhing / yon tan gyi rgyan thams
176a1: cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po gnyis so// brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'dul bar 'os pa'i sems can gcig gzigs na yang mi bzhugs par
176a2: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs te/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po gsum mo// sems can gyi sems mi 'phrogs pa la thugs rje chen po mnyam pa dang / sems can sems rab tu dang ba la thugs rje chen po
176a3: mnyam pa ste/ 'di ni sems cad gyi chos kyi snying po bzhi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byung ba'ang ma yin/ mabyung ba'ang ma yin/ gang nas bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
176a4: byang chub tu zhugs nas nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du byang chub kyi sa pas me 'jig ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po lnga'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
176a5: bsdus nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo bar 'jug cing 'jig rten gyi phyir mi spyod pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po drug go/ thog mar sems kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rjes su lus
176a6: kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las la slob ste/ thams cad mkhyen par bsngo zhing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod par ma yin pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
176a7: paste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bdun no// mtha' yas par 'od thams cad kun du snang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa 'di sdang ba thams cad mtshungs
176a8: pams cad mtshungs par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po brgyad do// 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad spong ba dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba la mi 'dod pa dang /
176b1: 'jig rten thams cad kyis bgos pa'i smon lam thams cad mtshungs par 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad dang ldan pas sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig cing spros pa thams cad med pa ste/ 'di na sems cad gyi chos kyi /
176b2: po dga'o// sangs rgyas kyi yul la dad pas dka' ba dang dka' thub kyi sems bskyed do// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs bsrung ba la brtson pas 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam par sdug bsngal thams cad rig pas reg cing stobs
176b3: dang sa bcu'i bar gyi mthar byung ba ste/ / 'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bana'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom
176b4: ldan 'das rnams kyi mi chags par spyod pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gshegs pa yang ma chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten
176b5: gyi khams pa lus pa thams cad na bzhugs pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na/ 'chag/ bzhengs/ bzhugs pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs
176b6: rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na/ chos ston pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad dang / dgal ldan gnas su gshegs/
176b7: pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phye ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i yang ma chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten
176b8: gyi khams pa lus pa thams cad du tshad med pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gshegs pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sems cad ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la rnam par gzigs shing sems kyi skad cig pa gcig
177a1: la cho 'phrul gsum ston cing sems can 'dul ba yang mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gcig gis tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab par gshegs shing sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa chen po spyod pa yang
177a2: mi chags par spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab par gshegs shing sems can tshad med pa bcu rdul yab ma lus pa thams cad la ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin
177a3: gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi mtha' yas bsdus pa yang mi chags par spyod pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mi chags par spyod pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
177a4: kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas
177a5: b com ldan 'das rnams yan lag drug bcu mchog dam pa dang ldan zhing gsung gi yan lag brgya rtsa lnga yongs su bzung ba brgya stong du mas brgyan pa mtha' dang mu med pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa brjod du med pa'i sangs
177a6: rgyas kyi chos dang / don tshig 'bru rab tu dang ba dang / 'jigs pa med pa chen po mi 'jigs shing bag tshab med par seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pas chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can thams cad la thos pa dang / snang ba dang / shes
177a7: par mdzad pa/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa sna tshogs dang / dbang po sna tshogs kyi rim pa so sor slong zhing 'dul ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung gi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom
177a8: ldan 'das kyi yid kyi las stobs bcus brgyan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad ting nge 'dzin chen pos rgyas shing sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi rgyan gyis shin du brgyan te chags pa med pa'i yul gyi spyod yul pa/ chos kyi
177b1: dbyings la rab tu gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi yan lag brnyes te chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi rgyan dang / sems kyi skad cag ma gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis dus gsum ma lus pa dang / chos thams
177b2: cad kyi dbyings dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad rab tu mkhyen pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyi rgyan dam pa mchog bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis brjod du med pa'i
177b3: 'od bye ba khrag khrig rab tu btang nas/ 'od zer brjod du med pa gcig nas gcig tu 'od zer gyi dra bar bskor cing zhing tshad med pa bcu rdul yab ma lus pa thams cad du snang bar byas pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi mun pa'i rigs ston pa
177b4: ' dzum pa ston pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs du mkha dog brgya stong bye ga khrag khrig tshad med grangs med pa byung bas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi khams la
177b5: snang bas shes par byed cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mi 'bral zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gdon mi za ba phyir mi ldog pa brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung zhing bzhugs
177b6: pa'i sku rnam par dag pas dga' ba med par 'byung ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gzhan du lung ston pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgrib pa
177b7: med par mdzad pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rab rib med pas 'jig rten thams cad du 'dzum pa mdzad pa ston pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos
177b8: kyi sku bsgribs pa med cing rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad la ma chags pa mtha' med pa'i chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa chud pa/ 'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/ 'jig rten thams cad de kho na nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba/
178a1: 'jig rten thams cad 'jig rten las 'das par spyod par 'jug pa'i tshig gi lamachad cing brjod du med par chud dag/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mche dang bral ba de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos
178a2: kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od tshad med pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad dbyer med pa'i 'od brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rgyan kha dog sna tshogs du ma'i rkyen kun nas mi
178a3: 'phrog pa'i 'od/ 'jig rten thams cad la ma chags pa'i 'od/ tshad med pa bsgribs pa med pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod thams cad khang pa ltar gyur pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi rgyan bla na med pa mchog dam
178a4: pa'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi kha dog mtha' yas pa/ kha dog 'tshor ba/ kha dog rang bzhin gyis 'tsher ba/ kha dog tshad med pa/ sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par byed pa'i
178a5: kha dog ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mi zlogs pa'i kha dog dang / kha dog thams cad kyi mchog brnyes pas de las gzhan pa'i kha dog dang / khams gsum gyi kha dog thams cad khyab pa zil gyis mnan pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas
178a6: bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi kha dog gi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba shin du rnam par dag pas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs dge ba rin po che 'byung ba
178a7: 'jig rten thams cad kyis ma smad pa/ khan ma thob med pas chos thams cad kyi de kho na mnyam pa dang mi mnyam par spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs sgrib pa med cing rigs rnam par dag pa thams cad mkhyen
178a8: pa nyid kyi ye shes las byung zhing 'dus pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs dang / gdung rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku byams pa chen po'i stobs kyis
178b1: brgyan pa shin du dang zhing rnyog pa med pa'i kun du rtog pa'i sku'i 'du byed nyams rangs pa/ shin du rnam par bya ba blta bas mi ngoms pa zugs rje chen po'i thugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi sbyin gnas dang / skyabs ming gi mchog blan ma dang
178b2: so sor 'dzin pa rnams la thugs brtse zhing zan par bzhed pa/ sems can thams cad la ye shes chen po'i byin gyis rlob pa bsod nams chen pos 'phags pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams mtha' yas pa'i zhing sems can thams
178b3: cad la yon tan dang ye shes kyi phung po thams cad rnam par 'phel bar mdzad pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byams pa chen po dang thugs rje chen po dang / bsod nams kyi mtha'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa bcu'o//
178b4: kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o// // 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyi mi khyab pa bstan pa/ bam po gnyis pa// // kye rgyal ba'i sras
178b5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag po dbang gis chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi bdag po dbang gis chos thams cad snang bar mdzad pa dang / mtha' med pa'i tshig dang 'brul spobs pa
178b6: chags pa med pas chos ma lus pa thams cad yongs su ston pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag blo'i dbang gi chos dang po'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos ji ltar sems can gnas pa'i
178b7: 'dul zhing yongs su smin pa de ltar sngon lam dang chos ston te/ 'di na sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i chos gnyis so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos kyang sems can gcig
178b8: la yang gnod pa med pa tshad med grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu 'degs pa dang / 'jog pa dang / sdud pa dang / 'phen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
179a1: gcig nas gcig dang / phyogs gcig nas gcig tu 'jog kyang sems can gyi khams kun nas gti mi mug cing the tsom med de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos gsum mo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag
179a2: pos sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad ye shes kyi byin gyi rlabs te/ rgyan sna tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lbab lub dang
179a3: rgyan ston pa dang / grangs med pa'i bskal par 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du nyon mongs pa med pa'i lus su ston cing lhab lbub dang rgyan thams cad kyi kha dog mi zad par ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa thams cad sangs
179a4: rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu kun 'brang bar byin gyis rlob pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos bzhi'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can
179a5: gzigs nas sems can gcig gi phyir brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par dkyil mo dkrung mi 'jig pa gang zag de la dgongs kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang thugs la skyo ba mi mnga' zhing 'dul ba'i dus su de las
179a6: mi 'a ba ste/ ji ltar gang zag re re la yang de bzhin du rim pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mthar tshe la dbang ba byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la kun du bsnyengs pa mi mnga'/ skyo
179a7: pa mi mnga' ste/ de bzhin du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i gang zag gi phyir rim pas rab tu stong ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos lnga'o// sangs rgyas
179a8: bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos sems kyi skad cig ma de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'brang zhing gshegs nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'gyur ba rgya mtsho med bcu rdul yab ma lus pa thams
179b1: cang kyi chos kyi byings gcig nas gcig tu thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa dang / phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rigs kyi dra ba bzlog cing chad med par gshegs te/ chos kyi byings ston pa dang mi 'phrogs pa'i cho
179b2: 'khor la skong ba ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos drug go// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos sems kyi ska/ cig ma la sems can gyi khams 'dul ba'i phyir sems
179b3: kyi skang cig ma la blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang 'di ltar mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'ang med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las mngon par sangs rgyas pa'ang
179b4: med mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraba'ang med/ slob pa'i sa la gnas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par byang chub tu bye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgribs par med par rtogs shing rig pa'ang med de/ sems
179b5: can 'dul ba'i phyir sangs rgyas rnam par sprul pa chen po'i yul rgyun mi gcod cing dpag tu med pa'i ye shes brnyes te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos bdun no// sangs rgyas
179b6: b com ldan 'das kyi bdag pos gang spyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de snyan gyi skye mched kyis kun du sgrub gang snyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de gangs kyi skye mched kyis kun du thug gang shangs kyi skye man
179b7: kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de ljags kyi skye mched kyis kun du sgrub/ gang ljags kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de su'i skye mched kyis kun du sgrub/ gang sku'i skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de thugs kyi skye mched
179b8: kyis kun du sgrug/ gang thugs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de'i bar gyis 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sna tshogs su rtsom zhing 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par phye ba brnyes te// de bzhin
180a1: du rtsom par res sgrub cing sprul pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rtsom pa gcig ji lta ba bzhin du rtsom pa ma lus pa thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dang gi chos
180a2: brgyad do/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang pos rang gi sku'i ba spu gcig gi bu gang sems can re re'i lus kyang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ltar che ba'i sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad bcug cing
180a3: nang du 'dus par mdzad de/ de la sems can re res kyang bskal pa grangs med par gnas kyang sems can de dag la gnod pa yang med/ kun du gnod pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig
