180a4: thu gom pa gcig gis gshegs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gis sangs rgyas byung zhing sangs rgyas byung ba dang / de dag gis brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das te/ de'i dbang gis sems can gyi snying pos brjod du med pa'i
180a5: yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar shes so/ / de la ba spu'i bu ga'i sems can brjod du med pa dag gcig nas gcig tu sangs rgyas su gyur te/ gcig nas gcig tu brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing / gcig nas
180a6: gcig tu brjod du med pa'i chos kyi dbyings ston/ gcig nas gcig tu 'das pa brjod du med pa dang / gcig nas gcig tu ma 'ongs pa brjod du med pa dang / gcig nas gcig tu da ltar byung ba brjod du med pa snang bar byed/ mtha' dang dbus med
180a7: pa'i nam mkha'i khams skabs byed pa ston/ sems can thams cad 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / thams cad skye ba'i skye mched dang / bsgribs pa med pa dang / 'dod chags la yongs su spyod par 'jug pa mkhyen te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
180a8: rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos dgu'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag pos chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad pad mo'i rgyan chen pos brgyan te pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i gdan la de bzhin gshegs
180b1: pa re re bzhugs pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dbyings dang / sku dpag tu med pa dang / byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par rol pa ston te/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gcig pa de ltar 'jig rten
180b2: gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam par sems can gyi snying po re re sems kyiskad cig ma la byin gyis rlob bo/ / sems kyi skad cig ma gcig ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyi skad cig ma thams cad kyang de bzhin no// ji ltar pad ma'i
180b3: le'u dang / rnam par dag cing mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / med bcu rdul yab brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan
180b4: sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su rtsom pa sna tshogs kyi rim pa dang / med bcu rdul yab brjod du med pa'i zhing rnam par dag pa dang / sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid dang / mtshan nyid sna tshogs med pa dang / rigs med bcu rdul yang tshad med pa dang /
180b5: grangs med pa'i dus 'gyur ba dang / mi chags pa ston pa dang / tshad med pa'i blo rgyas pa'i dad pa dang / skad cig ma sna tshogs dang / gnas med pa dang / skad cig ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / tshad med par gshegs pa dang / sems kyi skad cig ma
180b6: dang / sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la thams cad ldan te/ sa rgya bcom ldan das ched du mdzad pa ni mi mang 'o// di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyisangs rgyas kyi bdag pa'i nga gi chos bcu'o// rnal pa'i bras
180b7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos bcu'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang gis bsod
180b8: nams brgya ba'i mtshan de re nas yongs su dag nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ 'ad ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang po'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yol du
181a1: rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
181a2: yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas dang / spyod pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can 'dul zhing yongs su smin par mdzad
181a3: pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi bdag po 'gro ba thams cad gang gis kyang zil gyis mi gnon pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs
181a4: par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhing yongs su dag par mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs nas
181a5: byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad gti mug med par ston pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
181a6: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs na byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas yongs su mya ngan
181a7: las 'da' ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs
181a8: rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyi brlabs ma yin pa'i chos thams cad mkhyen nas spros pa med pa dang / dge ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs ston cing snang bar mdzad de/
181b1: ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa dang po'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad bltar med pa dang / phan tshun shes par mi rung ba dang / ma bcings pa dang / ma grol ba dang / gzung du medapa
181b2: dang / reg par mi rung ba dang / ma byung ba'i chos thams cad la mnga' dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes shing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos de dag thams cad yang dag pa nyid dang / de kho na nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa'i
181b3: chos thams cad dang / bdag med pa dang / gzung ba med pa'i chos rnams kyi de kho na'i mtha' 'a chags pa med pa'i dbang du gyur pa de la dbang gis chen po bslabs te/ bslab pa'i rjes su 'brang zhing chos thams cad la gzigs te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas
181b4: bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa gnyis pa'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma thams cad kyi mtha' dang bral zhing mtshan ma thams cad la mi gnas pa mtshan ma mngon par mkhyen pas mi chags pa
181b5: de'i ngo bo nyid dang ngo bo nyid med pa dang / ji ltar ngo bo nyid smra ba'i tshul gyis rjes su song ba/ grangs med pa'i gzugs kyi mtshan ma'i tshogs kyi sku rnam par dag pa sna tshogs kyi zhing thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang spyod pa'i mtshan ma zad par ston pa mun
181b6: pa'i 'du shes kyi phung po yang dag par rab tu 'chang ba mun pa'i 'gro ba thams cad la sgron ma chen pos snang ba ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa gsum pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i
181b7: mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba la ma chags pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang / chos kyi dbyings la mi gnas pa/ de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid ma byung ba dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas byung ba snang bar
181b8: mdzad pa/ brjod du med par bstan pa/ de ltar tshad med pa'i rigs kyi phyir dang / sangs rgyas kyi phyir blta ba/ sangs rgyas kyi yul kun du gzigs pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bzhi pa'o//
182a1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las mngon par 'du mi byed pa/ blang ba med pa dor ba med pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/ dor ba med pa'i chos kyi gnas kyi pha rol du song ba/ ma nges pa'i rnam pa'i
182a2: mdzod dang / grangs kyi sbyor ba las log par tshogs mtha' yas bsgrub pa dang / sna tshogs kyi rim pa 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i grangs su gtogs pa'i rjes su song ba/ bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi lta ba tshad med mtha'
182a3: yas pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs mngon par 'du mdzad pa/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can rnams 'dul zhing rnam par rig par byed pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa lnga'o//
182a4: chos thams cad bltar med pa dang / sna tshogs med par song ba/ rim pa med par song ba/ ma byung bar song ba/ mtshan nyid med par song ba/ sna tshogs med par song ba/ rgyan med par song ba/ blang ba med par song ba/ ngo bo nyid med par song zhing chos
182a5: thams cad mkhyen te/ chos kyi glong las nges par 'byin pa rab tu mkhyen pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos dang mi 'gal bar mdzad pa/ yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid med par blta ba/ thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa/ ye shes kyis ma lus par
182a6: gzigs pa/ chos thams cad dbang gis snang bar mdzad cing de bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid las mi 'pho ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa drug pa'o// dus gcig tu mtshan ma gcig phan tshun
182a7: togs shing mkhyen pa de chos gsha' mar 'jug pa yongs su mi gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam pa rnam par dag pa/ chos gsha' ma nyid dang / dus thams cad du mi gnas pa de la nyi ma gcig dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo gcig dang / lo brgya
182a8: dang / bskal pa sdud pa dang 'gyur ba'i rjes su 'jug pa 'di ma yin/ ldog pa yang ma yin/ tshad med pa'i dus dang / nyi ma gcig dang / yud tsam gyi dus dang / snga dro dang / nyi ma byed kyi dus dang / phye ma reng dang / srod dang / nam gyi gung dang / tho
182b1: rangs kyi sa dang / zhem dang / thangs su gtags pa dus dang / zhag dun dang / zlab bye kyi ngas dang / zlab gcig dang / mgacig dang / la brgyang dus dang / bskal pa gcigag sa dang chang ma / grangs ma pa dang / mam thas
182b2: byab pa/ brjod du med pa'i dus dang / phyi ma'i dus kyi mtha'i ba rtso ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'ang med/ ldag pa'ang med/ rgyun kyang mi gcod/ sbyor ba'ang med/ mtshams su'ang mi 'gyur/ mi 'dor/ mi 'gro/ migayo// ring ba
182b3: rang ma yin te mtha' la yang gnas pa ma yin te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bdun pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / tshad med pa'i
182b4: mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa grangs med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa tshad med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa gnas pa med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mtha'
182b5: yas pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa kun nas gzung ba med pa dang / de kho na nyid so so yang dag par rig pa dang / tshig dang / tshul dang / rtog pa so so yang dag par rig pa dang chos thams cad so so yang dag
182b6: par rig pa dang / ji ltar bsam pa dang / dad pa dang / dbang po dang / ji ltar btags pa'i chos rnams dang / chos kyi gzhung gi mtshams ston pa dang / de dang de dag tu brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi thog ma
182b7: dang bar ma dang / tha ma'i mdo yang dag par rab tu ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa brgyad pa'o// ming med pa dang / ming dang / rigs dang / 'byung ba yang / chos thams cad kyi ming dang 'byed pa dang /
182b8: khams 'bar ba dang / mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / 'das pa med pa'i ming dang / ma 'ongs pa med pa'i ming dang / da ltar byung ba med pa'i ming dang / sems can med pa'i ming dang / zhing med pa'i ming dang / chos med pa'i ming dang / yon tan med/
183a1: pa'i ming dang / byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i ming dang / sangs rgyas med pa'i ming dang / grangs med pa'i ming dang / grangs med pa ma yin pa'i ming dang / ma byung ba'i ming dang / mi 'gog pa'i ming dang / med pa'i ming dang / med pa ma yin pa'i
183a2: ming dang / gcig ma yin pa'i ming dang / rnam pa thams cad ma yin pa'i ming rang bzhin gyis brjod du med pa'o// chos thams cad ni phyogs ma yin/ brda ma yin/ ngag gi lam gyi sgra dang bral ba/ sgra byung ba thams cad kyis ma bsgrubs pa/ ma bskyed pa
183a3: dang / sna tshogs su bskyed pa dang / rnam pa gcig ma yin pa dang / rnam pa mang po ma yin pa dang / smra ba thams cad brjod du med pa'i dam pa'i pha rol du phyin pa brnyes pa/ kun du mi rtog pa'i yul mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang ldan pa/ rtog pa dang / kun du rtog
183a4: pa dang / yongs su rtog pa thams cad 'gags pa/ smra ba thams cad la mi gnas pa gnas pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa dgu'o// gzugs kyi chos thams cad ma skyes par mkhyen te/ tshe rab
183a5: ma yin/ spros pa ma yin/ grangs ma yin/ 'du shes kyi spyod pa ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin/ len pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ rang bzhin gyis ni bar rab tu mkhyen/ skye mched med par 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dbyings mi dmigs pa
183a6: dang / chos thams cad mi 'jigs pa dang / chos thams cad ldang ba med de rang bzhin gyis nam mkha' dang mnyam pa/ chos thams cad dben pa las ma yin pa/ spyod pa med pa las byung ba/ ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/ grangs med par gtogs pa/ yod pa
183a7: ma yin pa/ med pa ma yin pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byung ba ma yin/ ming med pa/ gzhab ma ma yin pa/ mi gnas pa/ yongs su mi gnas pa/ yongs su smin pa ma yin pa/ dul ba ma yin pa sems
183a8: can med pa/ sems can med pa ma yin pa/ srog med pa/ srog med pa ma yin pa/ rkyen med pa/ rkyen med pa ma yin pa/ rkyen dang 'dra ba med pa ma yin par chos thams cad mkhyen te/ chos thams cad kyi dbyings ston pa'i dam pa'i pha rol du phyin pa des
183b1: pa/ tshogs gsum pa rnam par gnas pas ngas pa dang / mdes pa dang / leg pa rangs pa dang / mnges pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs bcu dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhirnam par dag pa dang / sangs
183b2: rgyas kyi yul chen po ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bcu pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bcu'o// kye rgyal
183b3: ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs yangs pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa gang gis kyang tshad gzung bar mi nus pa/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da
183b4: ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' dang / chos thams cad kyi dbyings dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
183b5: thams cad du dga' ldan du skye ba ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' med pa dang / kha dog tshad med pa dang / gzi brjid tshad med pa dang / snang tshad med pa dang / dbyings tshad med pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag
183b6: rnam par dag pa tshad med pa dang / sgra sgrogs pa rnam par rig pa tshad med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin chad med pa la gnas pa dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyi yul tshad med pa dang / mtha' dang 'jig rten du bcas pa rjes su 'dzin pa dang / bdud du bcas tshangs
183b7: par bcas/ dge sbyong dang / bram zer bcas pa dang / skye dgu dang / lha dang / mir bcas pa dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten rjes su 'dzin pa/ mi 'phrogs pa'i byams pa chen po'i spyod yul ba/ snying rje chen po la phyogs pa'i mtha' la phyogs pas sems
183b8: can rjes su 'dzin pa/ gzhan mtho ras su skye ba'i sems can rjes su 'dzin pa/ bsod nams kyi stobs kyi dbang po phun sum tshogs pa/ dbang po rnam par dag pa dang / sems cad shes yongs su dag pa'i sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa/ theg pasnga
184a1: tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa/ theg pa chen pa yongs su rdzogs pa mams can yang rjes su 'dzin pa/ 'gro ba rnams cad las 'byung ba sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa ste/ da nas sa
184a2: bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa dang / spyod pa rnam par dag pa rdzogs pa'o// dga' ldan gnas nas 'pho zhing yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i cha dang / bdag lus su skye ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu spyod pa dang / sprul pa wA
184a3: bu'i ting nge 'dzin la thug pa dang / mig yor lta bu'i rnam par rig pa dang / yul nam mkha' ltar tshad med par song ba/ 'dod pa lta bur skye ba la ma tshigs pa/ smig sku dang mnyam par snang ba/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la 'bring ba/ gnas med pa'i
184a4: ye shes la 'jug pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam par dag pa/ bla re dang rgyan chen po'i mdzod pa dag gi lus skye ba'i mtha' yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / rin po che chen pos spras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa rin po ches
184a5: mchong ba'i gnas chen po la gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / yid la byed pa chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / rnam par sprul pa chen
184a6: po'i mdzod ston pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / ye shes chen po'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / ma las skyes pa de la gnas pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / yul chen po
184a7: sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu brnyes pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mad pa dang / 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs mtha' yas pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po la rnam par spyod cing mnyam
184a8: par 'jog pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de dang de dag las bzhengs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma dang / spyod pa dang po nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i mtha'i
184b1: bar bas pang sangs rgyas kyi mdang pa mad pa dang / sa 'denas gnyis kyi par du thams cad byin gyis brlabs nas skyes 'dag tan gyi grangs lags par ston pa dang / gab brjod patshogs kyis kyang 'jig tan thams cad du rangs rgyu du
184b2: mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / gzhon nur gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / byang chub sems dpar gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / mngon par byung ba dang / rdzogs par
184b3: sangs rgyas pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kyang 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang sna tshogs
184b4: kyis kyang 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten dpag tu med pa dang / 'jig rten kun dang / phyogs thams cad du rgya tsho'i rgyun dang / rigs kyis 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / zhing dang dus
184b5: ma lus pas 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa ma lus pas 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sems can gyi rigs ma lus pas 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /
184b6: 'chi 'pho zhing skye ba dang / rigs ma lus pas kyang 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sprul pa chen po dang / rigs dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang / chos dran pa'i sgo'i 'khor los kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs
184b7: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gnyis pa'o/ / dge bar spyod pa las rnam par dag pa dang / skye ba thams cad dang / ye shes dang / spyod pa rnam par dag pa dang / skye ba bstan pa'i rjes su song ba dang / sems can 'dul zhing rjes su
184b8: chud par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / sems can rnams la dgos pa'i sgras ston pa'i rjes su song zhing sangs rgyas thams cad 'dod chags dang bral te gnas la gnas pa dang gnas pa med pa dang / sgra
185a1: dbyangs thams cad dang bral bar so sor rtog pa dang / srid pa thams cad dang / ming dang srid par 'byung ba la rtog pa dang / dngos po thams cad ye shes su 'jug pa dang / tshul khrims thams cad mkhyen pa'i mthar yongs su rdzogs
185a2: par byed pa dang / snying rje chen pos slas ltar 'gro ba la rnam par lta ba dang / byams pa chen pos sems yul la so sor rtog pa dang / dga' ba chen pos 'jig rten la mngon par dga' ba shes par byed pa dang / btang snyoms chen pos sems
185a3: la dbang sgyur zhing 'jug par byed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan bdag la yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du lus mngon par sgrub pa dang / thams cad du gnas pa med pa'i lus yongs su
185a4: rdzogs par byed pa dang / g.yog 'khor thams cad rnam par dag par nan tan byed pa dang chos ston cing smra brjod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po smad pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyes pa rtog pa ji ltar spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi rnam par smin
185a5: pa ston pa dang / ji ltar gnas pa'i sems can rnams 'dul ba dang / yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / ji ltar yongs su smin pa 'dul ba dang / thabs la mkhas pa grangs med pa mngon par sgrub pa dang / sangs rgyas
185a6: kyi mdzad pa las mi ldog par ston pa dang / spyod pa'i sgo sna tshogs kyi chos snang bar byed pa dang / gnas med pa'i rnam pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa byed pa dang / snying rje chen po skyes pa'i chos kyi sprin mngon par 'bebs
185a7: bar byed pa dang / sbrang bu 'gro ba ltar byams pal 'jug cing tshe 'phrul gsum yongs su 'bebs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la lta ba rnam par rig cing rdzas kyi dbus su 'dug pa ston pa dang / de las mtha'i mtha' dang / dbus
185a8: med pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ston pa dang / ye shas chen po la gnas pas gnon cing bsgribs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub bapa dang / las kyi mtha'i chos gsum la thabs mkhas pa ste/ lus kyi las/
185b1: shin du rnam par dag pa dang / ngag gis mi 'gro ba'i ye shes shin du rnam par dag pa dang / yid kyi las zab mo chags pa med pa'i mthar byin pa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi don mdzadade/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
185b2: 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gsum pa'o/ / mngon par byung ba'i rnam par rgyal ba chen pos slas tshad med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa yid du 'ong ba spangs te/ 'byung ba'i spyod pa ston cing 'jig rten gnas pa'i sems can 'dzud pa dang /
185b3: 'jig rten mngon par chags par 'gyur bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi grangs mi rtog go zhes shes par byed pa dang / 'jig rten tshogs la mngon par chags pa zlog par byed pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dga' ba'i sred pa gcod pa dang / nyon mongs pa
185b4: spangs pa 'jig rten spyod du 'jug pa dang / don thams cad rjes su dran par byed pa dang / 'byung ba'i don gyi phyir 'brang bar byed pa dang / byin pa'i mtshan ma yongs su gtong bar ston pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la sbyor zhing gnas par byed pa dang /
185b5: sngon gyi smon lam yos su rdzogs par byed pa dang / dpag tu med pa'i yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byed pa dang / ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor sa sor rnyed par byed cing sems can rnams kyi se shes pa'i rab rib la na ba dang / bdag phran
185b6: med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pas 'gro ba thams cad nye bar khrid pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'dra zhing sangs rgyas las bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skye dgu thams cad la bsngags pa dang bdag ye shes kyi don mthong bas/
185b7: ston pa dang / sems can rnams la rnam par dag pa'i sgo brjod pa dang / sems can rnams la kha na ma thob med pa'i sgo sgrub tu 'dzud pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la 'byung ba'i sgo rab tu ston pa dang / mngon par 'byung zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i
185b8: rgyal mtshan kun sbed par byed pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bzhi pa'o// mdzad pa dang ye shes du ma dang rab tu ldan pas byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi
186a1: mthar phyin nas byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pas chos thams cad thugs su chud dade/ bdud kyi stobs rab tu bcom zhing zil gyis mi non pa'i sku'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzod dang chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du khyab par byedapa
186a2: dang byin gyi rlabs mi zad pa'i mthas mtha' rnam par spangs pa dang / tshad med pa'i spyod pa rab tu brnyes pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul la rnam par rol pa'i ye shes kyi don gyi rjes su gshegs pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan bsgrubs
186a3: pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du spras pa'i gdan yongs su gsal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rig par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
186a4: spyod pa'i mchog rab tu brnyes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / yang dag pa'i khyad par gyi smon lam la rnam par lta ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dgongs pa dang / zab mo'i
186a5: byang chub sems dpa' la chos zab mo'i 'khor lo skor ba dang / tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rtsom pa dang / brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung gnas kyi phyir 'brang zhing sna tshogs kyi spyad pa spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
186a6: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi rlabs kyi yul du byas pa dang / sems can la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par rig par byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dbyer med pas 'gyur ba'is
186a7: dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i stobs la gnas shing yon tan thams cad kyi khyad par ma lus pa'i mtha' rab tu rnyed de 'dug pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du 'gro ba dang / sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i
186a8: mthar 'gro ba dang / zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang / chos thams cad du 'gro ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du 'gro ba dang / yongs su smin pa thams cad du 'gro ba dang / dus thams cad du 'gro ba dang / 'dul ba thams cad du 'gro ba
186b1: dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rol par 'gro ba dang / 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad kyi dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par chud par byed pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
186b2: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lnga'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor te/ 'jig rten thams cad mngon par shes par byed pa'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang / ma
186b3: lus pa thams cad du ma lus par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mi 'jigs pas seng ge'i sgra chen po'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang chos thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod dang / mun pa med pa'i chos kyi mdzod kyi sgo snang ba'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang
186b4: nam mkha' ngos ltar chags pa med pa'i ye shes tshad med pa'i tshul gyi 'khor lo dang / chos thams cad bo nyid med pa'i ngo bo nyid bsgribs pa med pal so sor rtog pa'i tshul gyi 'khor lo dang / sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par
186b5: dag pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi sgron ma'i tshul gyi 'khor lo dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos snang bar byed pa'i tshul gyi 'khor lo dang dus gsum du 'jig rten thams cad la khyab pa'i tshul gyi 'khor lo dang / sangs rgyas thams cad
186b6: kyi gcig tu sdug pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos dang mi 'gal ba'i tshul gyi 'khor lo dang / de la sogs pa grangs med pa'i rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi chos kyi 'khor lo skor te/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod par 'gro ba'i
186b7: chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/ / 'di ltar chos kyi 'khor lo skor bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa drug pa'o grong
186b8: dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ mi'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / lha'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang / klu'i rgyal po 'itho brad dang /
187a1: gnod sbyin gyi rgyal ba'i bo brang dang / dri ci'i rgyal ba 'pho brang dang / lham yin gyi rgyal ba ba brang dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal ba pho bra dang / ma'am ci'i rgyal bar pa bra dang / stong phya ngan pa'i rgyal bar phabrang
187a2: dang / 'bar ba'i rgyal po'i ba brang dang / sha zi'i rgyal ba'i po brang de dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jug pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ gang 'di gong byer gyi sgor gshegs nas sa g.yon 'od zer gyi sna bas
187a3: long ba rnams ni sa sor mig thog/ 'on pa rnams ni so sor smra thos/ smyon pa rnams ni so sor dran pa rnyed/ gcer bu rnams kyang so sor gos rnyed/ sdug bsngal ba rnams ni so sor ba bathob/ sil snyan dang brdung ba rnams mardungs
187a4: bar yid du 'ong ba'i sgraskad 'byin pa dang / brdu ba ma brdungs pa dang / 'phyang 'phrul rnams 'phyang ba dang / brdungs pa'i sgra dang / bram ze sna tshogs mang po rnams kyi sgra skad yid du 'ong ba dang / ltabs mi ngoms shing mi mthun pa med pa
187a5: gzugs kyi sku ston pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bstan pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / kun du
187a6: gzigs pa dang / rnam par gzigs pa dang / brkyang ba dang / bskum pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / byon pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / 'chag pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / gzims
187a7: pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / chos 'chad pa dang / cang mi gsung bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / rdzu
187a8: 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / ston pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sna tshogs kyi sems can gyi bsam pa rgya mtsho ma lus pa
187b1: dang / 'jig rten gyi spyod pa grangs med pa thams cad dang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs
187b2: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs lta bas mi ngoms pa'i phyir 'brang ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams 'byung zhing skye ba dang / smra ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang / smra ba shin du dkon pa dang / dkar po'i chos thams cad dang / bsod nams
187b3: kyi 'byung gnas dang / sangs rgyas mnyes par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog mtha' yas pa la 'jug pa dang sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon du rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi tshogs
187b4: bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rtog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa zhing thams cad la gzigs shing 'jug pa dang / 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad nye bar spyod pas kyang 'jig rten gyi sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzadapa
187b5: rang/ de dag dad pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba'i las dang / rjes su ston pa dang / tshig tu 'byin pa dang / yang dang yang du yid la byed pa dang / mngon par lta ba dang / mngon du dran pa dang / sems dang bas sangs rgyas la sdug par sems
187b6: pa'i sems can rnams la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sems can rnams la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas
187b7: lta bar 'dod pa'i sems can rnams la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i ro dang / sangs rgyas 'byung bas 'jig rten thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang kha dog mtha' yas pa
187b8: la lta ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'dzin pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / dad pa sna tshogs dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kha
188a1: dog dang dbyibs sna tshogs tshad med pa la lta ba'i sems can rnams la yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra thos pa'i sems can rnams la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi
188a2: mdzad pa mdzad de/ / de la sogs pa'i mtha' med bsam gyis mi khyab brjod du med pa'i rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug cing 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa
188a3: thams cad nga sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i stobs ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul ba las mi 'da' ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad las 'jig rten thams cad 'dzud de/ yul las phyir mi ldog cing thugs rje chen po
188a4: gtong ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam la mi skyo ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad la rtog pa dang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la gnas shing dge ba rgyas pa tshad med pa brnyes te 'di ni
188a5: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bdun pa'o/ / dgon pa na bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zhi bar bzhugs pa dang / dben pa na bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
188a6: zhi bar bzhugs pa dang dben pa na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la bzhugs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin chen po la gnas shing bzhugs pan gcig pur dgyes pa na bzhugs pa dang / su bltar mi snang bar bzhugs pa dang / ye shes
188a7: zab mo la gnas shing bzhugs pa dang / dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi stobs la bzhugs pa dang / spu'i spyod pa ltar med pa la bzhugs pa rdzun mi gcod pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad
188a8: la 'jug pa dang sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul zhing gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i ye shes dang / smon lam gyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas lha yongs su tshal zhing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang /
188b1: dang sangs rgyas klu yongs su tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas nam mkha' lding yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas mi 'am ci yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas lto 'phye chen po yongs su tshol ba dang /
188b2: sangs rgyas 'bar ba yongs su tshol ba dang / sangs rgyas mi dang mi ma yin pa yongs su tshol ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas yongs su tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi
188b3: mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / chos ston pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas gcig gi mthus kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mthus kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la
188b4: 'jug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i khyad par dang / smon lam gcig tu bsdus pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi spyod pa rnam par phye ba dang / spyod pa'i rim pa'i mthu dang / 'jig rten gyi yul dang / sangs
188b5: rgyas kyi yul gyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul dang / 'jig rten gyi yul gyi mthu dang / yul ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthus kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin par dang / zla ba phyed dang / lo gcig
188b6: dang / bgrang bar gnas na bzhugs pa nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par gnas na bzhugs pa'i bar gyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs
188b7: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa brgyad pa'o/ / khang pa lta bur gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam par sbyangs par gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rnams dad par gyur pa dang mos
188b8: bar gyur pa la sems 'jug cing sgrub par gyur pa dang / dbang po rnams 'dul bar gyur pa dang / sems can dang skye dgu thams cad la dad par gyur pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad 'byung bar gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
189a1: bskur bar gyur pa dang rtog pa la gnas shing ye shes snang bar gyur pa dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mya ngan las 'das pa ston cing sangs
189a2: rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa dang / 'jig rten mi rtag par ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi snang bar mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa dang / byas pa'i dgos pa'i mtha' bsdus pa dang / ngo bo ma tshang ba med pas chos la 'jug pa snang bar byed
189a3: padang / rtsa ba bcad pa la srid pa'i mig snang bar byed pa dang / sems can rnams la skyo bston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rjes su song ba'i sems dang 'thun par byed pa dang / sems can rnams la tshe'i mtha' ston pa dang / sems can
189a4: thams cad la 'jig rten gyi mngon par mi dga' ba nye bar ston pa dang / sems can rnams ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba la mnyes par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bltar mi snang ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor zhing
189a5: rnam par chung bar mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten spro ba snang bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas sems rtsom pa dang ldan pa dang / ldan par 'jog pa dang / dus su de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran zhing lta ba rnam par dag pa'i yongs su rtog pa'i sems
189a6: can rnams la sems can rnams spong bar mdzad pa dang / dbang po skyo ba zlog cing yongs su spyod bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba thams cad sgrub par 'dzud pa dang skyo ba rnyed pa'i sems can rnams la byin gyis rlob pa
189a7: dang 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi brtsam par dgongs pa'i rkyen brnyes pa dang / lus gyes pa thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus sems can rnams 'dzin pa dang / 'jig rten gyi sems can
189a8: 'khrugs pa dang myos pa rnams sdom pa la 'jog par mdzad de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dgu pa'o// kye de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mya ngan las 'das nas 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams
189b1: thams cad smre sngags 'don pa dang / dra ba dang / mya ngan smos pa dang / mchi ma byung bar 'gyur te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / thugs rje chen po zhes bya ba dang / ded dpon chen po zhes bya ba dang / thugs brtse ba zhes bya ba
189b2: dang lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mgon du gyur pa/ skyabs su gyur pa/ dpung gnyen du gyur pa/ bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing 'das par gyur ces pa dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung bar
189b3: dga' ba zhes pa dang rnam pa 'di lta bur spre sngags 'don/ mya ngan slas shing sangs rgyas mthong ba rjes su dran pa'i sems can rnams tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa ste/ de dang de dag du sems can gyi bsam pa dang yid
189b4: la byed par yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang / dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du su gdung dang ring bsrel byin gyis rlab de/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
189b5: lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho phye chen po dang / mi'i gnas thams cad du ji ltar 'dul ba dang / ji ltar dad pa bzhin du su gdung dang ri bsrel byin gyis rlob ste/ rang gi sku bor nas tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis
189b6: mi byag/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par sku gdung dang ring bsrel byin gyis rlob cing / gang 'di'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams kyi dad pas mchod pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams kyi
189b7: lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams yongs su sbyangs pa'i de ba dang / sems can rnams kyi 'dul ba'i dbang dang / sems can rnams kyi bsod nams
189b8: kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang dang / sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par rtsom pa'i dbang dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi rgyan sna tshogs yul dang / ljongs sna tshogs kyi sems can rnams dge
190a1: ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba'i dbang dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung bgos shing 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod rten du byas shing yul dang phyogs der lha'i gnas sam/ klu'i gnas sam/ gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha ma yin dang /
190a2: nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang / mi'i gnas dang / 'bar ba'i gnas su sku gdung dang ring bsrel mchod par 'gyur/ sku gdung dang / ring bsrel dang / dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten dang / sangs
190a3: rgyas bzhugs par mchod rten brtsigs pa 'gro ba thams cad nges par sangs rgyas rjes su dran par 'gyur/ chos kyi phyir 'brang bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun la dad pa so sor rnyed par 'gyur/ yul dang phyogs de dang der gnas shing rgyun mi
190a4: 'chad par mchod par bsam pas gnas nas/ sbyin pa byin zhing bsod nams byed par 'gyur te/ de dang de dag mtho ris kyi yongs su dag pa so sor rnyed par 'gyur/ rigs chen po so sor rnyed par 'gyur longs spyod chen po dang / g.yog 'khor rnam
190a5: par dag pa so sor rnyed par 'gyur/ lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa so sor myong bar 'gyur/ ngan par mi ltung ba'i nan tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ de dag sangs rgyas byung ba na gti mug med pas sgrub par 'gyur/ dkar po'i chos
190a6: la gnas pa so sor rdzogs par 'gyur/ / khams gsum nas 'byung ba'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// ji ltar theg pa la dad pa dang / smon lam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/ de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la shed byas pa gzobaso
190a7: song rnyed par 'gyur te/ phyir 'brang ba dang / gnas dang / mgon dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas kyang bsam gyis mi/
190a8: khyab pa'i sbyin gnas skyong ste/ bsod nams yongs su mi gnas pa'i sbyin gnas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du sgru ba 'di lta bu'i rnam pa mang por sems can rnams kyi dag pa'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing bsod nams kyi tshigs yongs
190b1: su rdzogs par 'gyur te 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu pa'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i zas 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yangs pa dpag tu med pa bsam
190b2: gyis mi khyab pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par gzhan 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad kyi lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa gang gis kyang tshad gzung bar mi nus/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos
190b3: dang / rang sangs rgyas su bcas pas kyang 'jug par nus pa ma yin no// / 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa// / bam po gsum pa// / kye rgyal ba'i sras
190b4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo chos kyi dbang po'i chos mi gnyis par 'gro ba bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad lung ston te/ mi gnyis par 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas
190b5: bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa sna tshogs med bcu rdul yab brjod du med par gshegs pa mi gnyis pa dang / chos kyi don ma lus pa thams cad las rdzogs par sa
190b6: rgyas pa'i sku mi gnyis pa dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa dang / 'byung ba'i skad cig ma'i mtha'i ye shes mi gnyis shing thog ma'i mtha' dang tha ma'i mtha' dang
190b7: da ltar byung ba gnyis su med pa dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / sangs rgyas gcig gi zhing gi rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa ye shes gnyis su med pa dang / sangs rgyas gcig gi gsung dang / sangs rgyas thams cad
190b8: gsung gnyis su med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dul ba dang / rab tu phags pa dang / rnam par rig pa gnyis su med pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi chos nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid gnyis su med pa dang 'das/
191a1: pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gnyis su med de/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnyis su med
191a2: pa'i chos kyi dbang po'i chos kyis mi gnyis par gshegs pa'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos thams cad la nan tan gyis gnas pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom
191a3: ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings la gnas shing ye shes kyi rjes su sangs rgyas pa la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji ltar smon lam gyis 'byung ba la gnas pa dang /
191a4: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can yongs su mi gtong zhing 'dul ba la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngo bo med pa la rab tu gnas pa'i chos nyid la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don med pa ma yin pa dang /
191a5: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams skal ba mnyam pa ma yin par gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtag tu sems mnyam pa la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma nyams pa'i dbang po la gnas pa dang //
191a6: @sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems chags pa med par spyod pa la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug cing mi 'jigs pa yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid la gnas pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
191a7: 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos thams cad kyi nan tan la gnas pa bcu'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par mkhyen pa bcu ste/ bcu
191a8: gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'das pa'i grangs thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / ma 'ongs pa thams cad kyi grangs thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi grangs thams
191b1: cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / ngag thams cad kyi la ma thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'ag thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi bo'i ye shes thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / byang chub
191b2: sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po dang / sna tshogs rnam par gnas pa'i mtshan nyid dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang / bsam pa tshad med pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i mtshams kyi skad cig ma'i ye shes yod/
191b3: su rdzogs par byed pa thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad rkyen dang 'du ba tshogs par khong du chud pa thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rigs rab tu 'byed pa'i ye shes mthong sa/
191b4: thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbye ba mig 'phrul mkhan gyis rnam par phye ba ltar thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos thams cad ma lus par mngon/
191b5: par mkhyen pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs chen po dang / stobs dang / stobs tshad med pa dang / stobs kyi bdag nyid che ba dang / bzod par dka' ba'i stobs dang yongs su ma nyams pa'i stobs dang /
191b6: snying po'i stobs dang / mi phyed pa'i stobs dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs dang / sems can thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa'i stobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal gyi chos bcu ste/ bcug
191b7: zhe na/ gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi sku pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis mi phyed pa dang / 'tsho ba'i dbang po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis mi chod cing / dug gis mi 'jigs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'tshig pa'i me'i
191b8: bskal pas mi tshig pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sdud pa dang 'dzin pa'i chu'i phung po'i chus mi 'chi ba dang / bdud thams cad dang / bdud kyi sde thams cad dang / lha thams cad kyi stobs dang / klu thams cad dang / gnod sbyin thams
192a1: car dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i stobs dang / sha za dang / 'bar ba thams cad kyi stobs dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi dmag ge
192a2: stobs kyis mi tshugs pa dang / ri rab lhun po'i ri dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje'i char 'bebs pa dang / gzhan yang khor yug chen po'i ri dang mnyam pa dang / gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshad kyi rdo rje'i char babs te/ des bcom
192a3: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ba spu yang mi 'gul/ bag tsha ba yang mi 'gyur/ bzhud pa dang / bzhengs pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal ba'i spyod lam sbed pa'ang mi mnga' ste/ yul gang
192a4: de bzhin gshegs pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun du rnga tsam du bzhed pa kun du de tsam dum zababo/ / sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa la yang gtses par ma gyur sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can la yang gtses par ma gyur na de
192a5: bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mi 'khrugs pa lta ci smos te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos dang po'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhed na chos thams cad kyi kyi
192a6: mchog ma lus pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / ri rab lhun po'i ri dang bcas khor khor yug dang khor yug chen po'i ri dang bcas/ rgya mtsho'i r-i dang nags stug por bcas pa dang / sems can gnas pa'i gnas
192a7: sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i baspu'i zug gcig tu bcug ste/ tha ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mthar bzung na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma gtogs par sems can
192a8: gzhan gyis shes par mi nus so/ / 'jig rten gyi khams du ma de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sku'i baspu'i bu gang bcu ga nas tha ma'i mtha'i bskal par bzung ste bzhengs pa dang / zhud pa dang / bzhugs pa dang / mnal ba dang / bskal par
192b1: gshegs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs la skad cig kyang sdug bsngal du mi 'gyur/ skyob mi mnga' ste/ stobs dang mthu yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/ spyod lam la rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta
192b2: ste dper na nam mkha' ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dzin te/ 'bying ba ma yin/ zhum pa ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin/ 'gro ba ma yin/ 'byung ba ma yin/ skye ba ma yin rnam pa la ma yin
192b3: no/ / de bzhin dra sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams pa su'i bug gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kun 'dzin kyang de'i phyir sdug bsngal tshar ba'i sems skye ba gcig kyang mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
192b4: ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos gnyis pa'o/ / gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gos pa gcig gi spyod pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu
192b5: bra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'da'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu pa ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal bar gom pas spyod do// du ma'i sems skye zhing 'jug pa de ltar gshegs shing
192b6: 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par gshegs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sems bskyed pa bzhin du bskal par gshegs shing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i
192b7: rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun gnas shing tshad med pa dang / khor yug chen po'i ri brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par 'gyur ba dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thad dpa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa 'das shing
192b8: ba spu'i bu ga gcig 'gag par 'gyur te/ ji ltar ba spu'i bu ga gcig pa de ltar sku'i ba spyi'i bug thams cad de/ sems can thams cad ji snyed pa ba spu'i bu gar gyur la de ltar sems can thams cad lci bar gyur la sems can de dag
193a1: thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sar ma gcig gi rtse mos tha ma'i mtha'i bskal par 'dzin te/ ngika song po gcig gis dang po 'dzin pa de ltang sor ma thams cad kyi rtso mos 'dzin pa da'i phyir de bzhin gshes
193a2: pa'i sku bsnyel ba yang mi mnga' thugs la skyo bar yang mi 'gyur/ sdug bsngal gyi reg pa tshor ro snyam pa'i sems phra rab gcig tsam yang mi skye'o// de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams re rer gshegs shing 'jug pa dang nam mkha' la gshegs
193a3: shi 'jug pa dang / rgya mo'i phyogs thams cad du gshegs shing 'jug pa dang / de ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' ma lus pa thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar 'jug pa dang / skra'i rtse mo'i mtha' tshad kyi khams thams cad du
193a4: 'jug pa dang / skra rtse re re'i mtha' tshad kyi grangs kyi nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa thams cad yongs su gsal ba'i skra'i rtse mo'i mtha'i tshad kyi nam mkha'i khams su 'jug pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam thog ma'i mtha' dang
193a5: tha ma'i mtha'i bskal par zad cing 'das kyi bar du phyogs dang phyogs na skyil mo dkrung gcig gis bzhugs shing yongs su longs spyod de/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal
193a6: la gnas pa'i chos bzhi pa'o/ / gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sku dang dbu du mar gyur la dbu gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
193a7: med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab du phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i ljags su gyur pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra dang gsung 'jug ste/
193a8: chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can gyi khams la go bar byed pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag dang sgra dang / gsung re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i mdosde
193b1: dam pa rab tu bshad la/ mdo sde re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i chos ston pa'i rjes su 'brang la chos bstan pa re re la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du/
193b2: med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi tshig dang 'byed pa rnams kyi brjod pa 'gro ste/ ji ltar gang gis phyir chos ston pa de ltar chos thams cad ston te/ de dag la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab
193b3: du phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i skal bar ston cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa rnams yongs su zad nas/ yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab
193b4: duphra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par sngon te/ gzhung 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par ston la/ gzhung 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i
193b5: bskal pa zad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa snyed kyi bskal pa zad cing 'das kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni de lta ma yin te/ chos thams cad mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar 'jug cing chos thams cad shes rab
193b6: kyi ston te/ brda sprod cing the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / chags pa med pa'i mdzod kyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / sems can mtha' yas
193b7: par tshim par byed pa'i 'dul ba'i rgyan gyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyan gyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyun gyis 'khor lo skor ba dang / 'gro ba
193b8: malus pa thams cad la ye shes kyi sgron ma chen mo'i rgyun gyi 'khor lo skor ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / mi 'jigs pa chen po'i rgyan gyis chos kyi 'khor lo skor zhing ji ltar sangs rgyas gcig gi sku'i byin gyi rlabs kyis
194a1: chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i sprin chen po yang depa thams cad kyis dpe byab ma yin te/ de ltar chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' skra'i rtse mo'i mtha' nas rnam par phye ba chags
194a2: pa med pa ma lus pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sems kyi skad cig ma dang sems kyi skad cig ma de de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa sprul pa dang / ji srid du mtha' ma'i
194a3: bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re ba de snyed de snyed kyi dbur gyur pa'i bar du sngar kun du brjod pa bzhin du dbu re re la/ de snyed de snyed kyi ljags su gyur pa'i ljags
194a4: re re la de snyed de snyed kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung dang / sku dang / gsung 'jug ste/ chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can gyi khams na go bar byed pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / sgra dang / gsung re res de snyed de snyed kyi
194a5: mdo sde rnams 'chad de/ mdo sde re re la de snyed de snyed kyi chos ston pa rjes su 'brang la/ chos ston pa re re la de snyed de snyed kyi chos kyi tshig dang 'byed pa'i brjod pa 'gro ste/ chos kyi tshig dang 'byed pa re res chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams
194a6: cad sgra gsal bar byed cing sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la go bar byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'dzed pa'ang med/ nyams pa'ang med/ zad pa med// dmas pa'ang med de/ de ltar tha ma'i mthar bskal pa'i bar
194a7: gnas shing chos kyi 'khor lo skor te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos lnga pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dpal gyi be'u yi
194a8: rgyun dang ldan zhing / rdo rje'i snying po chen pos bzung ba de dag byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs pa rnams la bzhag nas sems can thams cad snyed kyi bdud sdig can gyi sde gzugs sna tshogs bskrad cing mi sdug pa/ mchog tu jigs
194b1: pa'i gzugs 'jig rten thams cad 'jigs pa'i gzugs mchog tu sems bskyed pa'i gzugs su 'phrul ba byed do/ / byang chub kyi shing mchog gi drung du song nas chos thams cad kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mthar bdud kyi mi sdug pa'i
194b2: gzugs 'dzin pa skrag pa chen pos 'jigs pa chen por byed pa 'gro ba thams cad 'joms pa/ 'jig rten thams cad 'jig pa'o// de na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs nas thams cad la gzigs te/
194b3: gzigs nas mi bsnyengs/ bag mi cha/ sru 'ga' yang mi g.yo/ gzugs sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs 'dzin pa yang mi mnga'/ sems phra mo yang mi mnga' bar gnas te/ mi g.yo/ mi bskyod/ mi 'gyur/ rnam par mi rtog
194b4: shin du rab tu zhi/ bsnyengs shing ba spu ldang ba shin du mi mnga'/ 'dod pa dang khong khro ba shin du mi mnga'/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byams pa chen po chags pa med pa'i stobs kyis gtong gi dbang po sbed cing thugs rje chen po la gnas
194b5: pa bag mi tsha ba'i thugs dbyer mi phyed pa'i snying po thugs mi spangs shing zil gyis mi non pa'i thugs kyis bdud dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad dang / bdud kyi sde mang po sna tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon cing bzung nas
194b6: zil gyis gnon/ bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ste/ de dag la bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul gsum dang de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
194b7: phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos drug pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung thogs pa
194b8: medapas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'jug cing de dang de dag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyis rnam par rig cing sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbrad ril thogs pa med de/ ri rab lhun po la mi thogs rin po che'i ril ma yin/
195a1: khor yug dang / khor yug chen po la ma yin/ lha'i gnas la ma yin/ klu'i gnas la ma yin/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas la ma yin/ dri za'i gnas la ma yin/ lha
195a2: ma yin gyi gnas la ba yin/ nam mkha' lding gi gnas la ma yin/ mi 'am ci'i gnas la ma yin/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas la lta zhing chags par mi 'gyur ro// gal te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs na'
195a3: mi chags te/ 'jig rten srid pa'i khams thams cad kyi sgra chen po dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi sgra sna tshogs rab tu rdzogs pa de la de bzhin gshegs pas brjod pa'i sgras sgrib par 'gyur te/ ji ltar 'dul ba'i sems can rnams//
195a4: kyi rnabs rnam par dag ste/ gang 'di rnabs rnam par rig cing rnam par rig pa'i tshig dang 'byed pa nyams par mi 'gyur te/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra lham me/ ldan ne/ lhung de'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
195a5: kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i dpal gyi stobs la gnas pa'i chos kyi sgra bdun pa'o/ / gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du shin du yongs
195a6: su sbyangs pas/ chags pa med/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyan dang zhing rnyog pa med pa/ bdag gi med pa'i chos thams cad la gnas pa/ na dang phyi dang ldan pa ma yin/ ma skyes pa la brtsam pa
195a7: thams cad rnam par phye bzhi gnas med pa/ rtsom pa sna tshogs thams cad med pa ngo bo thams cad rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes la gnas pa 'gags pa/ rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ shin du yongs su dag pa/ rtsom pa dang yid la byed pa thams
195a8: bdal mchags par rtson mongs pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyi yul gyi rjes bu song ga yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dod chags dang brab zhi dag ga/ chos kyi byed pa ston pa'i bar song ga/ chos kyi dbyed sa kun du mi zad pa'i rjes du song pa/
195b1: 'du shes su gyur pa thams cad dang / tsha dang tshad med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / mngon par smra ba thams cad 'gogs pa dag gi lam brjod du med pa'i mtha'i yul mi zad cing chags pa med pa'i dbyings kyi mtha'i sngon du ye shes 'gro
195b2: zhing 'jug pa dang / stobs bcu'i rgyan dang chos thams cad rnam par dag pa/ thabs mkhas pa la zhugs pas chos sna tshogs dang / chos du ma dang / chos thams cad dang / ston pa 'gal ba med pa/ dus ga/ sum du dbyer med pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad
195b3: dang / chos thams cad dang / chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i dbang gi pha rol du song ba/ chos thams cad kyi dbang gi 'byung gnas kyi mdzod kyi khyad par chos thams cad kyi tshul dran zhing kun nas gti mug pazhing thams cad du 'gro ba'i dbang dang / rgya mtsho'i
195b4: phyogs ma lus pa thams cad kyi mdo med bcu rdul yab la mi gnas pa/ brtan par gnas shing mi 'pho ba/ ye shes kyi lta ba chos ma lus pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa zag pa thams cad yongs su zad cing zag pa med pa/ sems rnam par grol
195b5: ba/ shes rab rnam par grol ba/ shin du rnam par grol ba/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mi zad pa'i mchog chags pa med par gnas pa/ rtag tu mnyam pa dang rab tu ldan pa/ dus gsum la chags pa med par gnas pa/ sems kyi skad cig ma la dus
195b6: gsum gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad ma lus par rab tu shes pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i stobs brgyad pa'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
195b7: chos kyi sku dang lus gcig du 'dus pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang yul tshad med pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sku yongs su grub pa/ 'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i sku// khams gsum gyis mi gos pa'i sku/ rkyen gyi sku rnam par
195b8: rig cing lhag pa'i bsam pas rjes su dran pa la byin gyis brlabs kyi su'i tshogs ston pa/ mi bden mi brdzun zhing mnyam pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i sku/ 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa'i chos kyi sku 'dus pa/ 'dus ma byas shing 'jig pa med pa'i sku
196a1: mtshan nyid gcig dang / mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sku/ yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas pa'i sku/ tshogs ma lus pa thams cad kyi sku// sangs rgyas khyu mchog rnam par sprul pa'i sku// kha dog mtha' yas
196a2: pa'i sku/ sku thams cad rjes su 'brangab/ sku sna tshogs su rnam par rig pa/ chos kyi sku'i tshul gyi rjes su song ba/ mtha' yas par snang ba'i ye shes kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod kyi sku bya ba sna tshogs med pa/ chos thams cad kyi dbyings
196a3: ston pa'i sku/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la khyab par gsal ba'i sku 'dus pa/ mi g.yo mi sems pa'i sku rnam par dag pa/ med pa dang med pa ma yin pa dang / tshul dang tshul ma yin pas phye ba'i sku/ sems can thams cad
196a4: kyidad pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su song zhing 'dul ba'i sku/ / 'gags pa dang / 'gagags pa ma yin pa 'dul ba la gzigs pa'i yon tan dkon mchog thams cad byung ba bsgreng ba'i sku/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos dang de bzhin nyid bsdus
196a5: pa'i sku/ rang bzhin gyis shin du zhi ba dang bsgribs pa med pa'i mtha'i sku/ thogs pa med pa'i chos thams cad las skyes pa'i sku/ thams cad kyi rjes su song ba/ chos kyi dbyings dag pa/ 'jig rten thams cad du rnam par phye ba'i sku/ brtsam pa las mi
196a6: ldog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i ye shes thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba/ kun 'brang ba'i rjes su song ba'i sku ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i dpal gyi stobs dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku 'dus pa dgu
196a7: pa'o/ / gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i ye shes rnam par chud pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las byung ba spyod pa las mngon par byung ba/ smon lam gyi khyad
196a8: par dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ye shes bya ba sna tshogs med pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las byung ba
196b1: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho'i spyod pa thams cad kyi cho ga shes pa/ smon lam chen po dang / spyod pa mi chung ba/ spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par dka' ba ma yin pa/ spyod pa'i stobs bzod par dka' ba'i spyod pa
196b2: thams cad las byung zhing spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bzang po spyod pa mi 'grib par spyod pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad ting nge 'dzin chad med pa thams cad la gnas pa/ spyod yul mtha' yas pa/ lam
196b3: thams cad ston pa/ lam ma yin pa'i yul dang lam thams cad la zhugs pa/ ye shes mchog gi stobs kyis chog shes pa/ 'jom pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo 'bebs pa/ dag pa 'dri ba dang / mi 'dri ba dang / btsan pa'i chos kyi tshul ston pa'i ye
196b4: shes mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes shin du yongs su dag pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi spyod pa gsum yongs su dag pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sgo ma rnyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas song ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rags dang /
196b5: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / mdzad pa thams cad la zhugs pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa/ tshad med par ston par gnas pa/ rtsa ba med cing mtha' med pa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa ye shes/
196b6: 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba/ 'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad kyi thams cad chos thams cad kyi ye shes kyis mthong ba dang / phra ba ma lus pa mtha' dang dbus med pa'i ye shes dus gsum thams cad la 'jug pa'i
196b7: tshul dang phra ba'i ye shes rjes su rtogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i don dang / ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad par brjod du med pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
196b8: dang ldan zhing / phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku/ grangs la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyis chos yi ge med par rab tu rtogs pa/ brjod du med pa'i ye shes sna tshogs rnam par bya ba dang / yi ge thams cad brjod pa med par
197a1: shes par byed/ ye shes kyis dge bar spyod pa'i chos thams cad rnam par dag pa kun du bzang po'i ye shes kyi rim pa sems skad cig ma gcig dang ldan pa'i legs kyi chos thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes des
197a2: thosos pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus dang / ji ltar skye mched kyis chos gtong bar rab tu yid la byed pa'i ye shes chos thams cad kyi yul gyi mtshams ma yin pa/ 'jig rten gyi yul khams ma lus pa thams cad dang / 'gro ba
197a3: lus pa thams cad dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / rus gsum gyi sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyis mthong ba'i yul de bzhin gshegs pas
197a4: lus pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i yul la 'jug cing thams cad 'dal ba'i/ yul ma lus pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba/ rnam par dag par sangs rgyas kyis yid kyis mtshams bu thob pa mngon par mkhyen cing yul
197a5: thams cad las mngon par sangs rgyas pa/ sems can gyi sems dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lus pa thams cad rtogs pa/ rus gsum gyis phyi ba'i sems kyi skad cig ma la ye shes kyi rjes su sangs rgyas shing mtshams ma
197a6: yin pa'i sangs rgyas pa sems can thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' med pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dang / dus gsum thams cad du 'gro
197a7: bdapag tu med pa dang / sangs rgyas khyu mchog thams cad du 'gro ba dang / bong du chud pa ma lus pa thams cad du 'gro ba dang / de dag ma lus pa thams cad las mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa rnam par chud pa thams cad kyi rjes
197a8: su 'gro zhing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mi gtong ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa la bzhugs te/ de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtha' dang dbus med par gnas pa/ sangs rgyas khyu mchog gi sku mtha'
197b1: dang dbyas med par gnas pa/ sems chags pa med par gnas pa/ mtha' dang dathas med pa'i snying rje chen po sbyor ba la gnas ga/ dus thams cad du rtag du rgyun mi 'chad par chos ston par gnas pa rtse/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
197b2: ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i dpal dang / ye shes chen po la gnas pa'i chos bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas
197b3: pa'i chos bcu ste/ sems can thams cad dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab cing tshad mi zin pa'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan/
197b4: 'das rnams bzhugs pa'i chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshe ji tsam par dga' ldan na bzhugs shing tshe zang nas 'pho bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zla ba bcur
197b5: bzhugs pa'i tshe ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par 'thung zhing 'byur bar bzhed pa'i thugs kyis bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas
197b6: kyi chos thams cad kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi skad cig ma gcig la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub na pa bzhugs
197b7: shing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par sprul par ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dul ba'i dus ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing bzhugs pa dang / sangs
197b8: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i dus ji lta ba bzhin du ston te brda sprod cing bzhugs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la bzhugs pa dang / sangs
198a1: r gyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brda sprod cing bzhugs pa dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skad cig la sems can thams cad dri ba dris pa rnams skad cig la brda
198a2: sprospyod cing bzhugs te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa'i chos bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzigs ma thag tu myur ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bcu sa/
198a3: bcu ga she na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can ngan par 'gro ba'i sems can rnams gzigs ma thag tu de dag myur du thog pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur
198a4: du bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par lhag par 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems
198a5: can gzigs ma thag tu myur du mtho ras su skye ba rnam par dag pa so sor thob par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gzigs ma thag tu myur du ne mnur dang / yid gnyis 'joms par nye bar gshegs pa dang / sangs
198a6: byas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can gzigs ma thag tu phyir mi ldog par mdzad pa'i phyir myur du gshegs shing sems rgya chen po la dad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i 'gro ba byang chub tu sems
198a7: ma bskyed pa blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gsha' mar zhugs pa gzigs ma tha tu migs par lta ba dang / gsha' mar 'jug pa'i rgyu rab tu
198a8: 'dzin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams gzigs ma thag tu myur du sems can rnams kyi dbang po 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par dag par mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
198b1: sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du bsgrubs pa thams cad zad par mdzad dra gshegs pa dang / sangs rgyasab bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs mthag tu myur du snang bso sor rnyed cing zhum pa med mi 'jigs pa
198b2: la spobs bcom par mdzad pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzigs mthag tu mur ba'i de bzhin du gzigs pa'i chos bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag rjes su
198b3: dgongs pa rnam par dag pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol
198b4: du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs pa yang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
198b5: 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsgrubs pa'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyi tshangs par spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ang rjes su dgongs
198b6: pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgo'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
198b7: gzugs kyi lus tshad med mtha' yas pa'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul dang / rnam par sprul pa tshad med mtha' yas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang
198b8: rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa yang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
199a1: bdag rjes su dgongs pa rnam par dag pa bcu'o/ / kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyang byings ma lus pa thams cad
199a2: dang dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems sna tshogs dang / sems gcig gi spyod pa dang / rnam par g.yo ba ldog pa sems kyi skad cig ma la mkhyen pa dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi dus gsum kun gyi las
199a3: rnams dang / las dang ldan pa sna tshogs dang / rnam pa dang / rim pa dang / las rnams kyi 'phel zhing sogs pa'ang phyi ma'i rnam par smin pa'i rim pa sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad
199a4: dang sems can gyi ris sna tshogs dang / sems can gyi ris gcig dang / sems can ma lus pa thams cad dus ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams 'dul zhing ston pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su snyan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /
199a5: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyi byin gyi rlabs ston pa mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / rgya mo'i phyogs kyi ris thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi
199a6: sems kyis mtshan mar bzung ba dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba lta ba rnam par phye ba mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang / dad pa ji lta ba dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du skad
199a7: cig la tshad med pa'i rim pas sangs rgyas la lta ba dang / rnam par rig pa'i byin gyi rlabs mkhyen pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can pha rol gyi bsam par sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs ston pa mkhyen pa dang /
199a8: chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad 'dzin pa med pas sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams ji lta bus 'dul ba bzhin du 'doms shing rjes su bstan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba ston par mkhyen pa dang / chos kyi dbyings ma lus
199b1: bathams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi thams cad 'gro na sems kyi skad cag ma la dadang dag tu 'gru ba nan tan ma khyen pa dang / sems kyis cag ma la chos kyang gyis ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi
199b2: phyogs thams cad la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gtong zhing sbyor ba mkhyen pa dang / sems kyi skad cig ma la chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi dad pa tshad med pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku la ltab
199b3: dang / gzugs kyi sku'i kha dog gi gnas mtha' yas pa ston pa mkhyen pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa bcu'o// kye rgyal ba'i
199b4: sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams
199b5: cad la rtag tu snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma la chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad la snyoms par/
199b6: 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma la sems can gyi khams sna tshogs kyi rim pa bdag med pa'i mthar gyur pa kun nas snang bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / dus gsum
199b7: thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma'i mtha' la snyoms par 'jug cing gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa med bcu rdul yab thams cad kyi rgya mo thams cad dang /
199b8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang rigs dang zhing thams cad la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs shing zhing mi zad pa'i mthar gyur par gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi/
200a1: su mtha' yas pa la snyoms par zhugs shing skad cig la 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam par rig pa ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / luH
200a2: dang ngag dang / sems yongs su gsal ba la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs shing / sems can thams cad kyi sems sna tshogs kyi gnas mdod du gnas shing skad cig la dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
200a3: ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la snyoms par zhugs shing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar gyur pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang 'jig
200a4: rten thams cad kyi rkyen la snyoms par 'jug cing skad cig la smra ba'i rkyen ston pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa med bcu rdul
200a5: yab thams cad la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs shing skad cig la mtha' yas pa'i rkyen gyi rjes su song ste/ sangs rgyas la lta ba mi gcod cing sems can sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa la lta bar mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan
200a6: 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad bsgrubs pa med pa la snyoms par zhugs shing skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs shing rig nas/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa mtha' yas pa'i pha rol du
200a7: byiphyin pa rnyes pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med pasam gyis mi khyab pa bcu'o// kye rgyal
200a8: ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa rnam par thar pa dang //
200b1: rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor bston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sems can 'dul zhing yongs su smin pang /
200b2: mdzad pa ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i zhing ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'thung
200b3: bar ston pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung zhing rdzab rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs
200b4: thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / rnam par sprul pa ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu pa'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang / ma'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston pa rnam par thar pa dang / rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcigs
200b5: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ston pa rnam par thar pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa bcu'o// snyan gyi gong rgyan rgyas pa chen po'i mdo
200b6: le'u 'bum pa las sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u nyi shu dgu pa rdzogs s+ho/ / / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dI pang kar bya ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mar me
200b7: mdzad kyis lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
