243b8: pabapar mchi ba la ni skye ba dang 'jig pa yang ma mchis la/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mche ba la ma gtogs par yang gang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba 'ga' yang ma mchis lags so// de ci'i srid du na
244a1: na/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mchi ba nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das lags pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo 'on
244a2: khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam/ 'on te rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam/ 'on te theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa
244a3: ti'i bu gang 'di skad du khyod theg pa gang la yang dag par zhugs pa yin zhes gsungs pa ni btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du de khyod nyid la zhus khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du la na ga dab du gsol/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i
244a4: bu khyed kyis rtags pa'i chos gang lags pa'i chos de ci nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig lags sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pazhig lags sam/ theg pa chen po la yang dag
244a5: par zhugs pa zhig lags/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de la ni rnam par rtog pa 'am/ spros pa 'ga' yang med la tha dad pa nyid kyang ma yin/ gcig pa nyid kyang ma yin/ sna tshogs
244a6: nyid kyang ma yin pa'i phyir ro/ / bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / spros pa ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad dang / tha dad du dbyer ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la ni gang gnas
244a7: par 'gyur ba 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur pa'i chos de dmigs su ma mchis lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo khyed kyi spobs pa ni ngo mtshar na gzhan yang khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la
244a8: bsnyen bkur byas/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad ces khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur byas shes gsung ba ni de bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings ji snyed pa la'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras
244b1: pa/ bu mo de bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings kyang ji snyed cig yin bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i srid pa ji snyed pa'o// shA ra dri ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa yang ji snyed cig yin/ bu mos
244b2: smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo sems can gyi khams kyang ji snyed cig yin/ bu mos spras pa/ btsud pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / dalta byung ba'i
244b3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul ji snyed pa'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis ci zhig lan btab pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gnas brtan gyis gang yongs su dris pa de nyid kyi lan bdag
244b4: gis btab lags so/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo kho bos ci zhig yongs su dris/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dra ti'i bu yi ge gang dag yongs su dris pa de nyid nges par bstan lags so// shA ra dra ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo yi ge
244b5: rnams ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa ste/ gdags su med pa yin pas de dag ni nges par bstan par mi nus so// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / mtshan nyid ma
244b6: mchis pa'i chos thams cad la yang gang gis yongs su dris pa dang / gang gis lan btab pa de gnyi ga yang dmigs su ma mchis lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu smras pa/ bu mo 'di ltar khyod ni bzod pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i
244b7: rnam pa dag yod pa kho na yin pas khyod ni ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ / bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub ces bgyi ba de yang spros
244b8: pa lags so/ / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba de yang spros pa lags so// nye ba zhes bgyi ba 'am ring ba zhes bgyi ba de yang spros la lags so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad ces khyod ni ring po mi thogs par
245a1: b lan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ba ni btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni skye ba ma mchis pa 'gag pa ma mchis pa chadas
245a2: ma mchis pa/ rtag pa ma mchis pa/ don cig pa ma lags ga/ don tha dad pa ma lags pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ 'gro ba ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags pas de la ni gang mngon par
245a3: rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba 'ga' yang dmigs su ma mchis lags so/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub ni gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ma lags pa ste/ byang chub ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis dang bral ba lags pa'i slad du'o// de nas
245a4: tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bu mo khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar song shig/ kho bo cag kyang chos mnyan pa'i phyir der 'dong ngo // de nas gnas / shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bu mo zla mchog gis 'di
245a5: skad ces smras so/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyan 'chal ba rnams la chos ston par mi mdzad lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo 'o na de bzhin gshegs pa su dag la chos ston par mdzad// bu mos spras
245a6: pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag nyan par bgyid kyang dga' bar mi bgyid// mngon par dga' ba mi bgyid pa rnams la'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo sems can mang po dag tshes mnyan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar
245a7: 'dong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa yang de dag la chos ston par mi mdzad dam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs par 'du shes shing chos la ngar 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni 'di snyam du
245a8: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste bdag cag la chos ston par mdzad pa'o/ / 'di ni chos ste bstan par bgyi ba'o snyam du sems lags kyi chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa rnams ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ chos sam/
245b1: bstan pa zhes bgyi bar sems pa ma mchis lags so// de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta bu'i spobs pa dang ldan pa'i bu mo 'di de
245b2: bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'gro bas na der ni chos bstan pa chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur bas bdag cag zan bcad de phyir log na ni 'on bu cag la legs kyis/ bdag cag chos mnyan pa de lta bu las phyi rol du gyur na ni ma
245b3: yin no/ / de nas nyan thos chen po de dag gi phyir phyogs te de nyid nas phyir log par gyur to// de nas bu mo zla mchog tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
245b4: 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dag na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
245b5: mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te// mngon par rab tu gtor to// skye bo phal po che de dag gis kyang ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog phreng dang / byug pa dag gis bcom
245b6: ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to/ / gtor ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la me tog de dag me tog gi gdugs rgyar dpag tshad bcu tsam pa zhig tu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng na 'dug par gyur to// de
245b7: nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bu mo khyod gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir 'ongs 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du dgongs
245b8: gang bdag gi mug pa g.yas pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad ma la bzhugs pa 'di gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir byon la/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du skye bar 'gyur snyam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'di ni sprul pa
246a1: ste sprul pa la ni 'chi 'pho yang med la skye ba yang med do/ / bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gis kyang de bzhin du sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad la gang ci 'pho ba 'am skye ba de ma mthong lags so// de nas byang
246a2: chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod kyis bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bu mo bud med kyi lus kyis ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus na khyod ci'i phyir bud med kyis lus sbyar bar mi byed/ bu mos
246a3: smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid lags pas stong pa nyid la ni ldog pa dang 'gyur ba ma mchis lags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin gyis bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// /
246a4: bu mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngam/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dis gzigs pa ltar bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong lags so// byang chub sems dpa' smos
246a5: brtsegs kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyi chos kyi gtam la spobs par gyis shig/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings la ni brjod par bgyi ba dang / rab tu brjod par bgyi ba ma mchis la chos kyi dbyings ni/ yi ger 'grang
246a6: ba yang ma lags so/ / byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa thogs pa med pas smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar chos ji lta bu thos/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i slad du steng du gzigs
246a7: shig dang / bar snang ci 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa yang de 'dra la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ci 'dra bar chos bstan pa nyid kyang de 'dra nyan pa nyid kyang de 'dra ste/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de lta bu lags so//
246a8: byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag la ji ltar sbyin pa byin zhing ji ltar yongs su bsngos/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper bgyi na de bzhin gshegs pa'i/
246b1: sprul pa zhig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin pa zhig phul bar gyur na de la rgyu ba ji lta bu zhig 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ smras pa bu mo sprul pa la ni rgyu ba 'ga' yang byung ba med do// bu mos smras pa/ rigs
246b2: kyi bu bdag gis kyang sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag la da ltar sbyin pa byin zhing yongs su bsngos pa lags so/ / byang chub sems dpa' thogs med sems kyis spras pa/ bu mo khyod sems can rnams la ji ltar byams pas khyab par
246b3: byed/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can de dag ji lta ba kho na bzhin du'o// smras pa bu mo sems can de dag kyang ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'das pa yang ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma lags/ da ltar byung ba yang ma
246b4: lags la/ sems de yang 'das pa yang ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma lags/ da ltar byung ba yang ma lags pas byams pa bsgom pa de ni 'di 'dra'o zhes gdags par rngo mi thogs lags so// byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu
246b5: dga' ba'i rgyal pos smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis chos kyi mig thob bam/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis sha'i mig kyang ma lags na chos kyi mig lta thob par ga la 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros brtan pas smras
246b6: pa/ bu mo khyod yun ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yun ji srid cig nas smig rgyu chu la yang dag par zhugs pa'i yun de srid nas bdag
246b7: kyang byang chub la yang dag par zhugs lags so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod yun ji srid cig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
246b8: rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ yun ji srid cig gis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa so so'i skye bo'i sa las 'das par 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyis las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de srid kyis lags so// de nas
247a1: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sring mo 'di gtso bo chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu dag dang lhan cig yang dag par smra yang 'jigs par mi bgyid
247a2: dman par mi bgyid pa ni bu mo 'di'i spobs pa ngo mtshar lags so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA re dwa ti'i brel bu mo zla mchog gis 'di skad ces smra so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper bgyi na thugs ni ji tsam du chung yang
247a3: sreg pa'i ngo bo nyid lags pas ji tsam du nye bar len pa rnyed pa de tsam du sreg par bgyid lags so/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bgrod pas tha dad kyi kye
247a4: ba cung zad kyang ma mchis pas de dag thams cad bdag dang gzhan dag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa legs so/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo byang chub thob nas khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci 'dra
247a5: par 'gyur/ bu mos spras pa/ btsun pa bA da nga? ti'i bu bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci 'dra de 'dra ba'i sems can dman pa la mos pa/ shes rab chung ba/ gzhan gyi don la mi lta ba/ nyan thos kyi theg pa
247a6: la yang dag par zhugs pa dag gi ming yang grag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu 'gyur lags so/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo gang khyod 'di skad ces chos kyi dbyings ni gcig go// de bzhin nyid ni gcig go zhes zer na 'o na ci khyod
247a7: kyis nyan thos rnams ni dman pa nyid yin la ci sangs rgyas rnams ni lhag pa yin par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ bu mo smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ ba lang gi rjes kyi chab gang lags
247a8: ba dang / rgya mtsho chen po'i cha ba gang lags pa de dag la ni bye brag cung zad kyang ma mchis lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang ba lang gi rjes la ni rgya mtsho chen po ltar sems can tshad ma mchis pa dag gi go skabs ma mchis lags/
247b1: so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings gcig las nges par byung ba lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyan thos rnams kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dag ltar sems
247b2: can tshad ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyid par rngo mi thog lags so/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na yungs 'bru'i khongs su chud pa'i nam mkha'i khams gang lags pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig
247b3: rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i nam mkha'i khams gang lags pa'i nam mkha'i khams de dag la ni bye brag cung zad kyang ma mchis pa lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang yungs 'bru'i khongs su chud pa'i nam mkha'i khams
247b4: lani phyogs bcu'i khongs su chud pa la ni nam mkha'i ltar grong dang / grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu mi gnas shing kun tu mi gnas la ri'i rgyal po ri rab dag kyang ma mchis rgya mtsho chen po dag kyang ma
247b5: mchis lags so/ / btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang nyan thos rnams kyang stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa gcig las nges par 'byung ba lags mod kyi 'on kyang nyan
247b6: thos rnams kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag sems can tshad med pa grangs ma mchis pa dag gis don bgyid par rngo mi thog lags so/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo sangs
247b7: rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba gcig pa ma yin nas// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'diskad ces sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba gcig go/ zhes gsung ba ni
247b8: skur ba 'debs pa lags so/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo ci'i phyir/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du de khyod nyid la yongs su 'as/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan gdab du gsol/ gang gi tshe
248a1: btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems rnam par grol ba de'i tshe jig stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil ltar mnyam par kun du gnas par gyur lags sam/ jig shing ljon pa dang ri thams cad kyi khyad
248a2: logs su mngon par phyogs te btud mngon par btud/ mngon par rab tu btud lags sam/ ji ga ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur lags sam/ jig sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang bral bar gyur lags sam/ jig
248a3: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'og tu mnar ma mchis pa la thug pa yan chad dang / steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar dag 'od zer gyi kha dog lta bus snang bas 'gyur lags sam/ jig lha thams
248a4: cad kyis phyag bgyis lags sam/ jig bdud kyis sa dang nam mkha' dpag tshad sum bcu tshun chad dpung gis khyab par bgyis te mchis par gyur lags sam/ jig sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam
248a5: par grol lags sam/ / jig khyod byang chub pa dang dus gcig kho nar bdud thams cad nges par bcom lags sam/ shA ra dwa ti'i bris smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis kho bo la ji skad smras pa de dag las de'i rgyu gcig tsam yang ma byung lags so//
248a6: bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi snying po dam pa la gnas pa la ni yon tan gyi khyad par de dag dang gzhan yang dpag tu ma mchis pa dag byung bar gyur pas na btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam
248a7: papar grol ba dang / nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba'i khyad par ni de lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo zla mchog la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bu mo legs so legs so// bu mo khyod de skad ston pa ni yang khyod
248a8: legs so/ / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus bu mo zla mchog gi lag pa g.yas par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad ma la bzhugs pa byung bar gyur pa gang yin pa de pad ma'i gdan de las mngon par 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das
248b1: lalan gsum bskor babyas nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku lta ba'i lung du zhugs so/ / de nas da'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa can po rab tu g.yos par gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i khung ba thams cad nas 'das/
248b2: gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/ sdong bu rnams ni gser/ mdab ma rnams ni dngul/ snying po rnams ni rin po che dpal gyi snying po las grub pa dag byung bar gyur to// pad mad dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis/
248b3: legs par brgyan pa pad ma la bzhugs pa dag kun tu snang bar gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu gshegs te sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig
248b4: rten gyi khams dag na chos ston par kun tu snang zhing / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos bstan pa de dag kyang 'dir kun tu grag go// de nas bu mo zla mchog gis de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po mthong nas dga' zhing mgu
248b5: la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas des lag pa g.yas pa na thogs par gyur pa'i pad ma gang yin pa de bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad ma de me
248b6: tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi lham pa ka ba bzhi zug pa/ cha mnyam pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba zhig tu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang zad kyi steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug par gyur to// khang pa dregs pa
248b7: ba der yang khri gdan rkang pa rin po ches spras pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu 'bum phrag du ma bting ba zhig byung bar gyur to// khri gdan de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
248b8: sku zhig bzhugs par yang kun tu snang ngo / / des pad ma de 'phangs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yid 'dzin pa de la gnas pa'i sems can
249a1: mapa la ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad ma gnyis pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su sa
249a2: so/ / 'phangs ma thag tu pad ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa zhig du gyur pa dang / des tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig tshogs
249a3: la lta ba dang 'brel ba'i sems can rnams la 'jig tshogs la lta ba spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad ma gsum pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang dede yang bcom ldan 'das ga
249a4: la ba de logs su 'phangs so/ / 'phangs ma thag tu pad ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i
249a5: rtsa ba'i 'dis rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad ma
249a6: bzhi pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / nges de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bzhi pa zhig tu gyur pa dang /
249a7: tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis phyin ci log bzhi spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad ma
249a8: lnga pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa lnga pa zhig tu gyur pa dang /
249b1: tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sgrib pa lnga dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sgrib pa lnga spangs pa'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad ma
249b2: drug pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa drug pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces
249b3: kyang gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis skye mched drug la rten pa'i sems can rnams la skye mched drug yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag
249b4: par pad ma bdun pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bdun pa zhig du gyur pa dang /
249b5: tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos
249b6: ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad ma brgyad pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi
249b7: steng du pad ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis log pa nyid brgyad la nges pa'i sems can rnams la log pa nyid brgyad
249b8: nges par sdang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad ma dgu pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad ma de
250a1: yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa dgu pa zhig du gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis kun nas mnar sems kyis dngos po dgu la gnas pa'i
250a2: sems can rnams la kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad ma bcu bzhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log
250a3: su 'phangs so/ / 'phangs ma thag tu pad ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang zad kyi steng du pad ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bcu pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge
250a4: ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar de ltar bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcur snang bas khyab par mdzad pa ltar stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig/ de nas pad ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gong nas gong du brtsegs pa'i 'phang
250a5: gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug par gyur to/ / de'i tshe nas bla ba'i lha yan chad nas tshangs ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams la pad ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gis yang dag par bskul nas lha bye ba phrag dpag tu med pa
250a6: dag 'dus par gyur to/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog
250a7: du ma kha dog sna tshogs kha dog 'bum phrag du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / bcod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu
250a8: med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ 'od kyis nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zil gyis mnan nas phyir log ste bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub po// de nas tshe dang /
250b1: ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ra sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
250b2: bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dzum pa'i don yongs su zhus pa/ mkhyen pa kun la mngon sum spyan snga zhing // chos rnams kun la nem nur rnam par rgal// 'jig rten kun dang mi mnyam mthu mnga' ba// rgyal dbang ci slad
250b3: 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad/ / khyad kyis mtha' yas dus na sbyin pa byin// khyod khrims rnam dag ner bu rin chen 'dra// khyod kyi bzod pa'ang mi g.yo lhun po bzhin// drang srong chen po ci smad 'dzum pa mdzad// bsam gtan
250b4: brnyes shing brtson 'grus stobs ldan pa/ / gnod bral na dang rgal las rnam par grol// rgya mtsho 'dra bar shin tu zab pa'i blo// thub chen ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// byams la gnas shing thugs rjer gnas pa po//
250b5: thub pa btang snyoms dang ni dga' la gnas// 'dod chags la sogs 'jigs bsal rab tu zhi// thub dbang ci smad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// khyod spu gcig nas byung ba'i 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mthar ya
250b6: khams rnams su/ / nyi zla myur du mog mog rab mdzad de// gzi brjid zil gyis gnon cing mig kyang stsol// 'gro ba'i mgon gcig khyod gsung rnam par dag/ snyan cing yid 'od yan lag drug bcu ldan// gang dag nyan
250b7: pa de dag mi ngoms shing / / nyon mongs thams cad ma lus zhi bar byed// phyogs bcu mtha' yas sems can gang mchis pa'i// sems kyi spyod pa du ma gang lags pa// de mkhyen de dag som nyi gcod pa po// rab 'byung ci
250b8: slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad/ / deng su'i sems ni byang chub slad du nges// su zhig sangs rgyas theg pa yangs par zhugs// khyab bdag gang gi yid bsams rab tu grub// thub de'ang ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// gang gis
251a1: de ring bdud bzhi pham bgyis shing / / nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi bdag bdud chen dang // gang gis phung po lha bu mang po'i bdud// pham par bgyis sam ci slad khyod 'dzum mdzad// su zhig de ring don chen yangs 'gyur zhing // su zhig
251a2: chos lo legs bgyid mi'i seng ge/ de ring su yi sgra ni phyogs rnams mchi// thub dbang ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// kun mkhyen mi dge thams cad rab spangs pa// sems can kun la mtshungs par byams pa po// g.yo
251a3: ba kun dang log pa rnam spangs pa/ / drang srong chen po ci smad 'dzum pa mdzad// de ring su zhig yangs pa chen po thob// deng su'i sems kyi smon pa legs 'grub cing // deng su'i stobs bcu rnams dang ldan par 'gyur// dgra thul ci slad
251a4: 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad/ / mkha' la gnas pa lha klu bye ba dang // gnod sbyin mkha' lding lto 'phye cher bcas dang // sa la thal sbyar skyes pa bud med rnams// dga' zhing lha mi dbang po zla ba lta// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mang ba
251a5: ni/ / dam chos 'tshal ba rgya mtsho lta bu dag/ phyogs bcu dag nas lhags nas dgra thul ba// yongs dag thugs mnga' 'dzum don bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la phyir tshigs su bca
251a6: de bka' stsal pa/ gang gi rgyal ba'i cho 'phrul mchog mthong nas// byang chub phyir ni rgya chen sems bskyed cing // nga'i mdun na thal sbyar gang 'dug pa// mdun gyi bu mo mthong ngam kun dga' bo// 'dis ni sngon gyi srid par rtag tu
251a7: yang / / rgyal ba sum brgya legs par mchod byas shing // ji ltar bdag ni byang chub mchog reg ces// rgyal ba de dag kun la mngon sum zhus// nam yang lan 'ga' ngan 'gror ma song zhing // 'di ni rtag tu lha mo'i 'jig rten skyes//
251a8: nam yang byang chub sems ni ma brjed cing // 'chi dus byas kyang rtag tu tshe rabs dran// rgyal ba 'od srung zhes bya mthong nas ni// khang bzang steng nas mdzes pa'i lus mchongs te// rgya chen sems kyis 'od srung de mchod nas//
251b1: de nas rjes 'thun pa zad pa thob par gyung // sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'dzag ces mtshan gsal ba// de la na bza' dam pa phrugs phul bas// daphyir 'didi'i lus mdag gser 'dral// mjas shing dag la zla ba 'dra ba yin// ston pa gser
251b2: thub ces bya gang yin pa/ / de la bdug pa spos mchog phul bas na// de phyir 'di'i kha dang spu khung nas// u tapa la tsan dan dri dang rab tu 'byung // gtsug gtor zhes bya rkang gnyis mchog de la// 'dis ni mtshan bdun nges par brtags
251b3: gyur pas/ / de phyir de yi mig mdog mthon 'thing la// 'gro ba rtog par byed pa ngoms mi 'gyur// tshe rabs lnga brgya dag tu 'dod spangs shing // tshangs spyod rnam par spyod pa dag byas nas// de phyir chags pas gdungs pas de mthong na/
251b4: de tshe 'dod chags can dag chags bral 'gyur// sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas nas 'dir 'phos te// 'dir ling tsa byi khyim ni yangs par skyes// skye ba kun tu tshe rabs dran 'gyur zhing // tshigs bshad dbyangs kyis smra ba'i bya ba shes// /
251b5: pha ma yongs su smin par bya ba dang // de bzhin sems can gzhan don byed 'dod cing // la la byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed phyir// de phyir yangs pa'i khyim 'dir rab tu skyes// bud med skyes pa nye du mdza' bshes dang // gzhon nu
251b6: gzhon nu ma dag gdul bya'i phyir/ / de dag stong phrag drug bcu 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas theg pa mchog la yongs smin byas// 'di ni ring po mi thogs bud med kyi// lus bsgyur nga'i bstan la rab 'byung zhing // tshangs spyod dam pargya
251b7: chen thob byas nas/ / shi 'phos lha yi 'jig rten 'gro bar 'gyur// lha gnas de nas shi'i phos phyir yang ni// dus mtha'i tshe na chos 'di srung 'gyur zhing // 'dir yang skye dgu'i don chen byas nas ni// 'di nas phyir yang dga' ldan
251b8: 'gro bar 'gyur/ gang tshe mi pham dgra las rgyal ba po// dung gi sras su gyur te 'byung ba'i tshe// de ni bzo don sgyu rtsal bya ba kun// shes shing mdzes la yon tan kun ldan 'gyur// srog chags brgya phrag du mas mdun ba da cing
252a1: zlab gsus du rgal ba mchang byas nas/ / ngan sreg cags drug spang sum brgyad dang / lhan cag khyam gas gnas nas 'thung 'brur shing // rnal ba ma thas bzhugs dang 'as pa'o// chos kyi rdul yang bran tu 'dzin
252a2: par 'gyur/ / de 'dra'i dpa' bod nas shi 'phos nas// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams su 'gro// blo ldan des ni 'od dpag med pa dang // gzhan yang phyogs bcu mtha' yas bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas bye mang gang gA klung gi ni//
252a3: bya snyed mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur// ting 'dzin mngon shes brtson 'grus stobs thob cing // bskal pa bza la gang dag byis 'byur ba'i// rang 'brung 'jig rten rnams la phan brtson na// 'jig rten mgon dag
252a4: la'ang bsnyen bkur byed/ / bye mang bskal pa de dag mchod byas te// sems can bye mang yongs su smin byas shing // bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgyad btsun// rgyal ba zla ba mchog ces bya bar 'gyur// zla mchog rkang gnyis ga
252a5: bo mdzod spun sa/ / 'od zer gser mdog shin du yid 'ong ba// gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gis// 'jig rten khams de kun tu gsal bar 'gyur// gang phyir 'od kyi 'jig rten de khyab pas// nyi zla me dang nor bu'i 'od rnams ni//
252a6: sdang bar mi 'gyur chu skar tshogs min zhing // nyin dang mtshan yang bgrang du yod ma yin// de tshe rang sangs rgyas dag yod min zhing // nyan thos rnams med mu stegs can tshogs med// mnyam med de yi dge 'dun rnam dag cig
252a7: bud med rnam par spangs pa nyid du 'gyur/ / mi rnams thams cad gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing // bsod nams brgya yi mtshan can bstan sdug/ mang lan mi gnas 'dod pa mi sten cing // pad ma'i nang nas brdzus te skye zhing 'byung //
252a8: rgyal sras rnams kyi tshogs 'byung gang yin pa// de ni bgrang bas rtogs par mi nus shing // thams cad mngon shes thob pa de'i spyod dang // mi skye bzod cing mnyam med chags pa med// de na bdud med dmigs can yod med shi
252b1: bslab pa 'dral med phyogs 'dzin yod ma yin/ / 'jig rten khams de dag cing dga' ldan gyi// nye bar spyod pa'i rnam pa 'dra bar 'gyur// gser dngul mu tig dam pa'i dri mchog gis// spras shing gtsang la dri med yangs pa yin/
252b2: rgyal ba de yi sku tshe lo grangs ni// stong phrag bye ba bdun bcu gsum du 'gyur// ston pa de ni zhi bar gshegs gyur nas// de tshe dam chos bskal pa gcig gnas shing // bzhugs bzhin mya ngan las 'das na'ang 'di yin// dam
252b3: ros mdzod la nyams par 'gyur ba med/ / gal te rgyal ba dang ni zhing de yi// phun sum tshogs pa bskal par brjod byas kyang // rgya mtsho dag las chu thigs gcig bzhin du// dpe yang brjod par 'gyur ba ma yin no// de nas
252b4: bu mo zla mchog gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag nyid mngon sum du lung bstan pa thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis shing ta la bdun sid du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags so/ / mngon par 'phags
252b5: mthag tu bu mo de bud med kyi lus gyur cing / skyes pa'i lus mngon par grub par gyur pa dang / 'jig rten dus chen po yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ me tog gi char dag kyang rab tu bab// lha dang mi'i sil snyan 'bum phrag du
252b6: ma dag kyang sgra 'khrol bar gyur to/ / 'jig rten kun tu snang ba chen pos khyab par yang gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' zla mchog gis bar snang de nyid la 'dug bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis
252b7: mngon par bstod pa/ / ri rab g.yo zhing nam mkha' sar ldud pa// lha gnas skad cig tsam la 'jig 'gyur zhing // rgya mtsho mi g.yo dgung zla lhung yang gda'// de bzhin gshegs pa sho pe'i tshig mi gsung // phyogs bcu
252b8: sems can lus rnams gcig 'gyur zhing / / zhugs ni chab gyur chab ni zhugs gyur gda'// mnyam med thub dbang yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas// 'gro la phan bzhed log pa'i tshig mi gsung // bar snang dogs kun tu 'dzin
253a1: 'gyur zhing / / yungs 'bru'i nang du zhing brgya chud 'gyur la// ser ma zhags pas gzung bar rngo thog gda'// rgyal ba log pa'i tshig ni gsung mi 'gyur// de 'drar yang dag de bzhin nyid gsung ba'i// rgyal ba des bdag byang chub
253a2: nges bstan cing / / gang phyir dogs kun tu rab g.yos pas// byang chub dam pa 'thob 'gyur gor ma bkum// sangs rgyas theg mchog bdag lung bstan pas na// rang 'byung gis na ngo skad gsungs de dang // sngan chad skal brgyar bdag
253a3: gis gang btsal ba/ / de ltar bdag gis chos mchog 'khor lo bskor// lha mi lha min gnod sbyin dge slong dag/ dge bsnyen rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' dag/ thams cad mnyam med mthu stobs ldan pa yi// bde gshegs
253a4: 'gyur gyis som nyi ma byed cig/ chos 'di thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste// rgyal ba rnams kyis longs spyod rmi 'dra zhing // bdag med gso bshed bu 'ga' yang med// sems can srog med gang zag med par gsungs// bzod nas
253a5: ngo bo nyid kyis chos rnams kun/ / rang bzhin dag cing ngo bo nyid med pas// bdag sngon bud med rang bzhin gyur pa gang // de ni dngos med gsog stong ya ma rla// phyi ma'i dngos de'ang stong zhing skad cig ste// dngos med mi g.yo
253a6: gsog dang ya ma rA/ / rtog dang rnam par rtog pa bral gyur cing // rtog 'gyur de yang mkha' la bya rjes bzhin// gang zhig mnyam med byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing // thul dka' bdud kyang rab tu gzhom pa dang // stong gsum chen po'i 'jig
253a7: rten khams su ni/ / chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa skor 'dod pa// des ni brtan par byang chub sems bskyed la// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu mchod bgyis dang // des ni myur du yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas// ston pa rgyal ba'i sdig med lam
253a8: togs 'gyur/ / skyes bu rtsal 'phags gsung snyan mthar byon pa// rgyal ba mi mchog gtso la phyag 'tshal lo// dga' mdzad rab dga'i dngos po stsol mdzad pa// thub pa chos dbyig 'byung gnas dbang phyug bstod// bde ba'i 'byung
253b1: gnas pa de kun rab stsol ba/ / de bzhin gshegs pa bdud kyi tshir ma dkrugs// bstod 'os rnams kyis bstod pa gang zag mchog/ rang 'byung dbang ldan med bral bstod par brtsi// bdag gis phyogs bcu bskas na de dag tu// sdig med
253b2: sangs rgyas brgya phrag bsam yas mthong / / shAkya seng ge ji lta de lta bur// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag bdag lung ston// rgyal ba thams cad chos nyid sangs rgyas gcig/ de bzhin chos kyang de bzhin nyid kyis gcig/ sems
253b3: can rnams kyang yang dag mthar nges pas/ / gang la bzod 'di mchis pa rgyal bar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' zla mchog gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas par snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
253b4: gnyis la rab tu gtugs so/ / des rab tu gtugs ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang snang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan
253b5: to/ / des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mngon sum du mthong zhing bdag nyid lang bstan pa yang thos nas dga' zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
253b6: rab tu byung bar gsol ba btab po/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khye'u de'i phyir pha ma dag gnang bar byed du chud cig/
253b7: de nas bye'u pha ma dag gis cho 'phrul chen po de mthong zhing de mngon sum du lung bstan pa yang thos nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis khye'u 'di rab tu 'byung bar gnang lags so// bdag cag gis kyang
253b8: chos de dag slad kyis thob par bgyi lags so/ / zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de rab tu byung ba // de nas khye'u de rab tu byung ba dang / srog chags khris kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
254a1: gzas kyi rnam grangs 'di ba shad pan lha dang mi khrag khrig phrag bdun chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul ba dacing drim dang bral ba rnam par dgago/ dge slong brgyan yinapa mad par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par
254a2: grol lo/ / sngon byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa'i dge slong mnyis brgya dang srog chags nyi khris ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub
254a3: sems dpa' zla mchog dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
254a4: yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa bu mo zla mchog lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po mido// rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba banang /
254a5: ye shes sdes zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yak+She mA ba tI bA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bde ldan ma lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i
254a6: mdo/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi brang po'i ri la dge slong nyi khri'i dge slong gi dge
254a7: 'dun chen pa dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang / khabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham
254a8: thabs gsol te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang thabs gcig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal
254b1: bo'i la kyi gong byar du mthar chags kyis bsod snyoms rgyu zhing rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i pho brang ga la ba der gshegs so/ / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma zhes bya ba khang bzangs mchog gi steng na
254b2: 'dug pas bcom ldan 'das thag ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang sems dga' bar gyur te/ khang bzangs kyi steng nas babs nas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa byams
254b3: gdan dar dkar rin po che ba bting ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa gdan bshams la bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma lus rgyan thams cad kyi brgyan/
254b4: pa bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir zhe sa dang bcas/ gus pa dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan pa 'dugag/
254b5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma lus rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa la gzigs nas sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir mkhyen bzhin du rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma la bka'
254b6: stsal pa/ bde ldan ma gang lus la thogs pa'i 'bras bu 'di lta bu shin tu lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dug pa'i shing de'i ming ci zhes bya/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan mas
254b7: tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gang gi 'bras bu khyod thogs pa// shing de'i ming ni ci yin zhes// dpa' ba chen po mkhyen bzhin du// gang zag mchog gis smras pa ni// bdag gis sngon ni gang bskyed pa// bsod nams las
254b8: byung shing zhes bgyi/ / 'dren pa bdag gis myong ba yi// 'bras bu 'di dag de yi lags// ljon shing bshad pa de nyid kyang // sangs rgyas nyan thos rnams la yod// sangs rgyas ye shes 'theb 'dang rnams// byang
255a1: chub phyir ni de la gnas/ / sbyin dang tshul khrims chab stsal pas// ljon shing de ni rnam par bsnyungs// de ni rnam par 'grung ba na// 'bras bu bzang po rnams kyang 'byung // bzod pa dang ni brtson 'grus mthum// ljon shing bdag gis legs
255a2: par bsrungs/ / de ni rnam par 'khrung ba na// 'bras bu ri med 'byung bar 'gyur// shing 'di bltan mdzes pa ste// bsam gtan shes rab me tog rgyas// 'dren pa bdag gis de dag gi/ 'bras bu rnams ni myong ba lags// ji ltar ril
255a3: rten pa ya/ / shing rnams yal ga lo ma dag/ chu zheng dgab par rgya che ba// 'phel bar gyur te bskyod mi nus// de bzhin ldon shing che bzang 'di// sangs rgyas chos nyid 'tshal bas na// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// sngon ni legs pa
255a4: bsrungs pa lags/ / 'dren pa bsod nams ljon shing 'di'i// 'bras bu gzhan yang mchis lags te// bdag gis nyams su myong ba 'di// de yi me tog tsam du bas// de yi 'bras bu byang chub mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub bla med ladra
255a5: de ni bdag gis thob par 'gyur/ / smad pa bud med nyid spangs nas// skyes par bdag nyid 'gyur ba lags// sems can kun gyi rim pa mchog/ chos rnams kun gyi pha rol phyin// thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs// sdug
255a6: bsngal kun gyi nyen pa yi/ / sems can rnams ni bdag gis dgrol// 'jig rten kun la snying brtse ba'i// skyabs su bdag ni 'gyur ba lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma la
255a7: bka' stsal pa/ bde ldan ma gang khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyi don dang / lha rnams dang / mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa legs
255a8: so legs so/ / de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan mas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang de
255b1: byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang // mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dang byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen
255b2: po dang / btang snyoms chen po 'di rnams ci las grub lags/ de bzhin du gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu ma mchis pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du ma mchis pa dang / brjod du ma mchis pa dang / bgrang ba las 'dasas
255b3: rnams ci las grub lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas ye shes 'dod pas na// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ngas
255b4: kyang 'di ltar ljon pa'i shing / / sngon ni legs pa kho nar bskyed// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang // de bzhin brtson 'grus bsam gtan bsags// yun ring dus nas ting 'dzin dang // shes rab nges par bstan pa yin// sems can
255b5: rnams la mi mnyam sems/ / ngas ni bsgoms par mi dran te// rtag tu sems ni mnyam gyur pas// sangs rgyas nyid ni ngas brnyes so// ra yi sems ni mnyam pa yis// rtag tu sdug dang mi sdug dang // mdza' dang mi mdza' snyoms pas
255b6: na/ / bsod nams shing ni rnam par bskyed// des na ljon shing chen po 'di// yon tan mang por gyur pa yin// 'khor los sgyur nyid ngas thob ste// brgya byin nyid kyang byas pa yin// rnam mang dbang phyug chen po dang // tshangs pa nyid kyang de las
255b7: thog/ / bsam gyis mi khyab sangs rgyas chos// chos nyid dag kyang ngas rtogs so// de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan mas bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rnams thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par rab tu gsungs pa la mngan
255b8: par bstod de rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ ji ltar mi mchog dam pa po// yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pas// sngon ni spyod pa shin tu bslabs// de ltar bdag kyang rjes su slob// yon tan mthar
256a1: byini khyod kyi ni/ / yon tan rnams ltar bdage slob ste// srid par sdug bsngal spangs nas ni// bdag kyang 'di 'drar 'gyur bar ba rtse// tshe rabs gzhan ni ma lus par// bdag gis sbyin pa gang stsal pa// mnyam med ye shes
256a2: mthong slad du/ / de dag thams cad yongs su bsngo// srid pa 'di'am gzhan dag tu// bdag gis tshul khrims gang bsrungs pa// sangs rgyas ye shes 'thob slad du// de dag thams cad yongs su bsngo// bzod dang brtson 'grus ting
256a3: 'dzin dang / / shes rab dge ba gang bsten pa// sangs rgyas chos kyi don gyi phyir// de dag thams cad bdag gis bsngo// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// las dge ba gang bdag gis bsags// sangs rgyas ye shes yon tan phyir byang
256a4: chub tu ni bdag gis bsngo/ / bud med lus 'di spangs nas ni// skyes pa mchog tu bdag gyur cig/ de ltar skyes pa'i lus thob nas// dam pa'i mchog tu bdag gyur cig/ de ltar gyur nas bde gshegs kyi// 'khor lo bla med bskor bar
256a5: bgyi/ / 'khor ba'i btson rar bcings pa yi// sems can bye ba dgrol bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan mal tshigs su bcad pa dag gis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ tshig 'di smras pa legs
256a6: ba yin/ / sems ni rab tu sdom pa legs// khyod kyis bdud ni legs par mnan// rdzogs sangs rgyas su khyod 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas bcom
256a7: ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa bza' ba dang bca' ba mang pos tshim par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das sur sder ni gru/ phyag ni bcabs nas rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma la chos kyi gtam rgyas par yang
256a8: dag par bstan/ / yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod// yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas lung bstan te/ bde ldan ma khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa du ma zhig na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
256b1: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan rin chen dpal zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mchog tu yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ ngan song ngan 'gro
256b2: log par ltung ba'i sdug bsngal med pa/ yid du 'ong ba yid dang 'thad pa mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas yin te/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni de lta bur 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad
256b3: pa na dge bsnyen ma stong phrag mang po zhig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / lha dang mi'i skye dgu rnams kyis ni chos kyi snang ba thob par gyur to// bcom
256b4: ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas rgyal po'i btsun mo bde ldan ma dang / 'khor de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
256b5: bstod do/ / // 'phags pa bde ldan ma lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya shI ya ma hA de bi byA ka ra Na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mchen mo dpal lung
256b6: bstan pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mang po 'di lta ste/ byang chub
256b7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel
256b8: ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa'
257a1: sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjodang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jigs pa thams cad sel ba dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byed kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang/
257a2: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams kyi mtshan thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi zla dang 'jig rten gsum 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mu ste gas
257a3: bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de dag la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang thams cad dang thabs
257a4: gcig tu bzhugs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dpang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug
257a5: go/ / lha mo chen mo dpal yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du songs phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
257a6: dag thams cad la yang mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgya stong dums pa rgyan cing de bzhin gshegs pa bya ba snyed kyis yongs su bkor te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /
257a7: 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pas lha mo chen mo dpal la gzigs nas/ tshangs pa chen po'i gsung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
257a8: spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po 'am/ blon po'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmar rigs gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi mi ba
257b1: brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa 'chang na/ rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i yul dang / sems can de dag gi 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing / chom kun dang / g.yon can dang /
257b2: mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bde ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i khyim du yang dpal nges par gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub
257b3: sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pa de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das tshig 'di legs par bka' stsal pa legs so legs so// lha mo chen mo dpal gyi mde rnams 'dzin pa dang / thos nas nyams su len pa
257b4: gang lags pa de dag gi yon dang phan yon ni de dag tu 'gyur lags so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
257b5: ldan 'das lha ma chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gad du bskyed lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/
257b6: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las byung ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bai dUr+ya dang gser gyi ri bo mdog
257b7: mdzes gser 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de dang de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan ga la yang lce mtshan mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag kyang lha mo chen mo dpal de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam
257b8: par 'phel ba dang / 'grub par byed pa dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ de dag ni 'dir lha mo chen mo dpal gyis yang dag par brjod pa dang / sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang / nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa dang / lus thams cad dri
258a1: ma med par byed pa dang / nor dang 'bru rnams 'du zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang / dbul ba gcod par byed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad
258a2: 'dul zhing 'gugs par byed pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / 'thab pa dang // 'khrug pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
258a3: ba dpal stug po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bai dUr+ya dang gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gang gI mu stegs kyi sgo thams cad
258a4: bkra shis kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi me tog gzi brjid skar ma'i 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//
258a5: de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi cho 'phrul rgyal mtshan shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od zhi ba'i spos snang
258a6: dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsams zhi bar mdzad pa'i sku'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam rgya mtsho snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shin du yongs brjod
258a7: mtshan gsol dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i gnas kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phags dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
258a8: gshegs pa brtson 'grus grangs med pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i gser mchog snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsung gi yan lag thams cad kyi
258b1: sgra dbyangs dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab sgron ma grangs med pa'i 'od kyi me tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bu'i brtul zhugs kyi go cha ri rab kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//
258b2: de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo'i chos kyi 'od kyi
258b3: rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i sgron ma'i 'od bzang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi sgron ma'i dpal la phyag
258b4: 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po las byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i 'brug sgra snyan pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi snang ba thams cad bkod pa'i dpal
258b5: la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po ltar skyes pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro'i ri bo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i dpal la
258b6: phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam chen po'i shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i tog gi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//
258b7: debazhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor dang 'bru thams cad sdud pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba 'dren pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo//
258b8: bzhin gshegs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'gugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag rim gror byas te bcad par bya'o// klag par bya'o// de ltar byas nas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la bsod nams
259a1: shin tu mang du 'bel bar 'gyur ro/ / lha mo chen mo dpal yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang lung bstan to// lha mo chen mo dpal khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal rin po ches brgyan pa zhes bya bar de/
259a2: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal no drari po che las 'byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de yang lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin
259a3: gshegs pa de snyed snang bar mdzad par 'gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang rang las 'od 'byung zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// nam mkha' las kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge
259a4: 'dun gyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang pad ma'i snying po dag las skye bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// de la ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med par grags pa
259a5: zhes bya ba'i bstod ba rgyud bcu gnyis pa gang zhe na/ 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams nyon cig/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/ lha thams cad kyis dbang
259a6: bskur ga/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yug lhathams cad kyi mo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dpal/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal/ tshangs pa
259a7: dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi dpal/ gnas thams cad na yod pa'i dpal/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldeng dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye
259a8: chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ rig sngags 'chang dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad kyi dpal/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang lnga'i dpal// gza' brgyad dang rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dpal lo// oM nyi ma'i bu mo/ ma ma yum/ rig byed
259b1: bzhi'i dpal/ bkra shis ma/ sems can rnams kyi ma/ rgyal ma/ rnam rgyal ma/ gang ga ma/ mu stegs kyi sgo thams cad kyi bkra shis ma/ dri ma med pa/ dri ma med par byed pa'i dpal/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog ma/ rgyags pa med pa/ zla ba'i dpal/
259b2: nyi ma'i dpal/ gza' thams cad kyi dpal/ seng ge la zhon pa/ pad ma'i mchog 'bum gyis bkab ma/ pad ma/ pad ma la gnas pa/ pad ma 'dzin pa/ pad ma las byung ba/ pad ma dang ldan pa/ 'od zer 'bar bdums 'khor ba/ nor sbyin pa/ dkar /
259b3: dkar po chen mo// lag dkar ma/ bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa/ bsod nams kyi phung po thams cad kyi lus can/ shes nyen can gyi bu mo lag pa 'bum dang ldan ma/ mig 'bum dang ldan ma/ mgo 'bum dang ldan ma/ nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
259b4: mdzes par byas pa'i cod pan thogs pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ gzugs sna tshogs can/ rab grags ma/ shin tu grags ma/ zhib ma/ sprin ma/ sgra gtsang ma/ zla ba ltar mdzes ma/ nyi ma ltar mdzes ma/ dge ma/ dge byed ma/ sems can thams cad la
259b5: mngon du phyogs ma'i dpal/ 'phags ma/ me tog la gnas ma/ me tog gi dbang phyug ma/ ri ba'i rgyal po ri re ba thams cad kyi dpal/ chu klung dang mtsha thams cad kyi dpal/ chu thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i dpal/ mu stegs thams cad du mngon du
259b6: phyogs pa'i dpal/ sman dang / rtsi tog dang / shing dang / nor dang / 'bru thams cad kyi dpal/ gser sbyin ma/ zas dang gos sbyin ma// 'od gsal ma/ snang ba ma/ lus gtsang mam/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang sgyur ma/ lha'i tshogs
259b7: thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/ gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / ku ber dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i dpal/ sbyin pa ma/ longs spyod ma/ gzi brjid ldan ma/ phun sum tshogs ma/ 'byor ba ma/ rnam par skye ba mtho pa/ chos kyi dpal khyab
259b8: 'jug la brten pa/ ku mu da la gnas ma/ bzod ldan ma/ mthu rtsal gyi gnas/ dag byed dang bkra shis thams cad kyi lag pa dang ldan pa/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa/ bsod nams thams cad sdud pa'i dpal sa thams cad
260a1: dang / rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/ rig sngag ma 'chang gi rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/ 'byung po thams cad dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ lha'i gnas
260a2: dang / lha thams cad kyi dpal/ bzlas brjod dang / bzlas brjod du bya ba dang / sbyin bsreg dang / sbyin sreg tu bya ba dang / bkra shis thams cad kyi dpal/ 'od la dga' ba/ skal ba dang ldan par 'dod pa/ drang srong thams cad dag par byed pa'i dpal/
260a3: bud med kyi gnas thams cad kyi gcos dang / dpal gyi mchog/ mi 'am tsam// thams cad dang lha la yin mo// thams cad kyi dpal gyi mchog/ khan ma tho ba med pa'i gnas na 'dug pa/ yid du 'ong bsim par byed pa/ ku be ra'i snying du sdug pa
260a4: chos kyi rdul po 'di nga la/ o sdug bsngal thams cad las nam par gzigs shig/ sgrol cig thar bar mdod cig/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bdag la mngon du gyur par marjod cig sAH// / oMg gas catir+tha mu 'i swA hA/
260a5: oM sarba bidi tre sA hA/ sarba ma ga la d+ha ra ni swA hA/ tsa tur bidi sarba na k+Sha d+hag+ha hA ga Na ga Na a d+hi mur t+yai swAhA/ pra dzA ya sA hA/ gI be swAhA/ ru da ya swA hA/ gir su khA pa hAr+tha/ o kli ni k+Shi na sa rba kar+ya sA d+ha ni sa ni sa ni/ a ba ta de ri shrI bi sra baNA
260a6: yA swA hA/ su bar+N+Na dAn d+han+ya/ a kar shan+yai swA hA/ sarba pur+Na a kar shan+yai swA hA/ shrI di ba d+hU a ka ra shan+yai swA hA/ sarba pA ban shan+yai swA hA/ sarba a kA la mrid+d+ha pra ta man+yai swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta yai swA hA/ sarba de ba ta mu kha shI ya ya~M
260a7: swA hA/ a yu ba la ban kar ye swA hA/ sarba bid tra ma ga la hasta ye swA hA/ saM ha ba ti ni ye swA hA/ pad ma sam bud d+ha ya hAH/ sarba kri u0f7fga khor de bin shash+ye swAhA// 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang lal lha mo chen po
260a8: dpal gyi ming nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ bsod nams thams cad sdud par byed pa/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa/ dpal dang / bde ba dang / bskal pa bzang po thams cad
260b1: sdud par byed pa 'di dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag 'chang ba dang / klog par byed pa des nang bar langs te gtsang mar byas la/ sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang bdug pa gsol nas lha mo chen mo dpal la yang
260b2: tsan dan gyi bdug pa phul te/ blags na des dpal thams cad thob par 'gyur zhing bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur te/ lha thams cad bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur la de'i don thams cad
260b3: kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lha mo chen mo dpal de dang / 'khor de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang /
260b4: lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags palha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa/ rdzogs s+ho//
260b5: rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dza ya ma ti ra nA sa ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
260b6: gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mang po dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so//
260b7: denas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal ba'i blo gros rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bsod nams 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o shes pa 'dod pas
260b8: thos pa la brtson par bya'o/ / mtho ris 'dod pas tshul khrims bsrung bar bya'o// longs spyod 'dod pas gtong ba spel bar bya'o// gzugs bzang ba 'dod pas bzod pa bsgom par bya'o// spobs pa 'dod pas bla ma la gus par bya'o// gzungs 'dod
261a1: bas mngon pa'i nga rgyal med par bya'o/ / ye shes 'dod pas tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la gnas par bya'o// thar pa 'dod pas sdig pa thams cad spang bar bya'o// sems can thams cad bde bar bya bar 'dod pas byang chub tu sems
261a2: bskyed par bya'o/ / skad snyan pa 'dod pas bden par smra bar bya'o// yon tan 'dod pas rab tu dben pa la dga' bar bya'o// chos 'dod pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten par bya'o// zhi gnas 'dod pas 'du 'dzi med pa mang du bya'o// lhag mthong
261a3: 'dod pas chos stong par so sor brtag par mang du bya'o/ / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'dod pas byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o// lha dang mi'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pas dge ba bcu'i las kyi
261a4: lam yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya'o/ / yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar 'dod pas stong pa'i chos la mngon par dga' bar bya'o// yon tan thams cad thob par 'dod pas dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
261a5: de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i blo gros dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
261a6: gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / 'phags pa rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya a ba lo ka na ni nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs/
261a7: shes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i 'ban byand kyi bung ba'i rol dge slong ga dge
261a8: na chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pa la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rnam par dgapa
261b1: tshul khrims yongs su dag pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yangs su dgan/ blags rnam par dgapa nyid 'dzin yangs su dag pa dang / bzed pa yongs sug pa dang / u da pa yangs su dgapas pan na gshegs pa yangs sunganganan
261b2: blo gros rnam par dag pa byams pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ / blo gros rnam par dag pa snying rje yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa dgar ba yongs su dag par
261b3: btang snyoms yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ / blo gros rnam par dag pa rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros
261b4: rnam par dag pa stobs yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ / blo gros rnam par dag pa mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su
261b5: dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa la su zhig me tog dang phreng ba dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / byug
261b6: rnams kyis sti stang byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/ de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum po las theg pa gang yang rung bas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i mthar thug pa ma gtogs par bsod nams kyi phung po de phyi ma'i
261b7: mthar yang zad par mi nus so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis tshad med pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba yang tshad med do// mtha' yas so//
261b8: bsam gyis mi khyab po// mtshungs pa med do// dpag tu med do// grangs med do// dpag gis mi lang ngo // brjod du med do// blo gros rnam par dag pa su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa la sti stang byed pa dang / bla
262a1: mang byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / brjed pa dang / phyi ma'i tshe byi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la bu zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'brutsam la sti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang /
262a2: rimor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / brjod pa dang / yang dag par sems nye bar bzhag ste byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems bskyed pas/ phyag 'tshal ba dang / phyag byed pa dang / sti stang byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang /
262a3: brjed pa dang / gsol ba dang / bsngags pa dang / skong pa byed pa des pan yon lnga yongs su bzung bar 'gyur te/ ldag zhon/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / tsho shes shing krol yod pa dang lda pa 'gyur
262a4: ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / mthong nas kyang dang la skyed par 'gyur ba ste/ phan yon lnga po de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro// de chos bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur to// bzhig pa zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
262a5: pa'i brtan pa 'dzin pa dang / de yang ji nad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa dang / bsgrubs nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur te/ chos bzhi pa de dag go/
262a6: blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud dam dud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis me brdzir 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rigos mtho zhing rigs che ba dang / bcas ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
262a7: rnams yid la byed pa dang / phyi ma'i dub na dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba ste/ blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub
262a8: sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/
262b1: byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas// 'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la// su zhig bskor ba byed pa ni// tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe// dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan// bsod nams ldan zhing 'gri med 'brus
262b2: mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni/ / tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // srin po rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur// das ni gang dag bstan pa yi// mi khom brgyad po de dag spong // sangs rgyas 'byung ba ba sa
262b3: g.yen par byed 'di la bcig/ mdog ldan gzugs ni phun su mchogs// mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa dang // mthu dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur// le lo can du mi 'gyur// de ni mug cing nor cher 'gyur// bsod nams
262b4: ldan zhing rdzib med/ / 'jig rten sgron ma mnyes byas nas// yang dang yang du sti stang byed// bdag med stong pa'i chos thos na// de ni chos la rmongs mi 'gyur// myur du dang ba thob 'gyur zhing // chos don ji bzhin mkhas par 'gyur//
262b5: tshong dpon khyim dang rgyas pa dang // phyug po rnams su skye bar 'gyur// dpa' zhing sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur// gtong ba btang zhing ser sna med// 'dzam bu'i gling na gang yang rung // khyad par can gyi rigs mdzes pa// der ni brtan pa de skye ste/
262b6: dma' ba dag ni rnam par spangs// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// skye ba thams cad kun tu yang // dbang cher grags pa'i khyim bdag dang // dpal dang gzi brjed ldan par 'gyur// bram ze sa la che 'dra dang // tshul khrims ldan zhing mang thos
262b7: dang / rgyal rigs sa la che 'dra dang // phyug cing nar cher ldan par 'gyur// res bskor rgya mtsho tshun chad kyi// sa kun la ni gang smon pa// gling bzhi dag gi dbang phyug bla// rgyal po chos dang ldan par 'gyur// 'khor los sgyur ba rdzu 'phrul che//
262b8: rin chen bdun dang ldan par 'gyur// rgyal srid gnas nas sangs rgyas la// yang dang yang dra sti stang byed// 'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris su// song nas sangs rgyas bstan la dang // lhun po'i zom gyi dbang phyug go// lha'i dbang
263a1: u0f7f/ po brgya byin 'gyur// lha dbang shin tu 'thab bral dang // de bzhin du ni dga' ldan dang // lha dbang shin tu 'phrul dga' dang // dbang spur 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du// tshangs pa 'dabang
263a2: mug mkhas 'gyur zhing / / lha rnams bye bas mchod par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la// mig skor ba byed pa yis// bsngags pa bskal pa bye bar yang // brjod pas zad par bya mi nus// su zhig byang chub sems bskyed nas/ ston pa'i/
263a3: mchod rten phyag 'tshal ba// de ni bskal pa bye bar yang // nams kyang long zhing 'thad mi 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la// mngon du bskor ba byed pa ni// bung ba sngon po mdzes 'dra yi// rnam par dag pa'i mig 'thob 'char// mchod rten ga
263a4: ba byas na ni/ de ni nges par rtag tu yang // 'thun pa'i don kun thob 'gyur zhing // don min rnams ni spangs par 'gyur// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// mthu dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur// de ni le lo med 'gyur zhing // rtag tu bag yod ldan par
263a5: 'gyur/ mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// brtson 'grus brtan zhing mthu brtan pa// brtan zhing rnam par gnon brtan dang // de ni myur du mkhas par 'gyur// me dang dug dang mtshon gyis de// nams kyang 'chi dus byed mi 'gyur// mkhas pa'i tshe
263a6: ni rdzogs rdzogs sa/ / zad par byas nas 'chi dus med// mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni// pho brang 'khor dang yul 'khor dang // grong rdal rnams su longs spyod dang // gzugs kyi khyad par 'phags par 'gyur// byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i dus/
263a7: de ni 'dod pa mi sten cing // lus kyang gtsang la gos gtsang zhing // gtsang ma'i chos la gnas par 'gyur// blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas/
263a8: dad pa bskyed de pus mo gnyi ga'i lha ngas la btsugs nas phyag 'tshal zhing phyag byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa de ci 'dra bar bdag gi lus kyang de 'dra bar gyur cig
263b1: ces de la mos pa bskyed na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa bsod nams kyi phung po de'i mtha' brjod par mi nus te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i phyir ro// bsod nams kyi phung po de ni rgyal po nyid dam/ brgya byin nyid dam
263b2: tshangs pa nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med pas kyang zad par bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo gros rnam par dag pa rigs kyi bu des bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi
263b3: khya pa yongs su bzung ba'i phyir te/ blo gros rnam par dag pa 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa grong khyer ram/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ grong du
263b4: 'jug kyang rung 'chag kyang rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / chos ston kyang rung / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can lha'am/ kla' ma/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding dam/
263b5: mi'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ mi'am mi ma yin pa'am/ sems can gyi grangs su ma gtogs pa shing dam ri 'am// khung bu'am/ bu ga'am/ bya skyibs kyang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa gal ba logs su 'dug dang / rab tu
263b6: 'dud pa dang / kun tu 'dud pa mi byed pa de gang yang med de/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa la byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu de dag grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul ljongs dang po brang
263b7: 'khor na chu la sems can rnams lung da lu kun du 'dud par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'jig rten sangs rgyas ji ltar 'gyur zhes mos bskyed de/ sangs rgyas mchod rten
263b8: la ni pus mo gnyis btsugs dang / su zhig byang chub gzhol nas phyogs rnams kun 'gro ba// de 'gro tshon 'jig rten gsum po 'dud pa byed// mi rnams gtso bo rang byung gang du 'gro byed pa// de logs su ni rdzi dang shing dang sdong bla da /
264a1: sman dang shing la rnams dang 'bras bu 'dab ma dang // yid 'ong dri ldan me tog rnams ni 'dud par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la bus mo gtsugs pa ni// de la mi'i dbang po kun kyang 'dud par 'gyur// gnod sbyin dpa
264a2: dang klu dang lha'i rgyal po dang / / tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad rkang par gdugs par byed// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la bu sa btsugs phyag byas na// dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur// gser gyi mdog
264a3: ldan mtshan rnams kyis ni go char 'gyur/ / mthu che bla mar bya zhing thub par dka' bar 'gyur// de yi yul na sems can gang dag gnas gyur pa// de dag thams cad byams pa'i sems dang dga' bar 'gyur// de la sems can gang
264a4: yang sdig pa mi bskyed de/ / skye bo tshogs chen dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten dag la bus btsugs phyag 'tshal ba// de la 'jig rten kun gyi rgyal po rab tu 'dud// de la lha dang klu dang mi dang lto 'phye chen po
264a5: 'dud/ / bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su dbugs byin thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan mchod rten dag la bus btsugs phyag 'tshal ba// gang tshe rgyal ba dam pa byung bar gyur pa'i tshe// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba thob//
264a6: 'dren pa gzhal yas rnams la mchod pa byed par 'gyur// 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur ces mos pa bskyed nas ni// bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la bus btsugs phyag 'tshal ba// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya grangs zang 'bru
264a7: na/ de ni ring po mi thogs byang chub mtshungs med 'thob// gang zhig sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la// bskal pa bye ba gzhal yas sti snang byed pa bas// gang zhig phyi dus ma zad bskal pa 'di la ni// mchod rten phyag 'tshal de
264a8: yi bsod nams ches mang ngo / / sangs rgyas dam pa sbyin gnas mtshungs pa med gyur pa/ spyod pa dam pa spyad nas khyad par brnyes gyur pa// mi yi khyu mchog pa la 'dir ni mchod byas na// rnam par smin pa dam pa mtshungs med rang bzhin/
264b1: 'gyur byang chub tu ni sems bsngos te// me tog phreng ba byas nas su// mchod rten dag la su 'bul ba// de ni nams kyang bongs mi 'gyur// mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas// sum bcu rtsa gsum 'gro bar 'gyur// der ni rin chen sna tshogs kyi// gzhal
264b2: med khang pa thob par 'gyur/ / mchod rten phreng ba 'dir phul na// khang bzangs dag dang khang brtsegs pa// lha'i bu mos bsten pa rnams// sum bcu gsum du spyod par 'gyur// yan lag brgyad ldan chus gang zhing // gser gyi bye ma 'jal
264b3: gyur pa/ bai dUr+ya dang shel dag gi/ lha'i rdzing bu thob par 'gyur// der ni lha'i dga' spyad nas// mkhas pa tshe tshad rdzogs par 'gyur// lha'i 'jig rten shi 'phos nas// mi nang longs spyod ldan par 'gyur// dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis//
264b4: mkhas pa bag yod gyur nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes byas te// rkang gnyis mchog la mchod pa byed// mchod rten phreng ba 'bul byed pa// de ni 'dod chags mi 'phrogs shing // zhe sdang gis kyang 'phrogs mi 'gyur// de ni
264b5: nams kyang rmongs mi 'gyur/ / rkang gnyis mchog la mchod byas na// de ni tshe rabs thams cad du// chags pa med cing zhe sdang med// bskam pa med cing dbang po bsdams// mchod rten phreng ba'i yul byed pa// tshe rabs bye ba stong rnams dang / khrag
264b6: khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs pa/ / kun tu bkur sti byas par 'gyur// mchod rten phreng pa 'bul byed pa// de ni 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur// brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug 'gyur// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po
264b7: skyob pa la/ / dar gyi dbul ba phul byas nas// lha yi dag dang ma rnams kyi// don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dma' ba'i rigs ni rnam spangs te// der ni de skye 'gyur ma yin// phyug cong nor chen ldan pa dang // 'jig rten dbang phyug de
264b8: 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs la mchod byas na// gzugs dang don dang longs spyod dang // kha dog dang ni 'byor pa dang // kun tu grags dang ldan par 'gyur// de ni tshe rabs dran 'gyur zhing // 'dod chags kyis kyang 'phrogs mi 'gyur// 'dod
265a1: pa rnams kyi skyon shes shing / / tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod byas na// gzugs rnams dang ni skye dag dang // ro rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs shing // sdig pa'i las ni byed mi 'gyur// rnam par 'dren pa
265a2: mchod byed na/ / de ni spos dang me tog gis// nams kyang 'phrogs par mi 'gyur zhing // ngan ldan shes rab ldan par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs la su mchod pa// de yi nor gyi phung po la// rgyal po dang ni chom rkun dang // me dang chus kyang reg
265a3: mi 'gyur/ / 'jig rten mgon po'i mchod rten la// dar gyi dbul ba su 'bul ba// de ni brkam dang mya ngan dang // nad bu can du gzhar mi 'gyur// 'jig rten sgron ma mchod byed pa// tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du// mya ngan med cing gnod med dang / 'bor
